SA15bsa075_u:1_1: avyāhataṃ yo jagadekabandhuḥ sa jñāyate sarvavidatra nirmalam //
SA15bsa075_u:2_0: iha hi dharmajñādaparama navaśeṣajñamanicchannapi kumārilo dharmajña eva kevale pratiṣiddhe vedamupādeyamabhimanyamānaḥ paṭhati
SA15bsa075_u:5_1: yaḥ pramāṇamasāviṣṭo na tu sarvasya vedakaḥ //
SA15bsa075_u:9_0: yathoktābhyāsasahitacetoguṇāśvāmī caturāryasatyaviṣayā ākārā iti svabhāvo hetuḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:10_1: saṃkalparūḍhānāṃ caturāryasatyākārāṇāṃ cetoguṇatvamātrasya ca hetoḥ pratyātmavedyatvāt /
SA15bsa075_u:10_5_0: asyāścāsaṃbhāvanā nāma kiṃ (1) bhāvyasya saṃkalpārūḍhatvāsaṃbhavāt (2) anarthitvāt
SA15bsa075_u:11_0: tatra na tāvadādyaḥ pakṣaḥ / saparikaraheyopādeyātmakasya caturāryasatyākārasya bhāvyasya vikalpārūḍhasya pratyātmavedyatvāt /
SA15bsa075_u:12_0: nāpi dvitīyaḥ / duḥkhamātrasyāpi parityāgārthitvena vyāpteḥ sarvajanānubhavasiddhatvāt //
SA15bsa075_u:14_1: / na ca pañcamaḥ / duḥkhasya kādācitkatvāt // nāpi ṣaṣṭhaḥ / kāryakādācitkatvasya anityahetukatvena vyāptatvāt /
SA15bsa075_u:15_0: nāpiṃ saptamaḥ / duḥkhe viparyāsatṛṣṇāpravṛtiśaktikarmabhiḥ sahitasyātmadṛṣṭilakṣaṇasya hetoḥ sāṃsārikapañcaskandhalakṣaṇakāryānyathānupapattito niścayāt /
SA15bsa075_u:16_1: tataḥ śeṣaḥ kleśastata udayinaḥ karmavisarādvisārī saṃsāraḥ śaraṇarahito dāruṇataraḥ //
SA15bsa075_u:18_0: na cāṣṭamaḥ / ātmadṛṣṭirūpāyāḥ avidyāyāḥ pratipakṣabhūtasya nairātmyadarśanasya saṃbhavāt //
SA15bsa075_u:20_1: yo hi yatsvabhāvastasmin svabhāve vyavasthito na saṃskāramapekṣate /
SA15bsa075_u:20_4: pratiṣedhyasya tatsvabhāvatvasya yadvyāpakaṃ saṃskāranirapekṣatvaṃ tadviruddhaṃ tadapekṣatvamiti cittasya doṣātmakatvakṣatiḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:22_0: na ca dvādaśaḥ / paralokaprasādhanāt / tathā hi,
SA15bsa075_u:25_0: na ca trayodaśaḥ / doṣakāraṇasyātmadarśanasya yadviruddhaṃ nairātmyadarśanaṃ tasya nirupadravatvāt /
SA15bsa075_u:25_1: bhūtārthatvāt / svabhāvatvācca / sarvadāvasthiteḥ / tannāyaṃ viśeṣaṇāsiddho 'pi hetuḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:25_2: tathāpī dṛśo 'bhyāso na kasya cid dṝśyata iti cet /
SA15bsa075_u:26_0: na caiṣa viruddho hetuḥ / sapakṣe kāminyākāre saṃbhavāt /
SA15bsa075_u:26_2: tathā hi vyāptyadhikaraṇe kāmāturavartini yuvatyākāre sādaranirantaradīrghakālābhyāsasahitacetoguṇāt pūrvamanupalabdhiḥ sphuṭābhasya /
SA15bsa075_u:27_0: nanu kathamanumānataḥ sarvajñasiddhipratyāśā / tasya parokṣatvena tatpratibaddhaliṅgāniścayāt (#
SA15bsa075_u:27_1: Nibandh 4#) kiṃ ca sarvajñasattāsādhane sarvo heturna trayīṃ doṣajātimatipatati /
SA15bsa075_u:28_0: api ca abhyāsāt kāraṇātkāryasya sphuṭābhasya pratītau nāvaśyaṃ kāraṇāni kāryavanti bhavantītyanaikāntikatā /
SA15bsa075_u:28_2: sāpi śaktirucyate / sā ca kārye 'nantarā sāntarā vā /
SA15bsa075_u:28_3: tatrādyā kāryasamadhigamyā / na cādhigatakāryasya tayā kaścidupayogaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:29_4: tathāpi kaḥ prastāvaḥ sarvajñavivāde sādhanamārabdhavataḥ sphuṭatvaṃ cetasaḥ sādhayitum /
SA15bsa075_u:30_0: kiṃ ca prasiddhānumāne bhūtalasya dharmiṇaḥ kumbhakāraghaṭayorapi dharmayoḥ pratītatvāt kāryakāraṇabhāvo grahītuṃ śakyata eva /
SA15bsa075_u:30_1: prastute tu kāmāturasantānavartino yuvatyākārasya dharmiṇastatpragatābhyāsasphuṭatvayorapi dharmayoḥ parokṣatvāt /
SA15bsa075_u:30_2: kathaṃ kāryakāraṇagṛhītiḥ / yathā ca naiyāyikaṃ prati yuṣmābhirucyate pratyakṣato na kāryamātraṃ puruṣavyāptaṃ sidhyati /
SA15bsa075_u:30_3: kiṃ tvavāntarameva ghaṭajātīyaṃ kāryamiti tathā nākāramātramabhyāsapūrvakaṃ sidhyati /
SA15bsa075_u:31_0: kiṃ ca sarvavido 'pi yadi caturāryasatyaparijñānataḥ sarvajñatāsthitiḥ,
SA15bsa075_u:33_0: iti yuṣmābhirevocyate / na ca sarvajñānavān viśeṣaniṣṭhatayādhigantuṃ śakyate /
SA15bsa075_u:34_1: bhūdharādhīnavahnisattāvat / kintu caturāryasatyākārasvarūpe dharmiṇi sphuṭābhatvasya sādhyasyāyogavyavacchedārthaṃ parvate 'gnimātrāyogavyavacchedavat /
SA15bsa075_u:34_3: tacca parvatīyāgnivat / pakṣadharmatābalataḥ satyacatuṣṭayādhikaraṇaṃ sidhyat sarvajñatāmācakṣmahe /
SA15bsa075_u:36_0: tadatrābhyāsasahitacaturāryasatyākāraḥ samagro dharmī sāmagryamabhyāsaviśiṣṭacetoguṇatvamātraṃ hetuḥ sphuṭībhāvayogyatāsādhyam /
SA15bsa075_u:36_4: tasmāt sphuṭābhatvena sādhyena dṛṣṭānte vyāptisiddherastyeva tatpratibaddhaliṅganiścayaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:36_8: iyaṃ ca na gamayatu nāmaikāntataḥ kāryasattvam /
SA15bsa075_u:36_10: tadā bhāvini kārye sandehe 'pi kāraṇayogyatā niścīyata eva /
SA15bsa075_u:37_1: atrāpi kāminyākāre bhāvanājātīyasya sphuṭībhāvakaraṇayogyatā dṛṣṭeti samānam /
SA15bsa075_u:38_8: tathā hi kāminyabhyāsasantatisahacāri saṃbhramakāyavacodarśanameva kāminyākārasya tadbhāvanāyāśca darśanam /
SA15bsa075_u:38_14: tathā bāhyaghaṭakāminyādīnāṃ śaktikṛtasya mahato jātibhedasya saṃbhavādanyajātīyavyāptigrahe 'nyajātīyād buddhimadanumānamayuktam /
SA15bsa075_u:38_15: saṃkalpārūḍhānāṃ tu jalajvalanayuvatyākārādīnāṃ bāhyatvenādhyastānāmapi vijñānaikasvarūpatayaikajātīyatvamastīti bhāvanāsahitākāramātreṇaiva vaiśadyavyāptirastu /
SA15bsa075_u:39_2: dṛśyate hi siddhasādhyā vaiśadyajātiranapekṣya viparītabhāvanāṃ nidrāvicchede vicchidyamānā /
SA15bsa075_u:39_3: bhāvanābhāvinī tu na vinā vipakṣābhyāsaṃ jāgrato 'pi yadāhuḥ
SA15bsa075_u:42_1: dhīyet yadi ko doṣaḥ so 'pi sarvajñatāṃ vrajet /
SA15bsa075_u:43_0: ityuttaraṃ draṣṭavyam / tathā sattāmātre vipratipannān prati sattaiva kevalā prasādhitā /
SA15bsa075_u:43_1: viśeṣajijñāsāyāṃ tu pramāṇopapannakṣaṇikanairātmyavādina eva sugatasya bhagavataḥ sarvajñatā /
SA15bsa075_u:45_0: sugato yadi sarvajñaḥ kapilo neti kā pramā /
SA15bsa075_u:45_1: athobhāvapi sarvajñau matabhedaḥ kathaṃ tayoḥ // iti //
SA15bsa075_u:47_0: uktakrameṇa munirājanaye pramāyāḥ śaktirvyanakti gatimapramitāṃ kṛpāṃ ca /
SA15bsa075_u:47_1: anyatra tu dvayamudastamado 'stamāne tenaika eva śaraṇaṃ sa nirātmavādī //
SA15bsa075_u:48_0: iti viśeṣasiddhirapyanavadyeti sarvamanākulamākulādhayaḥ pare na pratipadyante /
SA15bsa075_u:48_2: bādhakapramāṇasadbhāvāt sarvajñasyāsadvyavahāro yuktaḥ sadvyavahārapratiṣedho vā prasādhakapramāṇābhāvādveti /
SA15bsa075_u:49_0: atra vicāryate kiṃ punarasya bhagavato bādhakaṃ pramāṇaṃ pratyakṣamanumānaṃ śabdādikaṃ veti vikalpāḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:50_0: na tāvat pratyakṣam / pratyakṣaṃ hi kevalapradeśādau pravartamānaṃ svapravṛttiyogyameva tatra vastu pratiṣedhati /
SA15bsa075_u:50_1: na vastumātram / na ca sarvajñasya pratyakṣapravṛttiyogyatāsti /
SA15bsa075_u:51_1: syādetat / na vayaṃ pratyakṣaṃ pravartamānamabhāvaṃ sādhayatīti brūmaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:51_2: kiṃ tarhi / nivartamānam / tathā hi yatra vastuni pratyakṣasya nivṛttistasyāsadbhāvaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:51_3: yathā śaśaviṣāṇādeḥ / yatra tu pratyakṣasya pravṝttistasya sadbhāvo yathā ghaṭādeḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:53_0: nādyaḥ pakṣaḥ / satyapi vastuni pratyakṣanivṛtterupalabhyamānāyā vastvabhāvaniya tatvāsiddheḥ //
SA15bsa075_u:54_0: nāpi dvitīyaḥ / svābhāvena saha kasyacit sāhityānupapatteḥ / anyathā tannivṛttatvānupapatteḥ //
SA15bsa075_u:55_0: na ca tṛtīyaḥ / tathā hi nivṛttāt pratyakṣādabhāvasiddhirityasataḥ pratyakṣādityuktaṃ bhavati /
SA15bsa075_u:55_3: na hi tacca nāsti tena ca pratipattiriti nyāyyam /
SA15bsa075_u:56_3: na ca dṛśyānupalambhaḥ tatprabhedo vā kāryānupalabdhyādiryogyānupalambho vā parābhimato 'tra pramāṇam /
SA15bsa075_u:57_1: tathā hi tatkāraṇamindriyavijñānaṃ vā mānasaṃ vā bhāvanābalajaṃ vā /
SA15bsa075_u:59_1: nūnaṃ sa cakṣuṣā sarvān rasādīn pratipadyate //
SA15bsa075_u:61_0: iti sarvametat śrotrādāvapi draṣṭavyam / na cakṣurādiprakarṣaḥ svārthamatikramya dṛṣṭa /
SA15bsa075_u:65_0: na caitad vaktavyam / yadi nāmaikaikenendriyeṇa tajjñānena vā sarvasyāgrahaṇaṃ tathāpi pañcabhirindriyaistajjñānairvā svasvaviṣayapravṛttairevātiśayaprāptairbhaviṣyatīti /
SA15bsa075_u:65_3: tadevamindriyamindriyavijñānaṃ vā nāśeṣagrāhīti na prathamaḥ pakṣaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:66_0: nāpi dvitīyaḥ / tathā hi yadyapi tanmānasaṃ sarvārthaviṣayaṃ tathāpi na tasya svātantryeṇārthagrahaṇe vyāpāro 'sti /
SA15bsa075_u:66_2_1: manasā paricchedo na prāpnotīti kathaṃ sarvajñatā /
SA15bsa075_u:67_0: na ca bhāvanābalajaṃ sarvārthagrāhīti tṛtīyaḥ pakṣaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:67_1: tathā hi tadbhāvanābalajamapi yadīndriyāśritamiti caturthaḥ pakṣaḥ,
SA15bsa075_u:67_2: tadā so 'saṅgataḥ / indriyasya tajjñānasya ca niyataviṣayaviṣayatvapratipādanāt /
SA15bsa075_u:68_0: atha bhāvanābalena tathāvidhamutpannaṃ manovijñānaṃ sarvārthagrāhīti pañcamaḥ pakṣaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:68_1: tadānvarthatvāt pratyakṣaśabdasya tasya ca bhāvanābalāvalambino 'pyanakṣajatvāt nārthasākṣātkāritvamastīti pratipādanīyam /
SA15bsa075_u:68_3: na tu sarvaviṣayatveneti / kathaṃ tenāpi sakalārthajātādivedanam /
SA15bsa075_u:71_1: prājño 'pi ca naraḥ sūkṣmānarthān draṣṭuṃ kṣamo 'pi san /
SA15bsa075_u:74_5: kiṃ bhāvanayā / tata eva tatsiddheḥ / kiṃ ca tatpramāṇam / na tāvadanumānaṃ dharmādharmayoḥ pūrvamagrahaṇena tadvayāptaliṅgasaṃvedanāsaṃbhavāt /
SA15bsa075_u:74_7: na tu kaścidviśeṣaḥ / na cānirdiṣṭaviśeṣaviṣayā bhāvanā bhavati /
SA15bsa075_u:75_0: dhyeya ātmā prabhuryo 'sau hṛdi dīpa iva sthitaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:77_2: kiṃ bhāvanayā / hānopādānārthaṃ hi vastu jijñāsyate /
SA15bsa075_u:78_0: atha vipralambhabhūyiṣṭhatvādāgamānāṃ pramāṇamāgamo na veti vicikitsamāno bhāvanayā jijñāsate /
SA15bsa075_u:80_1: gṛhītagrahaṇāt / yāvadeva hi gṛhītaṃ tāvadeva bhāvanayā viṣayīkriyate /
SA15bsa075_u:81_0: vācaspatistu kaṇikāyāmāha / satyaṃ śrutānumānagocaracāriṇī bhāvanā viśadābhajñānaheturiti nāvajānīmahe /
SA15bsa075_u:82_2: tadviṣayaśca samastavastunairātmyamiti tadbhāvanāprakarṣaḥ samastavastunairātmyaṃ viśadayan samastavastuviśadatāmantareṇa tadanupapatteḥ samastavastuvaiśadyamāvahatītyuktam /
SA15bsa075_u:83_0: satyamuktam / ayuktaṃ tu tat / tathā hi nāgamānumānagocaratvaṃ nirātmanāṃ vastubhedānāṃ paramārthasatām /
SA15bsa075_u:83_2: nāpi tadviṣayā bhāvanā / tadagrāhyamapi svalakṣaṇaṃ tadadhyavaseyatayā tadviṣaya iti tadyonirapi bhāvanā tadviṣayeti tatprakarṣastadvaiśadyaheturiti cet /
SA15bsa075_u:83_4: tathā hi yadanumānena gṛhyate yaccādhyavasīyate te dve apyanyanivṛttī,
SA15bsa075_u:84_3: karikumbhakaṭhorakucakalaśahāriṇi hariṇaśāvalolalocane campakadalāvadātagātralate lāvaṇyasarasi nirantaralagnalalitadoḥkandalīmūla māliṅganamaṅgane preyasitare prayaccha /
SA15bsa075_u:84_5: asti ca vikalpāvikalpayoḥ kathañcit samānaviṣayateti nātiprasaṅga iti cet /
SA15bsa075_u:84_11: vijñānasvalakṣaṇaikatvābhyupagame ca tannityamekamadvitīyaṃ brahmābhyasanīyamiti kṣaṇikanairātmyābhyāsābhyupagamo dattajalāñjaliḥ prasajyeta /
SA15bsa075_u:84_17_0: tataścānumānamutpannamiti pāramparyeṇa vahnipratibandhāt prāpakaṃ ca vahnerdāhapākakāriṇaḥ
SA15bsa075_u:84_18: tat kimanumānena vahniṃ vyavasthāpya bhāvayato yadvahniviṣayamativiśadavijñānaṃ tatpramāṇamiti /
SA15bsa075_u:84_19: omiti brubāṇasya parvatanitambārohaṇe satīndriyasannikarṣajanmano dahanavijñānasya bhāvanādhipatya viśadābhavijñānena saha saṃvādaniyamaprasaṅgaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:84_21: lakṣaṇayogini ca vyabhicārasaṃbhave tallakṣaṇameva bādhitamiti viśadābhamapi prātibhamiva saṃśayākrāntamapramāṇam /
SA15bsa075_u:84_23: vyabhicārāt / evañca prāsarpakasyeva saktukarkarīprāptimūlalābhamanorathaparamparāhito dvaviṇasaṃbhārasākṣātkārastathāgatasya nirātmakasamastavastusākṣātkāra ityāpatitam /
SA15bsa075_u:85_0: tathā ca tadutpatteḥ tadavyabhicāraniyama iti cet /
SA15bsa075_u:85_4: na khalvindhanaviśeṣo dhūmaheturiti vināpi dahanaṃ sahasreṇāpi saṃskārairdhūbhamādhate /
SA15bsa075_u:85_6_1: kāmāturādivartinyā iti bhūtārthāpi tannirapekṣaiva samartheti nārthasyālambanapratyayatvaṃ
SA15bsa075_u:85_7: api ca ālambanapratyayā api ta evāsya kṣaṇā yujyante,
SA15bsa075_u:85_8: ye tasya purastāttanā avyavadhānāstathā ca ta evāsya grāhyā na punaḥ pūrvatarāḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:85_12: rāgādimalāvṛtatvāt / tasya ca bhagavato nirmṛṣṭanikhilakleśopakleśamalaṃ vijñānamanāvaraṇaṃ paritaḥ pradyotamāna mālambanapratyayaṃ sarvākāraṃ gocarayet /
SA15bsa075_u:85_13: tasya ca sākṣāt paramparayā ca kathañcit sarveṇa saṃbandhād deśkālaviprakīrṇavastumātraviśiṣṭasvabhāvatayā tathaiva gocarayet /
SA15bsa075_u:85_14: na caitat sarvagrahaṇamantareṇeti sarvaviṣayamasya vijñānamanāvaraṇaṃ siddham /
SA15bsa075_u:86_0: tadanupapannam / vicārāsahatvāt / tathā hīyamālambanapratyayasya sarvaviśiṣṭātmatā bhāvikī na vā /
SA15bsa075_u:86_1: bhāvikī cet / na tāvatsarvasminnālambanapratyaye caikā saṃbhavati /
SA15bsa075_u:86_3: nānā cet / ālambanapratyayāśca sarve ceti tattvam /
SA15bsa075_u:86_4: tathā ca na saṃbandha iti na tadgrahaṇe sarvagrahaṇam /
SA15bsa075_u:86_5: vikalpāropitatayā tvavikalpakaṃ samastavastuviṣayaṃ sarvatra pratīyata iti subhāṣitam /
SA15bsa075_u:88_0: iti cet / atha katipayavastvālambanānubhavasya kutastya eṣa mahimā yataḥ samastavastvavasāya iti /
SA15bsa075_u:88_5: tattvāvarakatā hi sulabhamalānāṃ kleśādīnāṃ na punarvikalpanirmāṇapratibandhatā /
SA15bsa075_u:89_3: tadayuktam / anumitabhāvitavahniviṣayaviśadābhajñāna prāmāṇyaprasaṅgāt tadvidhasya kvacid bādhadarśanādaprāmāṇyamihāpi samānam /
SA15bsa075_u:89_4: anyatrābhiniveśāt / tadiha yadi viśadābhavijñānahetutvaṃ bhāvanāyā viśeṣaṇatrayayogena sādhyate,
SA15bsa075_u:89_9: atha pratyakṣavijñānahetutā bhāvanāyāḥ paraṃ pratyasiddhā sādhyate,
SA15bsa075_u:91_0: iti / tadanupapannam / bhūtārthatve 'pi hi buddheḥ tatpakṣapātitā bhūtārthaiḥ pratipakṣairbādho na bhavet /
SA15bsa075_u:91_4: yayā samūlakāṣaṃ kaṣitā doṣā na punarudbhaviṣyanti /
SA15bsa075_u:91_5: ataevāsthirāśrayatve 'pi apunaryatnāpekṣatve 'pi asya nātyantikī niṣṭhā saṃbhavati /
SA15bsa075_u:95_0: iti / tadasya prāmāṇyaṃ nivartamānaṃ tulyahetujatvamapi nivartayati /
SA15bsa075_u:95_1: na caiṣa bhūtārthabhāvanāprakarṣaparyantajo 'nindriyasannikṛṣṭānumitabhāvitavahnivaiśadye ca nirātmakasamastavastuvaiśadye ca viśiṣyate /
SA15bsa075_u:95_4: kiṃ tu tadākṣiptamanā vividhaviṣayabhedatṛṣṇādiparipluto na śaknoti bbāvayitumiti bhāvanādaramātra eva tadvirahopayogaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:95_5: asti cehāpi śiśirabharasaṃbhṛta jaḍimamantharatarakāyakāṇḍasyānumitavahnibhāvanābhiyoga iti na hetu bhedataḥ pratibandhasiddhiḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:95_9: tacca nityasamavetaṃ nityam, kāraṇasāmarthyaprakrameṇa ca pārthivāvayavini kārye jāyata iti avadātam /
SA15bsa075_u:96_4: tacca svarūpato jñātavyam / ta eva hetubhūtāḥ samudayaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:96_5: sa ca prahātavyaḥ / niḥkleśāvasthā cittasya nirodhaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:97_0: atrocyate / mārgastāvat pramāṇapariśuddho na bhavatītyuktaṃ prāk /
SA15bsa075_u:97_2: api ca pramāṇapariśuddhamārgavādo śākyaḥ pramāṇaṃ pṛṣṭaḥ san satvākhyaliṅgajaṃ vikalpaṃ brūyāt /
SA15bsa075_u:97_4: śabdasaṃsṛṣṭatvāt / tasmiṃśca bhāvyamāne sattve bhāvakasya vikalpakasya bhāvanopahite viśadābhatve śabdasaṃsṛṣṭagrāhyanimittaṃ vikalpakatvaṃ nivartate /
SA15bsa075_u:97_9: śuddhau vā kiṃ bhāvanayā / bhāvyasya sākṣādvijñātatvāt /
SA15bsa075_u:97_10: na cānyasmin śabdasaṃsṛṣṭe bhāvyamāne sphuṭamanyadrūpaṃ bhavati /
SA15bsa075_u:98_0: kṣaṇikatve bhāvye samāropite vāstavaṃ kṣaṇikatvameva yogivijñānapratibhāsīti cet /
SA15bsa075_u:98_1: na / satyāsatyayorekatvābhāvātmake hi bhede 'satyabhāvane 'pi yadi satyapratibhāsaḥ,
SA15bsa075_u:98_3: tasmādabhūtaviṣayābhyāsaṃ nirvikalpakamapi saṃvādānna pramāṇamiti na sarvajñasiddhiḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:99_0: api ca bhāvyasya vastunaḥ punaḥ punaścetasi niveśanamabhyāsaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:99_1: sa ca brahmacaryeṇa tapasā sādaraṃ dīrghakālaṃ nirantaramāsevito dṛḍhabhūmirasphuṭākārasya vikalpasya sphuṭābhatvajanana iṣṭaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:99_3: tathā hi bhāvyagrāhī yādṛśo vikalpa utpannastādṛśa eva niranvayaṃ nirudhyate /
SA15bsa075_u:99_4: tasmiṃśca niruddhe punaḥ punarutpadyamānaḥ pratyayastādṛśa evāpūrva utpadyate /
SA15bsa075_u:99_5: tadanena paryāyeṇa kalpasahasre 'pi apūrvotpatteraviśeṣānna tajjanyaḥ saṃskāro 'bhyāsa utpadyate /
SA15bsa075_u:99_7: niranvayaniruddhaṃ hi pūrvapūrvavijñānaṃ kathamuttarottarāvasthāntaraṃ viśiṣṭaṃ janayet /
SA15bsa075_u:99_8: sarvathā kramabhāvibhiḥ pratyayairavasthitameva rūpaṃ śakyaṃ saṃskartum /
SA15bsa075_u:99_10: tasmāt pratyāvṛttibhāvyavastupratyayajaḥ saṃskāro vyutthānapratyayasaṃskāravirodhī yasyāsti tasyaivātmanaḥ prakṛṣṭo 'pi bhāvyasākṣātkāripratyayaheturitiyuktaṃ paśyāmaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:99_14: tathā hi yadi sākāraṃ vikalpavijñānaṃ svapratibhāsaniyatatvāt ekāgrameva tat kathaṃ vikṣipyate /
SA15bsa075_u:99_15: atha nirākāraṃ tathāpi vikalpakaṃ prati vikalpyaṃ bhinnameva /
SA15bsa075_u:99_18: na vikṣiptam / sarvathā nāsti kṣaṇikavādināmekamanekārthamavasthitaṃ cittaṃ yadekāgraṃ kartumiṣyate /
SA15bsa075_u:99_19: tadevamabhyāsānupapatterasarvajñavatyāṃ cittasantatau na ca vijñānaviśeṣaḥ sarvajñaḥ sidhyatīti /
SA15bsa075_u:100_0: nyāyabhūṣaṇakārastvāha / sarvajñānānāṃ nirālambanatve saṃvedanamātratve ca yogītarapratyayayoḥ ko viśeṣaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:100_1: śuddhāśuddhatvamiti cet / bhavatu nāmaivam / tathāpi caturāryasatyādiviṣayatvamayuktam /
SA15bsa075_u:100_2: na hi svātmamātravedanena caturāryasatyādikaṃ sākṣātkṛtamiti yuktamatiprasaṅgāt /
SA15bsa075_u:103_2: pratyakṣeṇāpi cakṣurdahanādikaṃ gṛhītvā bhāvanāprakarṣaparyante jātaṃ sthirataraṃ tadākāravijñānaṃ syāt,
SA15bsa075_u:103_4: astaṃ gataśca tadviṣayo 'vasthāntaraprāpto veti kathaṃ pramāṇopanītavastugocaratve 'pi saṃvādāśvāsaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:103_5: api ca yadā hālika eva havyāśanamanumāya bhāvanayā sphuṭayet,
SA15bsa075_u:104_1: abhedapakṣe na yogijñānaṃ nāma pratyakṣeṇa bhinnamindriyajñānenaiva saṃgrahāt /
SA15bsa075_u:104_10: api tu manovijñāne / tāmantareṇāpi sākṣāt kriyālābhe ca bhāvanāvaiyarthyamiti kāraṇābhāvādeva sarvajñapratihatiḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:105_0: atrābhidhīyate / yattāvat sarvapadārthasaṃvedanasya kāraṇaṃ kimindriyajñānamityādi valgitaṃ tatra bhāvanābalajaṃ manovijñānameva sarvapadārthagrāhīti pañcama evāsmākaṃ pakṣaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:105_5: tadasaṅgatam / tathā hi pratyakṣaśabdasya tāvadakṣāśritatvaṃ vyutpattinimittamarthasākṣātkāritvaṃ tu pravṛttinimittamiti pratipāditam /
SA15bsa075_u:105_6: Nibandh 17#) na ca bhāvanābalāvalambino manovijñānasyānakṣāśritatve 'pyarthasākṣātkaraṇe kaścidasti śaktipratighātaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:105_7: yathā hi cakṣrurindriyaṃ svasāmarthyānatikrameṇa yogyadeśasthamarthamapekṣya svavijñānajanane pravartate,
SA15bsa075_u:105_8: tathā sarvāvidyāparipanthibhūtārthabhāvanāsahitaṃ mana indriyamapi yogyadeśasthamarthaṃ prāpya svavijñānajanane pravartiṣyate /
SA15bsa075_u:105_14: tadavasthāyāṃ tu śrutinayanayoriva manaso 'pi kiyaddūreṇa viṣayasannidhivyavasthitika eva pramātuṃ kṣamaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:105_15: kevalametāvaducyate / yāvattena śakyamadhigantuṃ svākārārpaṇasamartha sahakāri vastu tāvaditarajanāsādhāraṇaṃ truṭyadrūpatayā tasya gocarībhavatīti /
SA15bsa075_u:105_16: ata evārthākāro vastuto na bhāvanāmātrajanita iti na visaṃvādaśaṅkāpi /
SA15bsa075_u:105_17: bhāvanayā punastadīyasantāne netra ivāñjanaviśeṣeṇa śaktiratiśayavatī kācidarpitā yatparajanāsādhāraṇadarśanamasya /
SA15bsa075_u:107_0: api ca, arthasya hi ālambanapratyayatvamindriyāpekṣatvena vyāptam /
SA15bsa075_u:107_2: na khalvindhanaviśeṣo dhūmaheturiti vināpi dahanaṃ sahasreṇāpi saṃskārairdhūmamādhatte /
SA15bsa075_u:107_4: na ca bhāvanābalena kasyacidatīndriyadarśitvaṃ sarvajñatvaṃ vā dṛṣṭamiti cet /
SA15bsa075_u:110_2: sati ca vyāptiśaithilye śaṅkāpi nyāyādāpatantī kena pratihanyate /
SA15bsa075_u:110_5: ataḥ kāraṇānupalabdhiḥ kāśikākārasya vyāpakaviruddhopalabdhiśca vācaspateḥ sandigdhavyatirekitvādanaikāntikī /
SA15bsa075_u:111_1: prasiddhānumānasya ca na kṣatirdṛśyatvopādherdhūmādeḥ pratyakṣānupalambhato vyāptigrahaṇāvirodhāt /
SA15bsa075_u:111_5: na catīndriyadarśitvaṃ sarvajñatvaṃ vādarśane 'pi niṣeddhuṃ śakyate,
SA15bsa075_u:111_8: kāraṇābhāvo 'pi adarśanamātrato na sidhyatīti tadavasthaḥ paribhavaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:112_1_0: ki bhāvanayā, tata eva tatsiddheriti / tadapyasaṃgatam / pramāṇāntaraṃ hyanumānam /
SA15bsa075_u:112_1_1: na ca caturāryasatyasvarūpe vastutattve niścite sākṣātkāramantareṇa kleśajñeyāvaraṇakṣatiriti
SA15bsa075_u:112_2: tattvasākṣātkāriṇi ca cittasantāne sati śakyasākṣātkriyamidamityanye 'pi niścayānantaraṃ sākṣātkriyāyai pravartyante,
SA15bsa075_u:112_3: tadupadiṣṭa svargasādhanaṃ cārthabhāvanayānusarantīti svargāpavargalakṣaṇaparārthasiddhaye ca bhāvanā saphaleti /
SA15bsa075_u:112_4: anyathā tattvāsākṣātkāriṇo lokānatikrāntasya vacanamanādeyameva syāditi kva parārthavārtāpi /
SA15bsa075_u:112_5: yacca kiṃ ca tatpramāṇamityādyārabhya tasmād bhūtamabhūtaṃ veti etatparyantena dharmādharmayoranumānāpravartanamuktam,
SA15bsa075_u:112_8: tadā tasya pratyakṣeṇāniścaye 'pi yathā viparyaye bādhakapramāṇabalena vyāptisaṃvedanaṃ tathā kṣaṇabhaṅgasādhanāvasare vyavasthāpitam /
SA15bsa075_u:114_3: Nibandh 19#) kasyacidasti / anumānena caikavyāvṛttiviśiṣṭe vastutattve 'vasite 'pi sarvātmanā spaṣṭavastutattvasākṣātkāri pratyakṣaṃ na gṛhītagrāhi,
SA15bsa075_u:114_5: na ca taduttarakālamityādi tu kāraṇānupalabdhidūṣaṇaprastāve prativyūḍhamiti /
SA15bsa075_u:115_0: yadapi vācaspatinā satyamityādinā punaḥ punaruttarottaramāśaṅkaya tat kimanumānena vahni vyavasthāpyetyādinā bhāvanābalajasyānumānapūrvakatve visaṃvādamupadarśyopasaṃhṛtam,
SA15bsa075_u:115_2: vyabhicārāditi / tadasaṅgatam / tathā hyayaṃ vahniviṣayenumānapūrvakabhāvanābalataḥ spaṣṭavahnipratyayaḥ kiṃ vahnerapyutpannaḥ,
SA15bsa075_u:116_0: prathamapakṣe visaṃvādaśca bahulamupalabhyate iti yaduktaṃ taddurbhāṣitam /
SA15bsa075_u:117_0_1: 'pi bhāvanārthābhyāṃ sākṣādutpannasya yogipratyakṣasyāpi visaṃvādasaṃbhava iti sthavīyasī
SA15bsa075_u:118_4: kevalamutpāda eva durāpaḥ / na hi vayaṃ pramāṇadṛṣṭavastubhāvanāsahitaṃ manaindriyamarthasvarūpagrāhijñānaṃ janayatīti brūmaḥ,
SA15bsa075_u:118_14: purastāttu bhāvite parisphurati tadarthāpekṣayā bhrāntiḥ prāsarpakasyevetyādyupahāsyamapyasya kṣatātmano durnītipūtigavībhakṣaṇādhmātajaradgomāyorudgāra iva satāmasahyaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:120_2: Nibandh 20#) cālambanapratyayā api ta eva yujyanta ityādirna punarvikalpanirmāṇapratibandhateti paryanto vyarthaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:120_12: ata eva kāminīpratibhāsasyāpramāṇatve 'pyapratyakṣatve 'pi sphuṭābhatvasya sādhyadharmasāmānyasya saṃbhavāt na viruddho hetuḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:121_10: bhavatu vā, tathāpi yogijñānasya tena saha tulyahetutvamasiddham /
SA15bsa075_u:121_12: yogijñānaṃ tu avidyāpratipakṣasarvavastutattvabhāvanāviṣayābhyāmutpannamiti mahāntamapi viśeṣamasau durmatiprapātapatito nāvagāhata ityupekṣaṇīyaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:122_0: nyāyaprakīrṇe tu mārgastāvat pramāṇapariśuddho na bhavatītyuktaṃ yat,
SA15bsa075_u:123_0: yaccāpi cetyādyārabhya yogijñānaṃ nirviṣayaṃ prasaktamityuktam tatra keyaṃ nirviṣayatā nāma /
SA15bsa075_u:124_0: na tāvatprathamaḥ pakṣaḥ kṣamaḥ / jñānasya nirākāratānupapatteḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:126_1: vyāvahārikasya sphuṭībhāvo 'pi bahirabhimatasya paryante vikalpopādeyakṣaṇasyaiva sphuṭasyodayaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:126_2: Nibandh 21#) viṣayastena sākṣātkṛta iti vyavahāraḥ kevalamarthādapyutpattau /
SA15bsa075_u:126_5: anātmakatve prakāśāyogāt / tadbhāvanaiva cārthabhāvanā, tatsphuṭībhāva eva bāhuasphuṭībhāvaḥ,
SA15bsa075_u:126_7: etena yat pāramārthikamityādi na sarvajñasiddhiritiparyantaṃ pratyuktam /
SA15bsa075_u:127_0: yaccāpi cetyādi na yuktaṃ paśyāma itiparyantena dūṣaṇamuktam,
SA15bsa075_u:127_1: tadapyasaṃgatam / tathā hi yādṛśa eva bhāvyagrāhī pratyayaḥ prathamo niranvayo niruddhastādṛśa evāpara utpadyata iti niyamaniścayakāraṇaṃ na kiñcidasti caṇḍadevatāsparśādanyat,
SA15bsa075_u:127_2: kṣaṇikatvāditi cet / nanu kṣaṇikatvaṃ sthāyitayā virudhyate na visadṛśotpādena,
SA15bsa075_u:127_3: taddhi prācīnaṃ niranvayanirodhe yathā sadṛśakṣaṇāntaramārabhate tathā svahetugatasāmarthyayogāt kāryotpādānumeyād yadi viśeṣaleśaviśiṣṭaṃ kṣaṇāntaramutpādayati,
SA15bsa075_u:127_4: tadā na kācit kṣatiḥ / na hi bhavata iva bhāvasyāpi kṣaṇikatāyāṃ pradveṣo nāma /
SA15bsa075_u:128_3: atha ca tattvasākṣātkriyālābhāt grāhakākārāvagraha saṃbhavāt(ca) vyāvahārikamapi vikṣiptamasti cittam /
SA15bsa075_u:129_10_0: tathā hi caturāryasatyasākṣātkāraprāptau nirāvaraṇāntaḥ karaṇasya kāruṇyātiśayāt
SA15bsa075_u:129_14: vastūnāmeva pratibhāsanāt / utpattisārūpyābhyāṃ vedyasthitiriti tu pṛthagjanāpekṣayā /
SA15bsa075_u:132_2: vartamānataiva syāt / atha svarūpasannihitaṃ jñānameva tadākāramiti nirālambanaṃ niyamena /
SA15bsa075_u:132_3: tadapi nāsti / yasmādasannihite 'pyarthe bhāvanābalāt taddeśakālākārānukāri vijñānaṃ kathamanālambanam /
SA15bsa075_u:134_0: yathā sa dṛṣṭaḥ śaradādikālayukta stathā tasya na bādhitatvam /
SA15bsa075_u:134_1: tatkālayuktastu na tena dṛṣṭa stathāpratītāvapi nāsti doṣaḥ //
SA15bsa075_u:135_0: jñānamātrasya tu tattvataḥ sphuraṇācca na vartamānatāprasaṅgaḥ saṅgataḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:135_1: tathā kṣaṇikatvapakṣe 'pi ekatvādhyāropasāmarthyānna vyavahārikaṃ prati pramāṇasya kācit kṣatiriti śāstre prapañcitam /
SA15bsa075_u:136_0: yadapi kiñcedamapi vaktumucitamityādyārabhya bhāvanābalajasyānumānapūrvakatve 'pi pratyakṣapūrvakatve 'pi vyabhicārābhidhānam,
SA15bsa075_u:137_2: na deśakālavastuviśeṣamapāsya sāmānyena sarvadikkālavartivastumātraṃ kṣaṇikanirātmakamityaniścaye mahāprayāsasādhyapuruṣāyuṣavyāpinyāṃ bhāvanāyāmeva pravṛtterabhāvāt /
SA15bsa075_u:137_3: na ca hāliko havyāśanamanumāya sphuṭīkarotiyena pratyakṣāntaratvaprasaṅgaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:138_4: paramapuruṣārthaviṣayatvābhāvādeva ca rasāyanādisaṃskārajasyāpi jñānasya na pratyakṣāntaratā /
SA15bsa075_u:138_7: adhyavasāyo hi pūrvaṃ durllabhaḥ idānīṃ tu bhāvanābalanirdalitāvidye cittasantāne so 'pīndriyajñānena janyata iti viśeṣaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:139_0: nanu yogino manovijñānendriyajñānābhyāṃ paśyata ākāradvayasphuraṇaprasaṅga iti cet /
SA15bsa075_u:139_2: atastāvākārāvapratimau kayā gatyā spharata iti ko nirṇetuṃ kṣamaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:141_0: sarvathā tu na yogijñānasya kṣatiriti siddham / tadevaṃ kāraṇānupalambhādapi na sarvajñatābhāvaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:142_0: nanu yadi nāma yuṣmadabhimatasyānumānasya na bādhakam,
SA15bsa075_u:144_0: jñeyatvāt, prameyatvāt, sattvāt, puruṣatvāt, vaktṛtvāt, indriyādimattvādityādi /
SA15bsa075_u:147_1: nihantuṃ hetavaḥ śaktāḥ ko nu taṃ kalpayiṣyati //
SA15bsa075_u:149_1: sadbhāvavāraṇe śaktaṃ ko nu taṃ kalpayiṣyati //
SA15bsa075_u:150_0: atrocyate / kimete jñeyatvādayaḥ sarvajñatvena sākṣādviruddhāḥ paramparayā vā /
SA15bsa075_u:150_2: sa ca sākṣād virodha parasparaparihārasthitilakṣaṇo vā,
SA15bsa075_u:151_0: na tāvadādyaḥ pakṣaḥ / yadvyavacchedanāntarīyako yasya paricchedastayoreva parasparaparihārasthitilakṣaṇo virodhaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:152_0: nāpi dvitīyo virodhaḥ / yasya hyavikalakāraṇasya bhavato yatsannidhānādabhāvastayoreva sahānavasthānalakṣaṇo virodhaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:152_1: na ca sarvajñatvaṃ prāk pravṛttamavikalakāraṇaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ yena paścājjñeyatvādisadbhāve nivartata iti syāt /
SA15bsa075_u:152_2: tathātve sati deśādiniṣedya eva bhavenna tu sarvathoccheda iti /
SA15bsa075_u:153_0: na ca paramparayā virodhaḥ / sa hi bhavan niṣedhyasya sarvajñatvasya vyāpakaviruddhatvāt,
SA15bsa075_u:153_2: kāraṇaviruddhakāryatvāt, kāryaviruddhakāryatvāt, svabhāvaviruddhavyāptatvāt, vyāpakaviruddhavyāptatvāt, kāraṇaviruddhavyāptatvāt, kāryaviruddhavyāptatvād vā bhaved /
SA15bsa075_u:153_3: tatra sarvajñatvasyāsattvāt, vyāpakakāraṇakāryāṇāmasiddhestadviruddhakāryavyāpyābhāvāt na prameyatvādayaḥ sarvajñatvena paramparayāpi viruddhāḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:155_1: ucyate / yathā māyākāro nirmitāśvādiviṣayaṃ vijñānaṃ nirviṣayatvena niścinvannabhrāntaḥ,
SA15bsa075_u:155_2: tadanyasmācca śreṣṭhaḥ, tathā bhagavānapi śuddhalaukikavikalpasammukhībhāve 'pi na bhrānto nāpi pṛthagjanasamāna iti /
SA15bsa075_u:159_0: tadapi nirastam, vikalpenaikasya kasyacidāmukhīkṛtvopadeśe 'pi nirvikalpena sarvamavabudhyamānasya vacanānāṃ sarvajñabhāṣitatvādeva /
SA15bsa075_u:163_8: viśvāsaśca na tāsu syātkenaitāḥ kīrtitā iti //
SA15bsa075_u:163_9: kinnu buddhapraṇītāḥ syuḥ kiṃ vā brāhyaṇavañcakaiḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:165_0: atha vā yathā cakrasyoparate 'pi daṇḍapreraṇāvyāpāre pūrvāvegavaśād bhramaṇam /
SA15bsa075_u:165_1: evaṃ bhagavati pratyastamitasamastavikalpajāle 'pi sthite yadi pūrvapraṇidhānāhitasatatānābhogavāhinī deśanā syāttadā ko virodhaḥ /

SA15bsa075_u:368_3: atha pārthivatvasya lohalekhyatvaniyatatvameva nāsti vajre vyābhicāradaerśanāt /
SA15bsa075_u:369_3: vyabhicārābhāvāt vā / prathame pakṣe vyabhicāro bhavatu mā vā vyabhicārādarśanādevāvyabhicāra iti niṣṇātaṃ pāṇḍityam /
SA15bsa075_u:369_4: atha dvitīyaḥ pakṣaḥ / tadā vyabhicārābhāvaḥ kuto jñātaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:369_5: adarśanāditi cet / tat kimadarśanamātraṃ dṛśyādarśanaṃ vā /
SA15bsa075_u:369_6: prathamamaśaktam / na hyadarśane 'pi vyabhicāro nāstītyabhidhātuṃ śakyate,
SA15bsa075_u:369_9: dvitīyaṃ cāsambhavi, kvacit kadācit kenacid vyabhicāradarśanasāmagryāṃ satyāṃ vyabhicāradarśanāt /
SA15bsa075_u:369_10: darśanasāmagryabhāve tu pratyayāntaravaikalyāt deśakālāntaravartitvād vā vyabhicārasya sa(rvaṃ) pratyupalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptatvābhāvāt /
SA15bsa075_u:369_12: prakārāntareṇa vā tadutpattilakṣaṇenāvyabhicāre vyabhicārānupalambha ityubhayathāpi vyabhicāropalambhanivṛttirastu /
SA15bsa075_u:369_13_1: vyabhicārād dhūme 'pi nāvyabhicāranibandhanamiti dhūmo 'pi tvanmate nāśvāsabhājanamiti
SA15bsa075_u:370_0: asmanmate tu pratyakṣānupalambhābhyāmekatra kāryakāraṇabhāvasiddhau na vyabhicāraśaṅkāsaṃbhavaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:372_0: nyāyāt na saṃśayapiśācāvasaraḥ / tadevaṃ bhūyodarśanādarśanābhyāmapi na vyāptisiddhiḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:373_0: tarhi sakṛt sapakṣāsapakṣayodarśanārdanābhyāṃ vyāpterniścaya iti caturtha eva pakṣo 'stu /
SA15bsa075_u:373_1: tathā hi kāryatvasya buddhimanmātrapūrvakatvenānvayo ghaṭādau dṛṣṭaḥ,
SA15bsa075_u:373_3: tataśca sakṛdanvayavyātireka siddhau vyāpteḥ siddhatvāt kuto 'naikāntikatā /
SA15bsa075_u:374_0: atrābhidhīyate / yadi buddhimatkāraṇakāryatvayorekatra pratibandhaḥ pramāṇapratītaḥ syāttadā ākāśādau buddhimannivṛttau kāryatvasya nivṛttiriti yuktam /
SA15bsa075_u:374_1: sa ca pratibandhaḥ tādātmyaṃ tadutpattiḥ svābhāviko 'nyo vā na sidhyati sādhakapramāṇābhāvādityanantaramevāveditam /
SA15bsa075_u:375_4: sa cākāśe grahītumaśakyaḥ / yathā tatra buddhimatkāraṇanivṛttistathā kāraṇamātrasyāpi nivṛttiḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:375_5: tat kasyābhāvaprayuktaḥ kāryābhāvaḥ pratīyatāṃ yena vyatirekaḥ sidhyati/
SA15bsa075_u:376_0: nanu satyamevaitat / yathākāśe buddhimatkāraṇanivṛttistathā kāraṇamātrasyāpi tatra nivṛttirna buddhimatkāraṇavyatirekānuvidhāyitvaṃ kāryatvasya niścetuṃ śakyate /
SA15bsa075_u:376_1: tathāpi ghaṭādau kāryatvasya buddhimatānyayadarśanādākāśe 'pi buddhimadabhāvaprayuktaḥ kāryatvābhāvaḥ pratīyate /
SA15bsa075_u:376_7: Nibandh 50#) ka evaṃ jānātu kiṃ buddhimadbhāve kāryatvasya bhāvo yadvā kaṭakuḍyādibhāve bhāva iti /
SA15bsa075_u:377_0: na ca pratibandhasādhakaṃ pramāṇaṃ svapne 'pyastīti caturtho 'pi pakṣaḥ kṣataḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:377_1: tadevaṃ buddhimatkāryamātrayorvyāpterasiddhāvadhikaraṇasiddhānta nyāyādyupādānādyabhijñaḥ sarvajñaḥ puruṣaviśeṣaḥ sidhyatīti pratyāśā durāśaiva /
SA15bsa075_u:378_0: yacca kriyāsāmānyasya pakṣadharmatāvaśāccakṣurlakṣaṇakaraṇaviśeṣasiddhiriti dṛṣṭānto darśitaḥ so 'pi sādhyā(bhi)nnaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:378_1: tatra hi rūpajñānānyathānupapattyā siddhasya kāraṇāntarasyaiva cakṣurindriyamiti nāmakaraṇāt /
SA15bsa075_u:378_5: tathaiva yadi tvayāpi buddhimatsāmānyāśrayamātrasya puruṣaviśeṣaḥ iti nāma kriyate,
SA15bsa075_u:378_7: paramārthato buddhimatsāmānyāśraye sarvajñatvādiviśeṣaścakṣurādiviśeṣavat sidhyatīti tatra vivadāmahe /
SA15bsa075_u:380_0: dṛśye tu sādhye vyabhicāra eva dṛśyaṃ na cenna vyabhicārasiddhiḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:380_1: sādhāraṇatvādatha vā vipakṣasandehataḥ sādhyamato na sidhyati //
SA15bsa075_u:382_1: yadetanmerumandaramedinīghaṭapaṭādisādhāraṇaṃ kāryamātraṃ sādhanamupanyastam yāvadasya buddhimadanvayavyatirekānuvidhānamekatra nāvadhāryate tāvad gamakatvamayuktam /
SA15bsa075_u:382_2: na ca tat svapne 'pi pratyetuṃ śakyam /
SA15bsa075_u:382_3: tathā hi kumbhakāravyāpāre sati mṛtpiṇḍād ghaṭalakṣaṇaṃ kāryamupalabhyatāṃ nāma /
SA15bsa075_u:382_4: na tu vyāpārāt pūrvaṃ ghaṭavatkāryamātrasya vyatirekaḥ pratyetuṃ śakyaḥ,
SA15bsa075_u:382_6: na ca yadvinābhūtaṃ yadupalabhyate tattasya kāryamatiprasaṅgāt /
SA15bsa075_u:382_8: kriyatāṃ buddhimadvyatireke kāryamātravyatirekastvekatrāpi pratipādyatāṃ yena vyāptisiddhau tṛṇādiriva śoṣabhaṅgāderapi buddhimadanumānaṃ syāt /
SA15bsa075_u:382_10: buddhimatpūrvakatvasyeva kāraṇamātrapūrvakatvasyāpi tatra saṃbhavāt kiṃprayuktaḥ kāryatvābhāva ityaparijñānāt /
SA15bsa075_u:383_0_1: viśeṣamupalakṣayāmo yanniṣṭhaṃ puruṣapūrvakatvaṃ vyavasthāpayāma iti tadapi prativyūḍham /
SA15bsa075_u:383_1: kumbhakārādyabhāve 'pi mṛtpiṇḍādau śoṣabhaṅgādikāryadarśanādabhūtvā bhāvalakṣaṇasya kāryamātrasya vyatirekāsiddhervyāpterabhāvāt /
SA15bsa075_u:384_0: nanu yadi kāryatvamātrasya na buddhimatā pratyakṣato vyāptigrahaḥ vyatirekābhāvāt,
SA15bsa075_u:384_1: tvayāpi tarhi kathaṃ kṛtakatvasyānityatvena vyāptiravadhāryata iti cet /
SA15bsa075_u:384_4: na ca tvayā viparyayabādhakapramāṇamabhidhātuṃ śakyata iti prāgeva pratipāditam /
SA15bsa075_u:385_1: iha khalu dve kāryatve / kāryamātram / viśiṣṭaṃ ca / tatrādyasya pratibandhāsiddheranaikāntikatvam /
SA15bsa075_u:386_3: yaddṛṣṭerakriyādarśino 'pi kṝtabuddhirutpadyate tatkāryaṃ sakalaprāsādādyanugataṃ bhūdharādivyāvṛttaṃ viśiṣṭamityabhidhīyate /
SA15bsa075_u:387_0: tathā cāha śaṅkaraḥ - kṛtabuddhiḥ kiṃ sādhyabuddhiḥ kiṃ vā sādhanabuddhiḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:387_2: sā bhavatyeva / athāgṛhītavyāptikasya, kimanyatrāpi sā bhavantī dṛṣṭā /
SA15bsa075_u:387_3: atha sādhanabuddhiḥ / tarhi svopagamavirodhaḥ, sarvasya bhāvasya kṛtakatvopagamāditi /
SA15bsa075_u:388_0: vācaspatiḥ punaratrāha - idamatra nipuṇataraṃ nirūpayatu bhavān kiṃ buddhimadanvayavyatirekānuvidhānaṃ viśeṣaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:388_2: yadi pūrvakaḥ kalpaḥ, sa buddhimaddhetukatvaṃ tanubhuvanādīnāmātiṣṭhamānairabhyupeyata eva /
SA15bsa075_u:388_6: ya eva hi ghaṭo 'nena buddhimadanvayavyatirekānuvidhāyī dṛṣṭaḥ,
SA15bsa075_u:388_7: sa eva kāryo na tu vipaṇivartī /
SA15bsa075_u:388_9: hantotpattimadghaṭādi buddhimadanvayavyatirekānuvidhāyīti anyadapitanubhuvanādikaṃ tathā bhavanna daṇḍena parāṇudyate ghaṭajātīyamutpattimadbuddhimatpūrvakamiti cet /
SA15bsa075_u:388_13: tat kiṃ kāryajātīyaṃ prāsādādi buddhimaddhetukaṃ na dṛṣṭam yenotpattimattanubhuvanādi tathā na syāt /
SA15bsa075_u:389_12: sandigdhavyatirekitvaṃ naiyāyikānāṃ niranuyojyānuyogo bauddhānāmadoṣodbhāvanaṃ nigrahasthānamiti tu pratipāditam /
SA15bsa075_u:389_16_0: tanna / tasya sarvatra sulabhatvāt / yadi sādhyadṛṣṭāntayorvaidharmyamātrāt sādhyāsiddhiḥ
SA15bsa075_u:390_0_0: tadayamatra saṃkṣepārthaḥ / yattāvat kāryatvamātraṃ tadevoktena krameṇa pratibandhasiddherbhūdharādiṣu
SA15bsa075_u:390_1: tadeva tu nāstīti punarvistareṇa pratipāditamiti tadapi sarvamanavadheyameva /
SA15bsa075_u:390_3: yacca viśiṣṭakāryatvaṃ vikalpya dūṣitaṃ tasyāsmābhiranabhyupagatatvāt taddūṣaṇāya prabandhaḥ prayāsaikaphalaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:390_7_0: tatra yadi nāma paṭasya prāsādādibhiḥ saha vastutvasaṃsthānaviśeṣayogitvakāryatvādibhirdharmaiḥ
SA15bsa075_u:390_7_1: sajātīyatvamasti tathāpi na tān dharmān buddhimatpūrvakānadhigacchati vyāvahārikaṃ
SA15bsa075_u:390_10: kiṃ tu yasyaiva ghaṭajātīya kāryaṃcakrasya vyatirekasiddhistasya buddhimadvyāptatvaṃ pratyakṣataḥ sidhyatītyuktam /
SA15bsa075_u:390_12: yadā tu prāsādajātīyakamapi buddhimaddhetukamekatra pṛthagavadhāryate tadā tajjātīyādapi buddhimatsiddhiḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:390_13: evaṃ tattajjātīyasarābodañcanaśakaṭapaṭakeyūraprabhṛteḥ kāryacakrād buddhimatpūrvakatvena pṛthak pṛthagavadhāritād buddhimadanumānamanavadyam /
SA15bsa075_u:393_0_0: iti / evaṃ ghaṭapaṭaparvatādīnāṃ kāryatvavastutvādibhirdharmaiḥ sajātīyatve 'pi avāntaraṃ
SA15bsa075_u:393_2_0: tathā hi śāstrasaṃskārarahitasya vyavahārapragalbhasya puruṣasya devakulajātīyakaṃ
SA15bsa075_u:393_3: tadanayordevakulaparvatayoḥ kāryatvādinā ekajātitve 'pi kṛtabuddhibhāvābhāvau na tayoḥ parvatadevakulatvalakṣaṇāvāntarajātibhedamanavasthāpya sthātuṃ prabhavataḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:393_4: jātibhede ca siddhe devakulajātīye vyāptergrahaṇāt na parvatajātīyasya,
SA15bsa075_u:393_5: na ca prāsādajātīyasya vyāptisiddhiriti na tato buddhimadanumānam /
SA15bsa075_u:393_6: yadā tu prāsādasyāpi pṛthag vyāptigrahaḥ tadā tajjātīyādapi buddhimadanumānamastu /
SA15bsa075_u:393_7: na kṣitidharādijātīyasya svapne 'pi vyāptigrahaḥ krīḍāparvatādernāmamātrābhede 'pi parvatādibhirekāntato bhinnasvarūpatvāt /
SA15bsa075_u:393_10: yaccātroktaṃ sādhyabuddhirapi yadi gṛhītavyāptikasya sā bhavatyeva /
SA15bsa075_u:394_2: kevalaṃ gṛhītavyāptikosmin viṣaye na saṃbhavatīti brūmaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:395_0: yadapyatra nipuṇammanyena vācaspatinā kathitaṃ tat kiṃ kāryajātīyaṃ prāsādādi buddhimaddhetukaṃ na dṛṣṭaṃ yenotpattimattanubhuvanādi tathā na syāt,
SA15bsa075_u:395_2: tadasaṅgatam / tathā hi bhavatu prāsādaparvatādīnāṃ kāryatvādinā sajātīyatvam /
SA15bsa075_u:395_3: tattu na vyāvahārikapratyakṣeṇa buddhimadvyāptaṃ pratyetuṃ śakyam,
SA15bsa075_u:396_2: avāntaraṃ tu ghaṭaprāsādādisādhāraṇaṃ kāryatvamātramasmābhirapi na svīkṛtameva /
SA15bsa075_u:397_1: nanu vādinā sādhane samupanyaste taddūṣaṇopanyāsamapāsya sādhyasvarūpavikalpanaṃ nāma naiyāyikamate niranuyojyānuyogaḥ,
SA15bsa075_u:397_3: tadetajjālmajalpitam / tathā hi sādhyasvarūpe 'pariniṣṭhite tadanusāriṇī pakṣasapakṣavipakṣavyavasthā kutaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:397_4: tadasiddhau cāsiddhatādayo doṣāḥ pakṣadharmatādayaśca guṇā na vyavasthitā ityuktam /
SA15bsa075_u:397_5: nedānīṃ hetordoṣa guṇakatheti mūkena prativādinā sthātavyam /
SA15bsa075_u:397_6: tasmāddhetudoṣopanyāsāyaiveyaṃ sādhyaniruktirityayameva vādī svamate niranuyojyānuyogadūṣaṇena nigrahasthānena nigṛhyata iti kimatra nirbandhena /
SA15bsa075_u:398_0: yadetat kāryatvaṃ sādhanaṃ kimanena viśvasya buddhimanmātrapūrvakatvaṃ sādhyate /
SA15bsa075_u:399_0: nanu sāmānyena vyāptau pratītāyāmapi pakṣadharmatābalād viśeṣasiddhiḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:401_1: na tu sarvaḥ / yena hi vinā pakṣasthaṃ sādhanaṃ nopapadyate sa viśeṣaḥ sidhyatu /
SA15bsa075_u:401_3: na ca girīṇāṃ tarūṇāṃ kāryatvaṃ karturekatvavibhutvasarvajñatvādikamantareṇa nopapadyate,
SA15bsa075_u:403_6: evaṃ bhūte buddhimati sādhye kutaḥ siddhasādhanam /
SA15bsa075_u:409_0: evamataḥ sādhanādupādānādyabhijñakartṛmātraṃ prasādhya tasya sarvajñatvasādhanāya vācaspatireva punarapīdamāha - bhavatu tāvadupādānādyabhijñakartṛmātrasiddhiḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:415_0: no khalu paramāṇubhedān kṣetrajñasamavāyinaśca karmāśayabhedānaparimeyānanyaḥ śakto jñātumṛte tādṛgīśvarāditi /
SA15bsa075_u:416_0: atrocyate / yāvanti dvayaṇukāni bhinnadeśakālasvabhāvāni kāryāṇi santi teṣu sarveṣveva kimeka eva buddhimān vyāpriyate /
SA15bsa075_u:416_1: aneko vā / yadvā svasvaviṣayamātropādānādivedinaḥ parasparavyāpārānabhijñā bhinnadeśakālasvabhāvāḥ pratidvayaṇukamanya eva buddhimanto vyāpriyante iti trayaḥ pakṣāḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:417_0: na tāvat prathamapakṣaḥ / deśakālasvabhāvabhinnānāṃ sarveṣāṃ dvayaṇukānāṃ karturekatvāsiddheḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:417_3: saditi liṅgāviśeṣāditi tu dṛṣṭānto 'smān pratyasiddha eva,
SA15bsa075_u:417_4: tasmād yathā mayā nānātvasādhanāya pramāṇaṃ vaktavyaṃ tathā tvayāpyekatvasādhanāya sādhanamabhidhānīyam /
SA15bsa075_u:419_0: yadapyuktam - ekatve tu na pramāṇāntaramanveṣṭavyamekasya karturabhāve bahūnāṃ vyāhatamanasāmityādi /
SA15bsa075_u:419_1: tadapi cintyatām / bahubhiḥ karaṇe yugapatkāryānutpattiriti kiṃ (#
SA15bsa075_u:419_3: ekasyaiva vā mahāvayavinaḥ / kṣitighaṭādirūpasya / tatra ekasminnapi kārye bahubhiḥ karaṇe utpattivirodhi (naṃ) na paśyāmaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:420_0: ye tvanantadeśakālasvabhāvabhedabhinnāsteṣu sutarāmevānekavyāpāraniṣedho 'sambhavīti dvitīyopi pakṣo vyudastaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:423_0: tṛtīyastu pakṣo yadi bhaved tadā svasvavyāpāraviṣayamātropādānādyabhijñatve 'pi naikaḥ kaścit sarvajñaḥ sidhyati /
SA15bsa075_u:423_1: na ca jñānaṃ sattāmātreṇa katipayātīndriyadarśanavat sarvārthagrahaṇaṃ yena tadabhedāt prastutaparamāṇūvat sarvasyaivāviśeṣeṇa grahaṇāt sarvajñatā syāt /
SA15bsa075_u:423_2: anumānato hi katipayātīndriyadarśane siddhe 'pīśvarasya tatkāraṇayogitvaṃ niścīyate /
SA15bsa075_u:423_3: na tu jñānasattāmātreṇa prakārāntareṇeti niścaya iti kutaḥ sarvajñatā /
SA15bsa075_u:424_0: nanvatīndriyaṃ paramāṇvādikaṃ jānato na kathaṃ sārvajñyamiti cet /
SA15bsa075_u:424_2_0: evameveti cet / hanta yadi nāma nyāyavihastena tvayā īdṛśo hastasamāracitaḥ sarvajñaḥ
SA15bsa075_u:424_2_2: paramapuruṣārthāvedino vā lokaiḥ prāmāṇikaiśca nāsya sārvajñyamanumanyate /
SA15bsa075_u:425_1: evaṃ ca karturekatvāsiddhau vyatirekyapi heturasamarthaḥ viśveṣāmekasya karturasiddhau tadupādānādyabhijñabhāvasyā siddhatvāt /
SA15bsa075_u:425_2: yaśca yanmātrakāraḥ sa tanmātropādānādyabhijño bhavanna sarvajñaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:425_8: Nibandh 57#) kevalamasiddhoddhāre 'bhimate viśeṣe siddhe 'pi naiyāyikasyāpi nābhimatasiddhiriti brūmaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:433_0: apohaḥ śabdārtho nirucyate / nanu ko 'yamapoho nāma / kimidamanyasmādapohyate / asmād vānyadapohyate / asmin vānyadapohyata iti vyutpattyā vijātivyāvṛttaṃ bāhyameva vivakṣitam /
SA15bsa075_u:433_1: buddhyākāro vā / yadi vā apohanamapoha ityanyavyāvṛttimātram iti trayaḥ pakṣāḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:434_0: na tāvadādimau pakṣau / apohanāmnā vidhereva vivakṣitatvāt /
SA15bsa075_u:434_1: antimo 'pyasaṃgataḥ, pratītibādhitatvāt / tathā hi parvatoddeśe vahnirastīti śābdī pratītirvidhirūpamevollikhantī lakṣyate /
SA15bsa075_u:434_3: yacca pratyakṣabādhitaṃ na tatra sādhanāntarāvakāśaḥ ityatiprasiddham /
SA15bsa075_u:435_0: atha yadyapi nivṛttimahaṃ pratyemīti na vikalpaḥ tathāpi nivṛttapadārthollekha eva nivṛttyullekhaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:435_2: tato yathā sāmānyamahaṃ pratyemīti vikalpābhāve 'pi sādhāraṇākāraparisphuraṇād vikalpabuddhiḥ sāmānyabuddhiḥ pareṣām,
SA15bsa075_u:436_2: tato nivṛttimahaṃ pratyemītyevamākārābhāve 'pi nivṛttyākārasphuraṇaṃ yadi syāt ko nāma nivṛttipratītisthitimapalapet /
SA15bsa075_u:436_3: anyathā asati pratibhāse tatpratītivyavahṛtiriti gavākāre 'pi cetasi turagabodha ityastu /
SA15bsa075_u:437_1: tathāpi yadyagavāpoḍha itīdṛśākāro vikalpastadā viśeṣaṇatayā tadanupraveśo bhavatu kiṃ tu gauriti pratītiḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:437_2: tadā ca sato 'pi nivṛttilakṣaṇasya viśeṣaṇasya tatrānutkalanāt kathaṃ tatpratītivyavasthā /
SA15bsa075_u:438_0: athaivaṃ matiḥ - yad vidhirūpaṃ sphurati tasya parāpoho 'pyastīti tatpratītirucyate /
SA15bsa075_u:438_3: tasmādvidhyākārāvagrahādadhyakṣavad vikalpasyāpi vidhiviṣayatvameva nānyāpohaviṣayatvamiti kathamapohaḥ śabdārtho ghuṣyate /
SA15bsa075_u:440_0: yattu goḥ pratītau na tadātmāparātmeti sāmarthyādapohaḥ paścānniścīyata iti vidhivādināṃ matam,
SA15bsa075_u:440_1: anyāpohapratītau vā sāmarthyādanyāpoḍho 'vadhāryate iti pratiṣedhavādināṃ matam /
SA15bsa075_u:440_3: na hi vidhiṃ pratipadya kaścidarthāpattitaḥ paścādapohamavagacchati /
SA15bsa075_u:440_8_0: yathā nīlotpale niveśitādindīvaraśabdānnīlotpalapratītau tatkāla eva nīlimasphuraṇamanivāryaṃ
SA15bsa075_u:440_8_1: tathā gośabdādapyagavāpoḍhe niveśitād gopratītau tulyakālameva viśeṣaṇatvādago 'pohasphuraṇamanivāryam /
SA15bsa075_u:440_11: anyathā yadi śabdādarthapratipattikāle kalito na parāpohaḥ kathamanyaparihāreṇa pravṛttiḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:441_0: yadapyavocad vācaspatiḥ jātimatyo vyaktayo vikalpānāṃ śabdānāṃ ca gocaraḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:441_1: tāsāṃ ca tadvatīnāṃ rūpamatajjātīyaparāvṛttamityatastadavagaterna gāṃ badhāneti codito 'śvādīn badhnāti /
SA15bsa075_u:441_2: tadapyanenaiva nirastam / yato jāteradhikāyāḥ prakṣepe 'pi vyaktīnāṃ rūpamatajjātīyaparāvṛttameva cet,
SA15bsa075_u:442_0: atha na vijātīyavyāvṝttaṃ vyaktirūpaṃ tathāpratītaṃ vā tadā jātiprasāda eṣa iti kathamarthato 'pi tadavagatirityuktaprāyam /
SA15bsa075_u:444_5: kiṃ tu gotvam / tāvatā ca sa eva doṣaḥ / gavādiparijñāne gotvasāmānyāparijñānāt /
SA15bsa075_u:445_0: tasmādekapiṇḍadarśanapūrvako yaḥ sarvavyaktisādhāraṇa iva bahiraghyasto vikalpabuddhyākāraḥ tatrāyaṃ gauriti saṃketakaraṇe netaretarāśrayadoṣaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:446_2: parasparavyavacchedābhāvāt / sāmānādhikaraṇyasadbhāvāt / bhūtalaghaṭābhāvavat / svābhāvena hi virodho na parābhāvenetyābālaprasiddham /
SA15bsa075_u:446_3: eṣa panthāḥ śrughnamupatiṣṭhata ityatrāpyapoho gamyata eva /
SA15bsa075_u:446_6: sārthadūtādivyavacchedena panthā eveti pratipadaṃ vyavacchedasya sulabhatvāt /
SA15bsa075_u:446_7: tasmādapohadharmaṇo vidhirūpasya śabdādavagatiḥ puṇḍarīkaśabdādiva śvetimaviśiṣṭasya padmasya /
SA15bsa075_u:447_1: kathamapoho gīyata iti cet / uktamatrāpohaśabdenānyāpohaviśiṣṭo vidhirucyate /
SA15bsa075_u:453_0: na hi spaṣṭāspaṣṭe dve rūpe parasparaviruddhe ekasya vastunaḥ staḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:454_0: dūrāsannadeśavartinoḥ puruṣayorekatra śākhini spaṣṭāspaṣṭapratibhāsabhede 'pi na śākhibheda iti cet /
SA15bsa075_u:455_0: etena yadāha vācaspatiḥ - na ca śābdapratyakṣayorvastugocaratve pratyayābhedaḥ kāraṇabhedena pārokṣyāpārokṣyabhedopapatteriti,
SA15bsa075_u:455_4: kiṃ ca svalakṣaṇātmani vastuni vācye sarvātmanā pratipatteḥ vidhiniṣedhayorayogaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:455_7: astītyasamartham / asti cāstyādipadaprayogaḥ / tasmāt śābdapratibhāsasya bāhyārthabhāvābhāvasādhāraṇyaṃ na tadviṣayatāṃ kṣamate /
SA15bsa075_u:456_0: yacca vācaspatinā jātimadvyaktivācyatāṃ svavācaiva prastutyāntarameva na ca śabdārthasya jāterbhāvābhāvasādhāraṇyaṃ nopapadyate /
SA15bsa075_u:456_6: jātau bharaṃ nyasyatā svalakṣaṇavācyatvasya svayaṃ svīkārāt /
SA15bsa075_u:456_10: vyakteścet pratītisiddhiḥ jātiradhikā pratīyatāṃ mā vā,
SA15bsa075_u:457_0: etena yaducyate kaumārilaiḥ sabhāgatvādeva vastuno na sādhāraṇyadoṣaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:458_1: yaccedam - na ca pratyakṣasyeva śabdānāmarthapratyāyanaprakāro yena taddṛṣṭa ivāstyādiśabdāpekṣā na syāt,
SA15bsa075_u:458_5: tato yadi pratyakṣārthapratipādanaṃ śābdena tadvadevāvabhāsaḥ syāt /
SA15bsa075_u:459_0: nanu vṛkṣaśabdena vṛkṣatvāṃśe codite sattvādyaṃśaniścayanārthamastyādipadaprayoga iti cet /
SA15bsa075_u:460_4: vikalpastu svayaṃ niścayātmako yatra grāhī tatra kimapareṇa /
SA15bsa075_u:461_0_0: nanu bhinnā jātyādayo dharmāḥ parasparaṃ dharmiṇaśceti jātilakṣaṇaikadharmadvāreṇa
SA15bsa075_u:461_0_1: pratīte 'pi śākhini dharmāntaravattayā na pratītiriti kiṃ na bhinnābhidhānādhīno
SA15bsa075_u:462_2_0: evaṃ ca yathendriyapratyāsattyā pratyakṣeṇa dharmipratipattau sakalataddharmapratipattistathā
SA15bsa075_u:463_0: yacca vācaspati, na caikopādhinā sattvena viśiṣṭe tasmin gṛhīte upādhyantaraviśiṣṭastadgrahaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:463_2: na tūpādhayo vā viśeṣyatvaṃ vā tasya svabhāva iti /
SA15bsa075_u:463_5: na cāgnidhūmayoḥ kāryakāraṇabhāva iva svabhāvata eva dharmadharmiṇoḥ pratipattiniyamakalpanamucitam /
SA15bsa075_u:463_6: Nibandh 63#) tayorapi pramāṇāsiddhatvāt / pramāṇasiddhe ca svabhāvopavarṇanamiti nyāyaḥ //
SA15bsa075_u:464_3: upakāralakṣaṇaiva ca pratyāsattistadopakārakagrahaṇe samānadeśasyaiva dharmarūpasyaiva copakāryasya grahaṇamāsañjitam /
SA15bsa075_u:464_4: tatkathaṃ sūryopakāryasya bhinnadeśasya dravyāntarasya vā dṛṣṭavyabhicārasya grahaṇaprasaṅgaḥ saṅgataḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:464_5: tasmādekadharmadvāreṇāpi vastusvarūpapratipattau sarvātmapratīteḥ kva śabdāntareṇa vidhiniṣedhāvakāśaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:464_6: asti ca / tasmānna svalakṣaṇasya śabdavikalpaliṅgapratibhāsitvamiti sthitam /
SA15bsa075_u:465_1: saritaḥ pāre gāvaścarantīti gavādiśabdāt sāsnāśṛṅgalāṅgūlādayo 'kṣarākāraparikaritāḥ sajātīyabhedāparāmarśanāt sampiṇḍitaprāyāḥ pratibhāsante /
SA15bsa075_u:467_0: tadeva ca sāsnāśṛṅgādimātramakhilavyaktāvatyantavilakṣaṇamapi svalakṣaṇenaikīkriyamāṇaṃ sāmānyamityucyate tādṛśasya bāhyasyāprāpterbhrāntirevāsau keśapratibhāsavat /
SA15bsa075_u:467_2: asadeva vā tadrūpaṃ khyātu / vyaktaya eva vā svajātīyabhedatiraskāreṇānyathā bhāsantāmanubhavavyavadhānāt smṛtipramoṣo vābhidhīyatām /
SA15bsa075_u:468_2: tadevaṃ na śābde pratyaye jātiḥ pratibhāti /
SA15bsa075_u:468_3: nāpi pratyakṣe / na cānumānato 'pi siddhiḥ / adṛśyatve pratibaddhaliṅgādarśanāt /
SA15bsa075_u:468_4: nāpondriyavadasyāḥ siddhiḥ jñānakāryataḥ kādācitkasyaiva nimittāntarasya siddheḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:468_5: yadā piṇḍāntare antarāle vā gobuddherabhāvaṃ darśayet tadā śāvaleyādisakalagopiṇḍānāmevābhāvādabhāvo gobuddherupapadyamānaḥ kathamarthāntaramākṣipet /
SA15bsa075_u:468_6: atha gotvādeva gopiṇḍaḥ / anyathā turago 'pi gopiṇḍaḥ syāt /
SA15bsa075_u:468_7: yadyevaṃ gopiṇḍādeva gotvamanyathā turagatvamapi gotvaṃ syāt /
SA15bsa075_u:468_9: Nibandh 64#) gopiṇḍo gotvaṃ tu bhavatu mā vā /
SA15bsa075_u:468_10: nanu sāmānyapratyayajananasāmarthyaṃ yadyekasmāt piṇḍādabhinnaṃ tadā vijātīyavyāvṝttaṃ piṇḍāntaramasamartham /
SA15bsa075_u:468_11: atha bhinnam, tadā tadeva sāmānyam, nāmni paraṃ vivāda iti cet / abhinnaiva sā śaktiḥ prativastu /
SA15bsa075_u:468_12: yathā tvekaḥ śaktasvabhāvo bhāvastathānyo 'pi bhavan kīdṛśaṃ doṣamāvahati /
SA15bsa075_u:468_15: tathāsmākaṃ vyaktirapi jātinirapekṣā svarūpeṇaiva bhinnā hetuḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:469_0: yattu trilocanaḥ - aśvatvagotvādīnāṃ sāmānyaviśeṣāṇāṃ svāśraye samavāyaḥ sāmānyaṃ sāmānyamityabhidhānapratyayayornimittamiti /
SA15bsa075_u:470_1: na ca kvacit tadviṣaye tvapekṣā svakalpanāmātramato 'bhyupāyaḥ //
SA15bsa075_u:471_0: etena seyaṃ pratyayānuvṛttiranuvṛttavastvanuyāyinī kathamatyantabhedinīṣu vyaktiṣu vyāvṛttaviṣayapratyayabhāvānupātinīṣu bhavitumarhatītyūhāpravartanamasya pratyākhyātam /
SA15bsa075_u:472_2: na cānyannimittamityādi / tanna samyak / anuvṛttamantareṇāpyabhidhānapratyayānuvṛtteratadrūpaparāvṛttasvarūpaviśeṣādavaśyaṃ svīkārasya sādhitatvāt /
SA15bsa075_u:473_0: tulye bhede yayā jātiḥ pratyāsattyā prasarpati /
SA15bsa075_u:474_0: yat punaratra nyāyabhūṣaṇoktaṃ na hyevaṃ bhavati,
SA15bsa075_u:474_1: yayā pratyāsattyā daṇḍasūtrādikaṃ prasarpati kvacinnānyatra saiva pratyāsattiḥ puruṣasphaṭikādiṣu daṇḍisūtritvādivyavahāranibandhanamastu,
SA15bsa075_u:474_2: kiṃ daṇḍasūtrādineti / tadasaṅgatam / daṇḍasūtrayorhi puruṣasphaṭikapratyāsannayoḥ dṛṣṭayo daṇḍisūtritva pratyayahetutvaṃ nāpalapyate /
SA15bsa075_u:474_4: tad yadīdaṃ parikalpanīyaṃ tadā varaṃ pratyāsattireva sāmānyapratyayahetuḥ parikalpyatām,
SA15bsa075_u:475_3: yathā daṇḍijñānam / viśiṣṭajñānaṃ cedaṃ gaurayamityarthataḥ kāryahetuḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:477_1: svarūpavān ghaṭa ityādivat gotvajātimān piṇḍa iti parikalpitaṃ bhedamupādāya viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvasyeṣṭatvādagovyāvṛttānubhavabhāvitvād gaurayamiti vyavahārasya /
SA15bsa075_u:477_2: tadevaṃ na sāmānyasiddhiḥ / bādhakaṃ ca sāmānyaguṇakarmādyupādhicakrasya kevalavyaktigrāhakaṃ paṭupratyakṣaṃ dṛśyānupalambho vā prasiddhaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:478_2: tatra na buddhyākārasya tattvataḥ saṃvṛtyā vā vidhiniṣedhau,
SA15bsa075_u:479_1: bahireva hi saṃvṛtyā saṃvṛtyāpi tu nākṛteḥ //
SA15bsa075_u:480_0: etena yad dharmottaraḥ āropitasya bāhyatvasya vidhiniṣedhāvityalaukikamanāgamamatārkikīyaṃ kathayati,
SA15bsa075_u:481_0: nanvavyavasāye yadyadhyavaseyaṃ vastu na sphurati tadā tadadhyavasitamiti ko 'rthaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:481_2: apratibhāsāviśeṣe viṣayāntaraparihāreṇa kathaṃ niyataviṣayā pravṛttiriti cet /
SA15bsa075_u:481_3: ucyate / yadyapi viśvamagṛhītaṃ tathāpi vikalpasya niyatasāmagrīprasūtatvena niyatākāratayā,
SA15bsa075_u:482_1: niyataviṣayā hi bhāvāḥ pramāṇapariniṣṭhitasvabhāvā na śaktisāṃkaryaparyanuyogabhājaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:482_4: yenākāre bāhyasya bāhye vā ākārasyāropadvāreṇa dūṣaṇābakāśaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:482_5: kiṃ tarhi svavāsanāvipākavaśādupajāyamānaiva buddhirapaśyantyapi bāhyaṃ bāhye pravṛttimātanotīti viplutaiva /
SA15bsa075_u:482_7: sa eva cāpohaśabdavācyaḥ śabdānāmarthaḥ pravṛttinivṛttiviṣayaśceti sthitam /
SA15bsa075_u:483_3: nāyamasiddhaḥ / pūrvoktena nyāyena pāramārthikavācyavācakabhāvasyābhāve 'pyadhyavasāyakṛtasyaiva sarvavyavahāribhiravaśyaṃ svīkarttavyatvāt /
SA15bsa075_u:483_5: nāpi viruddhaḥ / sapakṣe bhāvāt / na cānaikāntikaḥ / tathā hi śabdānāmadhyavasitavijātivyāvṛttavastumātraviṣayatvamanicchadbhiḥ paraiḥ paramārthato
SA15bsa075_u:484_0: vācyaṃ svalakṣaṇamupādhirupādhiyogaḥ sopādhirastu yadi vā kṛtirastu buddhaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:486_0: tatra ādyantayorna samayaḥ phalaśaktihānermadhye 'pyupādhivirahāt tritayena yuktaḥ //
SA15bsa075_u:487_0: tadevaṃ vācyāntarasyābhāvāt viṣayavattvalakṣaṇasya vyāpakasya nivṛttau vipakṣato nivarttamānaṃ vācakatvamadhyavasitabāhyaviṣayatvena vyāpyata iti vyāptisiddhiḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:494_0: yat sat tat kṣaṇikam / yathā ghaṭaḥ / santaśvāmī vivādāspadībhūtā padarthā iti /
SA15bsa075_u:495_0: hetoḥ parokṣārthapratipādakatvaṃ hetvābhāsatvaśaṅkānirākaraṇamantareṇa na śakyate pratipādayitum /
SA15bsa075_u:496_1: yadi nāma darśane darśane nānāprakāraṃ sattvalakṣaṇamuktamāste,
SA15bsa075_u:496_2: arthakriyākārittvaṃ, sattāsamavāyaḥ, svarūpasattvam, utpādavyayadhrauvyayogitvaṃ, pramāṇaviṣayattvaṃ tadupalambhakapramāṇagocaratvaṃ,
SA15bsa075_u:496_4: yadeva hi pramāṇato nirūpyamāṇaṃ kadārthānāṃ sattvamupapannaṃ bhaviṣyati tadeva vayamapi svīkariṣyāmaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:496_5: kevalaṃ tadetadarthakriyākāritvaṃ sarvajanaprasiddhamāste tat khalvatra sattvaśabdenābhisandhāya sādhanatvenopāttam /
SA15bsa075_u:496_6: tacca yathāyogaṃ pratyakṣānumānapramāṇaprasiddhasadbhāveṣu bhāveṣu pakṣikṛteṣu pratyakṣādinā pramāṇena pratītamiti na svarūpeṇāśrayadvāreṇa bāsiddhisaṃbhāvanāpi /
SA15bsa075_u:497_0: nāpi viruddhatā,sapakṣīkṛte ghaṭe sadbhāvāt / nanu kathamasya sapakṣatvam, pakṣavadatrāpi kṣaṇabhaṅgāsiddheḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:497_3: na cānyadanumānamasti / saṃbhave vā tenaiva pakṣe 'pi kṣaṇabhaṅgasiddheralaṃ sattvānumāneneti cet /
SA15bsa075_u:498_0: ucyate / anumānāntarameva prasaṅgaprasaṅgaviparyayātmakaṃ ghaṭasya kṣaṇabhaṅgaprasādhakaṃ pramāṇāntaramasti /
SA15bsa075_u:498_2: Nibandh 68#) karoti / atītānāgatakṣaṇayorapi ki tāmevārthakriyāṃ kuryāt,
SA15bsa075_u:498_3: anyāṃ vā, na vā kāmapi kriyāmiti trayaḥ pakṣāḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:499_0: nātra prathamaḥ pakṣo yuktaḥ, kṛtasya karaṇāyogāt /
SA15bsa075_u:500_0: atha dvitīyo 'bhyupagamyate, tadidamatra vicāryatām / yadā ghaṭo vartamānakṣaṇabhāvi kāryaṃ karoti tadā kimatītānāgatakṣaṇabhāvinyapi kārye śakto 'śakto vā /
SA15bsa075_u:500_2: tatrāpi śaktatvāt / śaktasya ca kṣepāyogāt / anyathā varttamānakṣaṇabhāvino 'pi kāryasyākaraṇaprasaṅgāt /
SA15bsa075_u:500_5: athāśaktaḥ, tadaikatra kārye śaktāśaktatvaviruddhadharmādhyāsāt kṣaṇavidhvaṃso ghaṭasya durvāraprasaraḥ syāt /
SA15bsa075_u:501_1: śaktasvabhāvānuvṛttereva / yadā hi śaktasya padārthasya vilambo 'pyasahyastadā dūrotsāritamakaraṇam /
SA15bsa075_u:502_0: tasmād yad yadā yajjananavyavahārapātraṃ tattadā tat kuryāt /
SA15bsa075_u:502_2: tadevamekatra kārye samarthetarasvabhāvatayā pratikṣaṇaṃ bhedād ghaṭasya sapakṣatvamakṣatam /
SA15bsa075_u:503_0: atra prayogaḥ / yad yadā yajjananavyavahārayogyaṃ tat tadā tajjanayatyeva /
SA15bsa075_u:504_1_1: sakalakriyātikramakāle ca ghaṭe dharmiṇi parābhyupagamamātrataḥ siddhatvādasiddhistāvadasaṃbhavinī /
SA15bsa075_u:506_1: sākṣādajanake 'pi kuśūlādyavasthitavījādau vipakṣe samarthavyavahāragocaratvasya sādhanasya darśanāditi cet /
SA15bsa075_u:506_2: na / dvividho hi samarthavyavahāraḥ - pāramārthika aupacārikaśca /
SA15bsa075_u:506_3: tatra yatpāramārthikaṃ jananaprayuktaṃ jananavyavahāragocaratvaṃ tadiha sādhanatvenopāttam /
SA15bsa075_u:506_4: tasya ca kuśūlādyavasthitabījādau kāraṇakāraṇatvādaupacārikajananavyavahāraviṣayabhūte saṃbhavābhāvāt kutaḥ sādhāraṇānaikāntikatā /
SA15bsa075_u:507_3: tathā hīdaṃ jananavyavahāragocaratvaṃ niyataviṣayatvena vyāptamiti sarvajanānubhavaprasiddham /
SA15bsa075_u:508_0: yadi ca jananamantareṇāpi jananavyavahāragocaratvaṃ syāt tadā sarvasya sarvatra jananavyavahāra ityaniyamaḥ syāt /
SA15bsa075_u:508_1: niyataścāyaṃ pratītaḥ / tato jananābhāve vipakṣe niyataviṣayatvasya vyāpakasya nivṛttau nivartamānaṃ jananavyavahāragocaratvaṃ janana eva viśrāmyatīti vyāptisiddheranavadyo hetuḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:508_2: na caiṣa ghaṭo varttamānakāryakaraṇakṣaṇe sakalakriyātikramaṇe cātītānāgatakṣaṇabhāvi kārya janayati /
SA15bsa075_u:509_0: atrāpi prayogaḥ / yad yadā yanna karoti na tattadā tatra samarthavyavahārayogyam /
SA15bsa075_u:509_2: na karoti caiṣā ghaṭo vartamānakṣaṇabhāvikāryakaraṇakāle sakalakriyātikramakāle cātītānāgatakṣaṇabhāvi kāryamitivyāpakānupalabdhirbhinatti samarthakṣaṇādasamarthakṣaṇam /
SA15bsa075_u:512_0: na cānaikāntikatā, pūrvoktena nyāyena samarthavyavahāragocaratvajanakatvayorvidhibhūtayoḥ sarvopasaṃhāravatyā vyāpteḥ prasādhanāt /
SA15bsa075_u:513_0: yat punaratroktam, yad yadā yanna karoti na tattadā tatra samarthamityatra kaḥ karotyarthaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:513_2: ahosvit kāryāvyabhicāraḥ / kāryasaṃbandho veti / tatra kāraṇatvameva karotyarthaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:514_0: na cātra pakṣe kāraṇatvasāmarthyayoḥ paryāyatvena vyāpakānupalambhasya sādhyāviśiṣṭatvamabhidhātumucitam,
SA15bsa075_u:515_0: tadevaṃ prasaṅgaprasaṅgaviparyayahetudvayabalato ghaṭe dṛṣṭānte kṣaṇabhaṅgaḥ siddhaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:515_1: tat kathaṃ sattvādanyadanumānaṃ dṛṣṭānte kṣaṇabhaṅgasādhakaṃ nāstītyucyate /
SA15bsa075_u:516_2: astu, ko doṣaḥ / yo hi pratipattā prativastu yad yadā yajjananavyavahārayogyaṃ tattadā tajjanayati ityādikamupanyasitumanalasastasya tata eva kṣaṇabhaṅgasiddhiḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:516_3_0: yastu prativastu tannyāyopanyāsaprayāsabhīruḥ sa khalvekatra dharmiṇi yad yadā yajjananavyavahārayogyaṃ
SA15bsa075_u:516_5_1: bheda eveti kṣaṇabhaṅgitayā sapakṣatāmāvahati ghaṭe sattvaheturupalabhyamāno na viruddhaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:517_0: na cāyamanaikāntikaḥ, atraiva sādharmyavati dṛṣṭānte sarvopasaṃhāravatyā vyāpteḥ prasādhanāt /
SA15bsa075_u:517_5: tathā hi uktametad vartamānakṣaṇabhāvikāryakaraṇakāle 'tītānāgatakṣaṇabhāvikārye 'pi ghaṭasya śaktisaṃbhave tadānīmeva tatkaraṇam /
SA15bsa075_u:517_6: akaraṇe ca śaktāśaktasvabhāvatayā pratikṣaṇaṃ bheda iti kṣaṇikatvena vyāptaiva sā arthakriyāśaktiḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:518_0: nanvevamanvayamātramastu / vipakṣāt punarekāntena vyāvṛttiriti kuto labhyata iti cet /
SA15bsa075_u:518_2: na / dvividhā hi vyāptisiddhiḥ / anvayarūpā ca kartṛdharmaḥ sādhanadharmavati dharmiṇi sādhyadharmasyāvaśyambhāvo yaḥ,
SA15bsa075_u:518_5_0: anyathaikasyā evāsiddheḥ / tasmād yathā viparyaye bādhakapramāṇabalāt niyamavati
SA15bsa075_u:518_5_1: vyatireke siddhe 'nvayaviṣayaḥ saṃśayaḥ pūrvaṃ sthito 'pi paścāt parigalati tato
SA15bsa075_u:518_5_3: niyamavatyanvaye siddhe vyatirekaviṣaye pūrvaṃ sthito 'pi sandehaḥ paścāt parigalatyeva /
SA15bsa075_u:519_2: sādhane sati sādhyasyāvaśyamanvayo veti na kaścidarthabhedaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:520_3: tasya bhāvitvāt / na ca kāryabuddhyākāraṇam, tasyātītatvāt / na ca vartamānagrāhiṇā jñānenātītānāgatayorgrahaṇam,
SA15bsa075_u:520_4: atiprasaṅgāt / na ca pūrvāparayoḥ kālayorekaḥ pratisandhātā asti,
SA15bsa075_u:520_5: kṣaṇabhaṅgabhaṅgaprasaṅgāt / kāraṇābhāve tu kāryābhāvapratītiḥ svasaṃvedanavādino manorathasyāpyaviṣayaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:520_7: tābhyāṃ vāsanā, tayā ca hetūphalāvasāyo vikalpa iti cet tadayuktam /
SA15bsa075_u:521_1: na prathamaḥ pakṣaḥ / ekasya pratisandhāturabhāve pūrvāparagrahaṇayorayogāt /
SA15bsa075_u:521_2: vikalpavāsanāyā evābhāvāt / nāpi dvitīyaḥ / marīcikāyāmapi jalavijñānasya prāmāṇyaprasaṅgāt /
SA15bsa075_u:522_1: tathā hi bījādīnāṃ sāmarthyaṃ bījādijñānāt tatkāryādaṅkurādervā niścetavyam /
SA15bsa075_u:522_3: vastutvaṃ ca kāryāntarāt / kāryāntarasyāpi kāryatvaṃ vastutvasiddhau /
SA15bsa075_u:524_0: nanu kāryatvasattvayorbhinnavyāvṛttikatvāt sattāsiddhāvapi kāryatvasiddhau kā kṣatiriti cet /
SA15bsa075_u:524_1: tadasaṅgatam / satyapi kāryatvasattvayorvyāvṛttibhede sattāsiddho kutaḥ kāryatvasiddhiḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:524_3: bhavanaṃ ca sattā / sattā ca saugatānāṃ sāmarthyameva /
SA15bsa075_u:524_7: sattvaṃ ca sāmarthyam / tacca sandigdhamiti kutaḥ kāryatvasiddhiḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:524_8: tadasiddhau pūrvasya sāmarthyaṃ na sidhyatīti sandigdhāsiddho hetuḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:525_0: tathā viruddho 'pyayam / tathā hi kṣaṇikatve sati na tāvadajātasyānanvayaniruddhasya vā kāryārambhakatvaṃ saṃbhavati /
SA15bsa075_u:525_1: na ca niṣpannasya tāvān kṣaṇo 'sti yamupādāya kasmaicit kāryāya vyāpāryeti /
SA15bsa075_u:525_3: atha vā vikalpena yadupanīyate tat sarvamavastu /
SA15bsa075_u:525_5: yadvā sarvasyaiva hetoḥ kṣaṇikatve sādhye viruddhatvaṃ deśakālāntarānanugame sādhyasādhanabhāvābhāvāt /
SA15bsa075_u:525_6: anugame ca nānākālamekamakṣaṇikaṃ kṣaṇikatvena virudhyata iti /
SA15bsa075_u:527_0: atrocyate / yattāvaduktaṃ sāmarthyaṃ na pratīyata iti,
SA15bsa075_u:528_1: anyathā yenaiva vacanena sāmarthyaṃ nāstīti pratipādyate tasyaiva tatpratipādanasāmarthyamavyāhatamāyātam /
SA15bsa075_u:528_3: tadasvīkāre tu na kaścit kvacit pravarteteti nirīhaṃ jagajjāyeta /
SA15bsa075_u:529_0: atha dvitīyaḥ pakṣaḥ / tadāsti tāvat sāmarthyapratītiḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:529_1: sā ca kṣaṇikatve yadi nopapadyate tadā viruddhaṃ vaktumucitam /
SA15bsa075_u:529_4: tathā hi kāraṇagrāhijñānopādeyabhūtena kāryagrāhiṇā jñānena tadarpitasaṃskāragarbheṇa asya bhāve asya bhāva ityanvayaniścayo janyate /
SA15bsa075_u:529_5: tathā kāraṇāpekṣayā bhūtalakaivalyagrāhijñānopādeyabhūtena kāryāpekṣayā bhūtalakaivalyagrāhiṇā jñānena tadarpitasaṃskāragarbheṇa asyābhāve asyābhāva iti vyatirekaniścayo janyate /
SA15bsa075_u:533_3: kiṃ tu yatra pramāṇapratītebījādau vastubhūte dharmiṇi pramāṇapratītaṃ sāmarthyaṃ tatra kṣaṇabhaṅgaprasādhanāya /
SA15bsa075_u:533_8: Nibandh 73#) 'pi paṭupratyakṣabalāvalambitavastubhāve 'ṅkurādau kāryatvamupalabhyamānaṃ bījādeḥ sāmarthyamupasthāpayatīti nāsiddhidoṣāvakāśaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:534_1: yato viruddhatā syāt / kṣaṇikatvaniyataprāgbhāvitvalakṣaṇakāraṇatvayorvirodhābhāvāt kṣaṇamātrasthāyino 'pi sāmarthyasaṃbhavāditi nādimo virodhaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:534_3: avastuno vastuno vā svākārasya grāhyatvepi adhyavaseyavastvapekṣayaiva sarvatra prāmāṇyapratipādanād vastusvabhāvasyaiva kṣaṇikatvasya siddhiriti kva virodhaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:535_0: yacca gṛhyate yaccādhyavasīyate te dve apyanyanivṛttī na vastunī,
SA15bsa075_u:536_1: nānākālasyaikasya vastuno vastuto 'saṃbhave 'pi sarvadeśakālavartinoratadrūpaparāvṛttayoreva sādhyasādhanayoḥ pratyakṣeṇa vyāptigrahaṇāt /
SA15bsa075_u:536_3: sakalātadrūpaparāvṛttaṃ vastumātraṃ sākṣādasphuraṇāt pratyakṣasya grāhyo viṣayo mā bhūt,
SA15bsa075_u:538_0: nādyo vikalpaḥ, sāmānyasya bādhyatvāt / abādhyatve 'pyadṛśyatvāt / dṛśyatve 'pi puruṣārthānupayogitayā tasyānumeyatvāyogāt /
SA15bsa075_u:540_0: antime tu vikalpadvaye sāmānyādhāratayā dṛṣṭa eva viśeṣaḥ sāmānyasya viśeṣyo viśeṣaṇaṃ vā karttavyaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:541_1: nāpi dvitīyaḥ, adṛṣṭatvāt / na ca tṛtīyaḥ, prastutaikaviśeṣadarśane 'pi deśakālāntaravartināṃ viśeṣāṇāmadarśanāt /
SA15bsa075_u:542_1: sadṛśasāmagrīprasūtatvāt, sadṛśakāryakāritvāditi pratyāsattyā ekaviśeṣagrāhakaṃ pratyakṣamatadrūpaparāvṛttamātre niścayaṃ janayadatadrūpaparāvṛttaviśeṣamātrasya vyavasthāpakam /
SA15bsa075_u:542_2: yathaikasāmagrīpratibaddharūpamātragrāhakaṃ pratyakṣaṃṃ ghaṭe niścayaṃ janayad ghaṭagrāhakaṃ vyavasthāpyate /
SA15bsa075_u:542_3: anyathā ghaṭo 'pi ghaṭasantāno 'pi pratyakṣato na sidhyate,
SA15bsa075_u:542_5: yadyevamanenaiva krameṇa sarvasya viśeṣasya viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvavat vyāptipratipattirapyastu /
SA15bsa075_u:542_6: tat kimarthaṃ nānākālamekamakṣaṇikamabhyupagantavyaṃ yena kṣaṇikatva sādhanasya viruddhatvaṃ syāditi na kaścidvirodha prabhedaprasaṅgaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:543_2: nanu yadi prasaṅgaviparyayahetudvayabalato ghaṭedṛṣṭānte kṣaṇabhaṅgaḥ sidhyet tadā sattvasya niyamena kṣaṇikatvena vyāptisiddheranaikāntikatvaṃ nasyāditi yuktam /
SA15bsa075_u:543_3: kevalamidamevāsambhavi / tathā hi śakto 'pi ghaṭaḥ kramikasahakāryapekṣayā kramikāryaṃ kariṣyati /
SA15bsa075_u:544_0: na caitad vaktavyam / samartho 'rthaḥ svarūpeṇa karoti /
SA15bsa075_u:544_1: svarūpaṃ ca sarvadāstītyanupakāriṇī sahakāriṇyapekṣā na yujyata iti /
SA15bsa075_u:544_2: satyapi svarūpeṇa kārakatve sāmarthyābhāvāt kathaṃ karotu /
SA15bsa075_u:544_4: tadvaikalyaṃ cāsāmarthyam / na ca tayorāvirbhāvatirobhāvābhyāṃ tadvataḥ kācit kṣatiḥ,
SA15bsa075_u:545_1: tathāpi so 'pi tāvad bhāvaḥ svarūpeṇa kārakaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:545_2: tasya ca yādṛśaścaramakṣaṇe 'kṣepakriyādharmā svabhāvastādṛśa eva cet prathamakṣaṇe tadā tadāpi prasahya kurvāṇo brahmaṇāpyanivāryaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:545_3: na ca so 'pyakṣepakriyādharmā svabhāvaḥ sākalye sati jāto bhāvād bhinna evābhidhātuṃ (#
SA15bsa075_u:545_4: Nibandh 75#) śakyaḥ, bhāvasyākartṛtvaprasaṅgāt / evaṃ yāvad dharmāntaraparikalpastāvattāvadudāsīno bhāvaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:545_5: tasmād yadrūpamādāya svarūpeṇāpi janayatītyucyate tasya prāgapi bhāve kathamajaniḥ kadācit /
SA15bsa075_u:545_6: akṣepakriyāpratyanīkasvabhāvasya vā prācyasya paścādanuvṛttau kathaṃ kadācidapi kāryasaṃbhavaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:546_0: nanu yadi sa evaikaḥ kartā syād yuktametat /
SA15bsa075_u:546_1: kiṃ tu sāmagrī janikā / tataḥ sahakāryantaravirahavelāyāṃ balīyaso 'pi na kāryaprasava iti kimatra viruddham /
SA15bsa075_u:546_2: na hi bhāvaḥ svarūpeṇa karotīti svarūpeṇaiva karoti,
SA15bsa075_u:547_0: atrocyate / yadā militāḥ santaḥ kāryaṃ kurvate tadaikārthakaraṇalakṣaṇaṃ sahakāritvameṣāmastu,
SA15bsa075_u:547_1: ko niṣeddhā / militaireva tu tat kāryaṃ karttavyamiti kuto labhyate /
SA15bsa075_u:547_3: tasmāt sāmagrī janikā, naikaṃ janakamiti sthiravādināṃ manorathasyāpyaviṣayaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:548_0: dṛśyate tāvadidamiti cet / dṛśyatām / kiṃ tu pūrvasthitādeva sāmagrīmadhyapraviṣṭād bhāvāt kāryotpattiranyasmādeva vā viśiṣṭād bhāvādutpannāditi vivādapadam /
SA15bsa075_u:548_1: tatra prāgapi saṃbhave sarvadaiva kāryotpattirna vā kadācidapīti virodhamasamādhāya cakṣuṣī nimīlya tata eva kāryotpattidarśanāditi sādhyānuvādamātrapravṛttaḥ kṛpāmarhatīti /
SA15bsa075_u:549_5: vyāptau tu sākṣāt paramparayā kāraṇamātrāpekṣayā kāraṇe vyāpake 'yogavyavacchedaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:550_0: nanu yadi pūrvāparakālayorekasvabhāvo bhāvaḥ sarvadā janakatvenājanakatvena vā vyāpta upalabdhaḥ syāt,
SA15bsa075_u:550_5: parakālabhāvī janako yaḥ svabhāvo bhāvasya sa eva yadi pūrvakālabhāvī,
SA15bsa075_u:550_6: pūrvakālabhāvī vā yo 'janakaḥ svabhāvaḥ sa eva yadi parakālabhāvī tadopalabdhameva jananamajananaṃ vā syāt /
SA15bsa075_u:550_7: tathā ca sati siddhayoreva svabhāvayorekatvārope siddhameva jananamajananaṃ vāsajyata iti /
SA15bsa075_u:551_1: na tu kāryotpattihetuḥ / yasmād dvividhaṃ sāmarthyaṃ nijamāgantukaṃ na sahakāryantaram,
SA15bsa075_u:551_2: tato 'kṣaṇikasyāpi kramavat sahakārinānātvādapi kramavat kāryanānātvopapatteraśakyaṃ bhāvānāṃ pratikṣaṇamanyānyatvamupapādayitumiti cet /
SA15bsa075_u:551_5: tat kiṃ prāgapi paścādeva veti vikalpya yaddūṣaṇamudīritaṃ tatra kimuktamaneneti na pratīmaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:551_6: yattu kāryeṇaiva sahakāriṇo 'pekṣyanta ityupaskṛtaṃ tadapi nirupayogam /
SA15bsa075_u:551_7: yadi hi kāryameva svajanmani svatantraṃ syād yuktametat /
SA15bsa075_u:551_10: tathā ca sati santo hetavaḥ sarvathāsamarthāḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:552_0: atha kāryasyaivāyamaparādho yadidaṃ samarthe kāraṇe satyapi kadācinnopapadyata iti cet /
SA15bsa075_u:553_1: svatantraṃ kāryamevaṃ syānna tatkāryaṃ tathā sati //
SA15bsa075_u:554_2: vyatirekaprādhānyāditi cet / na / yadi hi svayaṃ bhavan bhāvayedeva hetuḥ svakāryam,
SA15bsa075_u:554_4: no ced yathā kāraṇe satyapi kārya svātantryānna bhavati,
SA15bsa075_u:554_5: tathā tadabhāve 'pi svātantryādeva na bhūtamiti śaṅkā kena nivāryeta /
SA15bsa075_u:556_0: tasmād yathaiva tadabhāve niyamena na bhavati tathaiva tadbhāve niyamena bhavedeva /
SA15bsa075_u:557_4: yo hi uttarakāryajananasvabhāvaḥ sa kathamādau kāryaṃ kuryāt /
SA15bsa075_u:558_0: atrocyate / sthirasvabhāvatve hi bhāvasyottarakālamevedaṃ kāryaṃ na pūrvakālamiti kuta etat /
SA15bsa075_u:558_2: kiṃ kurmaḥ / uttarakālameva tasya janmeti cet /
SA15bsa075_u:559_0: sthiratve 'pyeṣa eva svabhāvastasya yaduttarakṣaṇa eva karotīti cet /
SA15bsa075_u:559_1: hatedānīṃ pramāṇapratyāśā / dhūmādatrāgnirityatrāpi svabhāva evāsya yadidānīmatra niragnirapi dhūma iti vaktuṃ śakyatvāt /
SA15bsa075_u:559_5: syāt svavacanavirodhaḥ / yadā tu kāraṇasya sthiratve kāryasyottarakālatvamevāsaṅgatamataḥ kāraṇasyāpyuttarakāryajanakatvaṃ vastuto 'sambhavi tadā prasaṅgasādhanamidam /
SA15bsa075_u:559_7: uttarakāryajananavyavahāragocaratvaṃ ca tvadabhyupagamāt prathamakāryakaraṇakāla eva ghaṭe dharmiṇi siddham /
SA15bsa075_u:559_8: atastanmātrānubandhina uttarābhimatasta karyasya prathame kṣaṇe 'saṃbhavā deva prasaṅgaḥ kriyate /
SA15bsa075_u:559_9: na hi nīlakārake 'pi pītakārakatvārope pītasaṃbhavaprasaṅgaḥ svavacanavirodho nāma /
SA15bsa075_u:560_2: tathā hi bījamaṅkurādikaṃkurvad yadi yenaiva svabhāvenāṅkurādikaṃ karoti tenaiva kṣityādikaṃ tadā kṣityādīnāmapyaṅkurasvābhāvyāpattiḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:560_3: nānāsvabhāvatvena tu kārakatve svabhāvānāmanyonyābhāvāvyabhicāritvādekatra bhāvābhavau parasparaviruddhau syātāmityekamapi bījaṃ bhidyeta /
SA15bsa075_u:560_6: teṣāṃ ca svabhāvānāmanyo 'nyābhāvāvyabhicārādviruddhānāṃ yoge pradīpādikaṃ bhidyeta /
SA15bsa075_u:561_2: tathā bījasyāṅkuraṃ prati kārakatvaṃ gardabhādikaṃ pratyakārakatvamiti kārakatvākārakatve api viruddho dharmau /
SA15bsa075_u:561_4: tadevamekatra bīje pradīpe rūpe ca vipakṣe paridṛśyamānaḥ śaktāśaktatvādirviruddhadharmādhyāso na ghaṭāderbhedaka iti /
SA15bsa075_u:562_2: svabhāvānāṃ hyanyonyābhāvāvyabhicāre bhedaḥ prāptāvasaro na virodhaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:562_3: virodhastu yadvidhāne yanniṣedho yanniṣedhe ca yadvidhānaṃ tayorekatra dharmiṇi parasparaparihārasthitatayā syāt /
SA15bsa075_u:562_4: tadatraikaḥ svabhāvaḥ svābhāvena viruddho yukto bhāvābhāvavat /
SA15bsa075_u:562_7: pratyakṣavyāpāraścātra yathā nānādharmairadhyāsitaṃ bhāvamabhinnaṃ vyavasthāpayati tathā tatkāryakāriṇaṃ kāryāntarākāriṇaṃ ca /
SA15bsa075_u:562_8_1: vāviṣayabhedādaviruddhe tat kimāyātamekakāryaṃ prati śaktāśaktatvayoḥ parasparapratiyoginorviruddhayordharmayīḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:563_1: kevalaṃ yathā tadeva kāryaṃ prati kvaciddeśe śaktirdeśāntare cāśaktiriti deśabhedādaviruddhe śaktyaśaktī tathaikatraiva kāryakālabhedādapyaviruddhe /
SA15bsa075_u:563_2: yathā pūrvaṃ niṣkriyaḥ sphaṭikaḥ sa eva paścāt sakriya iti cet /
SA15bsa075_u:563_3: ucyate / na hi vayaṃ paribhāṣāmātrādekatra kārye deśabhedādaviruddhe śaktyaśaktī brūmaḥ,

SA15bsa075_u:564_4: sa ca sākṣātparasparapratyanīkatayā bhāvābhāvavad vā bhavet,

SA15bsa075_u:564_6: tadatraikadharmiṇi tatkālatat kāryakāritvādhāre kālāntare tatkāryākāritvasyānyakāryakāritvasya vā niyamena pramāṇāntareṇa bādhanādvirodhaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:564_7: tathā hio yatraiva dharmiṇi tatkālakāryakāritvamupalabdhaṃ na tatraiva kālāntare (#
SA15bsa075_u:565_4: na caivaṃ samānakālakāryāṇāṃ deśabhede 'pi dharmibhedo yukto bhedaprasādhakapramāṇābhāvāt /

SA15bsa075_u:566_1: vipratipannaṃ prati tu viruddhadharmādhyāsād bhedavyavahāraḥ sādhyate //
SA15bsa075_u:567_1: yathā hīdaṃ kramākramanivṛttāvakṣaṇikānnivṛttaṃ tathā sāpekṣatvānapekṣatvayorekatvānekatvayorapi vyāpakayornivṛttau kṣaṇikādapi /
SA15bsa075_u:567_2: tathā hi upasarpaṇapratyayena devadattakarapallavādinā sahacaro bījakṣaṇaḥ pūrvasmādeva puñjāt samartho jāto 'napekṣa ādyātiśayasya janaka iṣyate /
SA15bsa075_u:567_3: tatra ca samānakuśūlajanmasu bahuṣu bījasantāneṣu kasmāt kiñcideva bījaṃ paramparayāṅkurotpādānuguṇamupajanayati vījakṣaṇaṃ nānye bījakṣaṇā bhinnasantānāntaḥ pātinaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:567_4: na hi upasarpaṇapratyayāt prāgeva teṣāṃ samānāsamānasantānavartināṃ bījakṣaṇānāṃ kaścit paramparātiśayaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:567_8: hanta tarhi tadabhāve satyutpanno 'pi na janayedeva /
SA15bsa075_u:567_9: tathā ca kevalānāṃ vyabhicārasaṃbhavādādyātiśayotpādakamaṅkuraṃ vā pratikṣityādīnāṃ parasparāpekṣāṇāmevotpādakatvamakāmenāpi svīkarttavyam /
SA15bsa075_u:567_11: nāpyapekṣā yujyate, samasamayakṣaṇayoḥ savyetaragoviṣāṇayorivopakāryopakārakabhāvāyogāt iti nāsiddhaḥ prathamo vyāpakābhāvaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:567_12_0: api cāntyo bījakṣaṇo 'napekṣāṅkurādikaṃ kurvan yadi yenaiva rūpeṇāṅkuraṃ karoti tenaiva
SA15bsa075_u:568_0: nanu rūpāntareṇa karoti / tathā hi bījasyāṅkuraṃ pratyupādānatvam /
SA15bsa075_u:568_2: yadyevaṃ sahakāritvopādānatve kimekaṃ tattvaṃ nānā vā /
SA15bsa075_u:568_3: Nibandh 80#) ekaṃ cet kathaṃ rūpāntareṇa janakam /
SA15bsa075_u:568_6: abhede vā kathaṃ bījasya na nānātvaṃ bhinnatādātmyāt,
SA15bsa075_u:569_0: yadyucyeta kṣityādau janayitavye tadupādānaṃ pūrvameva kṣityādibījasya rūpāntaramiti /
SA15bsa075_u:569_1: na tarhi bījaṃ tadanapekṣaṃ kṣityādīnāṃ janakam /
SA15bsa075_u:570_0: yadi manyetānupakārakā api bhavanti sahakāriṇo 'pekṣaṇīyāśca kāryeṇānuvihitabhāvābhāvācca sahakaraṇācca /
SA15bsa075_u:571_1: kariṣyate ca kramavatsahakārivaśaḥ krameṇa kāryāṇīti vyāpakānupalabdherasiddheḥ sandigdhavyatirekamanaikāntikaṃ sattvaṃ kṣaṇikatva siddhāviti /
SA15bsa075_u:572_0: atra brūmaḥ / kīdṛśaṃ punarapekṣārthamādāya kṣaṇike sāpekṣānapekṣatvanivṛttirucyate /
SA15bsa075_u:572_2: atha pūrvāvasthitasyaiva bījādeḥ sahakāriṇā saha saṃbhūyakaraṇam /
SA15bsa075_u:572_6: karotyeva yadi syāt / svayamasaṃbhavī tu kathaṃ karotu /
SA15bsa075_u:573_0: tatastādṛksvabhāvasaṃbhave 'yakaraṇaṃ sahakāriṇi nirapekṣatāṃ na kṣamata iti cet /
SA15bsa075_u:573_2: sa cādyātiśayajanakatvalakṣaṇaḥ svabhāvaviśeṣo na samānāsamānasantānavartiṣu bījakṣaṇeṣu sarveṣveva saṃbhavī /
SA15bsa075_u:574_0: nanvekatra kṣetre niṣpattilavanādipūrvakamānīyaikatra kuśūle kṣiptāni sarvāṇyeva bījāni sādhāraṇarūpāṇyeva pratīyante /
SA15bsa075_u:574_2: ucyate / kāraṇaṃ khalu sarvatra kārye dvividham - dṛṣṭamadṛṣṭaṃ (#
SA15bsa075_u:574_5: tato bhavedapi kāraṇasāmagrīśaktibhedāttādṛśaḥ svabhāvabhedaḥ keṣāñcideva bījakṣaṇānāṃ yena ta eva bījakṣaṇā ādyātiśayamaṅkuraṃ vā paramparayā janayeyuḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:575_0: nanu yeṣūpasarpaṇapratyayasahacareṣu svakāraṇaśaktibhedādādyātiśayajanakatvalakṣaṇo viśeṣaḥ saṃbhāvyate sa tatrāvaśyamastīti kuto labhyamiti cet /

SA15bsa075_u:576_0: tadevaṃ nopakāro 'pekṣārtha ityanapekṣaiva kṣaṇikasya sahakāriṣu nobhayavyāvṛtiḥ //
SA15bsa075_u:577_1: tadā yadi pūrvasthitasyeti viśeṣaṇāpekṣā tadā kṣaṇikasya naivaṃ kadācidityanapekṣaivākṣīṇā /
SA15bsa075_u:578_1: nānapekṣā / tathā ca nobhayavyāvṛttirityasiddhaḥ prathamo vyāpakānupalambhaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:579_0: yacca bījasyaikenaiva svabhāvena kārakatve kṣityādīnāmaṅkurasvābhāvyāpattiranyathā kāraṇābhede 'pi kāryabhede 'pi kāryasyāhetukatvaprasaṅgādityuktam tadasaṅgatam /
SA15bsa075_u:580_0: yacca kāraṇābhede kāryābheda ityuktaṃ tatra sāmagrīsvarūpaṃ kāraṇamabhipretam /
SA15bsa075_u:580_2: na punaḥ sāmagrīmadhyagatenaikenānekaṃ kāryaṃ na kartavyaṃ nāma,
SA15bsa075_u:580_6: Nibandh 82#) dṛśyamarthadvayamekamevopalambhayatīti kvacidupalabdham yena tatrāpi bhede śaṅkā syāt /
SA15bsa075_u:582_0: tadetau dvāvapi vyāpakānupalambhāvasiddhau na kṣaṇikāt sattvaṃ nivartayata iti nāyamasādhāraṇo hetuḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:583_0: api ca vidyamāno bhāvaḥ sādhyetarayoraniścitānvayavyatireko gandhavattādivadasādhāraṇo yuktaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:585_0: tadevaṃ śaktasya kṣepāyogāt samarthavyavahāragocaratvaṃ jananena vyāptamiti prasaṅgaviparyayayoḥ satve hetorapi nānaikāntikatvam /
SA15bsa075_u:593_0: yat sat tat kṣaṇikam / yathā ghaṭaḥ / santaścāmī vivādāspadībhūtāḥ padārthā iti svabhāvahetuḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:595_0: na ca viruddhānaikāntikate, vyāpakānupalambhātmanā viparyaye bādhakapramāṇena vyāpteḥ prasādhanāt /
SA15bsa075_u:595_1: yasya kramākramau na vidyete na tasyārthakriyāsāmarthyam /
SA15bsa075_u:595_2: yathā śaśaviṣāṇasya / na vidyete cākṣaṇikasya kramākramāviti vyāpakānupalambhaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:595_3: na tāvadayamasiddho hetuḥ, akṣaṇike dharmiṇi kramākramasadbhāvāyogāt /
SA15bsa075_u:595_8: abhede hi prathama eva kṣaṇe śaktatvād bhāvino 'pi kāryasya karaṇaprasaṅge kathaṃ kāryāntarakaraṇe kramāntarāvakāśaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:600_0: yenaiva hi pratyakṣātmanā pramāṇenāparaprakārābhāvādvidhibhūtābhyāṃ kramākramābhyāṃ vidhibhūtasyārthakriyāsāmarthyasya vyāptiḥ prasādhitā,
SA15bsa075_u:600_2: na hi dahanādinā dhūmādervyāptisādhakapramāṇādaparaṃ dhūmādyabhāvena dahanādyabhāvasya vyāptisādhakaṃ kiñcit pramāṇaṃ śaraṇabhūtamasti /
SA15bsa075_u:600_3_0: tasmādvidhyoreva vyāptisādhakaṃ pramāṇamabhāvayorapi vyāptisādhakamiti nyāyasya duratikramatvāt
SA15bsa075_u:600_3_1: sattvābhāvena kramākramābhāvo vyāpta eveti nānaikāntika ityanavadyo vyāpakānupalambhaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:600_4: tadayamakṣaṇikād vinivartamānaḥ svavyāpyaṃ sattvaṃ nivartyaṃ kṣaṇike viśrāmayatīti sattvahetoḥ kṣaṇabhaṅgasiddhirapyanavadyā /
SA15bsa075_u:601_2: asyāpyanekadoṣaduṣṭatvāt / tathā hi na tāvadayaṃ prasaṅgo hetuḥ,
SA15bsa075_u:601_7: apratītatvādvā / pratītarhi pratyakṣeṇānumānena vikalpamātreṇa vā syāt /
SA15bsa075_u:602_0: prathamapakṣadvaye sākṣāt pāramparyeṇa vā svapratītilakṣaṇārthakāritve maulasādhāraṇo hetuḥ vyāpakānulambhaśca svarūpāsiddhaḥ syāt /
SA15bsa075_u:603_0: api ca, tat kalpanājñānaṃ pratyakṣapṛṣṭhabhāvi vā syāt,
SA15bsa075_u:604_1: kathaṃ bādhakāvatāraḥ / tṛtīye tu na sarvadākṣaṇikasattāniṣedhaḥ,
SA15bsa075_u:604_4: pañcame ca tadviṣayasyābhāvo na tāvat pratyakṣataḥ sidhyati,
SA15bsa075_u:606_2: tadvaikalyaṃ cāsāmarthyam / na ca tayorāvirbhāvatirobhāvābhyāṃ tadvataḥ kācit kṣatiḥ,
SA15bsa075_u:606_3: tasya tābhyāmanyatvāt / tatkathaṃ sahakāriṇo 'napekṣya kāryakaraṇaprasaṅga iti /
SA15bsa075_u:607_2: na kāryotpattihetuḥ / yasmāt dvividhaṃ sāmarthyaṃ nijamāgantukaṃ ca sahakāryantaram,
SA15bsa075_u:608_1: ataḥ prathamakāla evāśeṣāṇi kāryāṇi kuryāditi cet /
SA15bsa075_u:609_0: vācaspatirapi paṭhati / nanvayamakṣaṇikaḥ svarūpeṇa kāryaṃ janayati /
SA15bsa075_u:609_1: taccāsya svarūpaṃ tṛtīyādiṣviva kṣaṇeṣu dvitīye 'pi kṣaṇe saditi tadāpi janayet /
SA15bsa075_u:609_3: tasya tādavasthyāt / atādavasthye vā tadevāsya kṣaṇikatvam /
SA15bsa075_u:610_0: atrocyate / satyaṃ svarūpeṇa kāryaṃ janayati na tu tenaiva /
SA15bsa075_u:611_1: ye hi kāryamutpāditavanto dravyaviśeṣāsteṣāṃ vyāpārasya niyatakāryotpādanasamarthasya niṣpādite kārye 'nuvartamāneṣvapi teṣu dravyeṣu nivṛttārthādūnā sāmagrī jāyate /
SA15bsa075_u:611_3: na hi daṇḍādayaḥ svabhāvenaiva kartāro yenāmī niṣpatterārabhya kāryaṃ vidadhyuḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:611_4: kiṃ tarhi vyāpārāveśinaḥ / na ceyatā svarūpeṇa na kartāraḥ,
SA15bsa075_u:612_0: kiṃ ca kramākramābhāvaśca bhaviṣyati na ca sattvābhāva iti sandigdhavyatireko 'pyayaṃ vyāpakānupalambhaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:613_1: adṛśyatve tu nāsattāniścayo viprakarṣiṇāmiti na kramākramābhyāmarthakriyāsāmarthyasya vyāptisiddhiḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:614_0: kiṃ ca dṛśyādṛśyasahakāripratyayasākalyavataḥ kramayaugapadyasyātyantaparokṣatvāt tena vyāptaṃ sattvamapi parokṣameveti na tāvatpratibandhaḥ pratyakṣataḥ sidhyati /
SA15bsa075_u:615_3: kramākramābhyāṃ vyāptamiti tu bruvatā vyāpterevābhāvaḥ pradarśito bhavati /
SA15bsa075_u:615_4: na hi bhavati dhūmo vahnibhāvābhāvābhyāṃ vyāpta iti /
SA15bsa075_u:616_4: na ca dvitīyaḥ / yato vyāpakanivṛttisahitā vyāpyanivṛttirvyatirekaśabdasyārthaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:616_5: sā ca yadi pratyakṣeṇa pratīyate tadā taddhetuḥ syāditi sattvamanaikāntikam /
SA15bsa075_u:616_7: atha sā vikalpyate tadā pūrvoktakrameṇa pañcadhā vikalpya vikalpo dūṣaṇīyaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:617_0: kiṃ ca na bhūtalavadatrākṣaṇiko dharmī dṛśyate /
SA15bsa075_u:617_1: na ca svabhāvānupalambhe vyāpakānupalambhaḥ kasyacit dṛśyasya pratipattimantareṇāntarbhāvayituṃ śakyata iti /
SA15bsa075_u:619_4: pratiyogī cākṣaṇikaḥ pratīyamānaḥ pratītikāritvāt sanneva syāt,
SA15bsa075_u:620_0: saṃvṛtisiddhenākṣaṇikatvena virodhasiddhiriti cet / saṃvṛtisiddhamapi vāstavaṃ kālpanikaṃ vā syāt /
SA15bsa075_u:622_0_0: atha kālpanikam / tatra kiṃ virodho vāstavaḥ, kālpaniko vā / na tāvad vāstavaḥ, kalpitavirodhivirodhatvāt,
SA15bsa075_u:622_0_1: bandhyāputravirodhavat / atha virodho 'pi kālpanikaḥ na tarhi sattvasya vyatirekaḥ
SA15bsa075_u:623_2: hetoḥ svānubhavasya ca kṣatirataḥ kṣiptaḥ sapakṣo 'pi ca /
SA15bsa075_u:623_3: śūnyaśca dvitayena sidhyati na cāsattāpi sattā yathā
SA15bsa075_u:623_4: no nityena virodhasiddhirasatā śakyā kramāderapi // iti //
SA15bsa075_u:624_0: atrocyate / iha vastunyapi dharmidharmavyavahāro dṛṣṭo yathā gavi gotvam,
SA15bsa075_u:624_1: paṭe śuklatvam, turage gamanamityādi / avastunyapi dharmidharmavyavahāro dṛṣṭo yathā śaśaviṣāṇe tīkṣṇatvābhāvo bandhyāputre vaktṛtvābhāvo gaganāravinde gandhābhāva (#
SA15bsa075_u:624_2: Nibandh 88#) ityādi / tatrāvastuni dharmitvaṃ nāstīti kiṃ vastudharmeṇa dharmitvaṃ nāsti,
SA15bsa075_u:625_0: prathamapakṣe siddhasādhanam / dvitīyapakṣe tu svavacanavirodhaḥ / yadāhurguravaḥ
SA15bsa075_u:626_0: dharmasya kasyacidavastuni mānasiddhā bādhāvidhivyavahṛtiḥ kimihāsti no vā /
SA15bsa075_u:626_1: kvāpyasti cet kathamiyanti na dūṣaṇāni nāstyeva cet svavacanapratirodhasiddhiḥ //
SA15bsa075_u:627_4: tathā hyavastuno dharmitvaṃ nāstīti vacanena dharmitvābhāvaḥ kimavastuni vidhīyate,
SA15bsa075_u:627_5: anyatra vā, na vā kvacidapīti trayaḥ pakṣāḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:628_3: tṛtīyastu pakṣo vyartha eva nirāśrayatvāditi kathamavastuno dharmitvaniṣedhaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:628_5: vācakaśabdopanyāso vā vācyasvīkārapūrvakatvena vyāptastathāvastuno dharmitvaṃ nāstīti vacanopanyāso 'vastuno dharmitvasvīkārapūrvakatvena vyāptaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:628_7: tad yadi vacanopanyāso vyāpyadharmastadāvastuno dharmitvasvīkāro 'pi vyāpakadharmo durvāraḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:628_8: atha na vyāpakadharmaḥ tadā vyāpyasyāpi vacanopanyāsasyāsaṃbhava iti mūkataivātra balādāyāteti kathaṃ na svavacanapratirodhasiddhiḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:629_1: bruvan vā doṣamimaṃ parihartumiti mahati saṃkaṭe praveśaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:630_0: avastuprastāve sahṛdayānāṃ mūkataiva yujyata iti cet /
SA15bsa075_u:630_1: aho mahadvaidagdhyam / avastuprastāve svayameva yathāśakti valgitvā bhagno mūkataiva nyāyaprāpteti paribhāṣayā niḥsartumicchati /
SA15bsa075_u:630_2: na cāvastuprastāvo rājadaṇḍena vinā caraṇamardanādināniṣṭimātreṇa vā pratiṣeddhaṃ śakyate /
