SA15bsa075_u:630_3: tataśvātrāpi kramākramabhāvasya sādhanatve sattvābhāvasya ca sādhyatve sandigdhavastubhāvasyāvastvātmano vā kṣaṇikasya dharmitvaṃ kena pratiṣidhyate /
SA15bsa075_u:631_1: trividho hi dharmo dṛṣṭaḥ / kaścit vastuniyato nīlādiḥ / kaścidavastuniyato yathā sarvopākhyāvirahaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:631_4_1: sandehe 'pi vā vastudharmeṇa dharmitvamavyāhatamiti nāyamāśrayāsiddho vyāpakānupalambhaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:632_10: na hyabhāvaḥ kaścidvigrahavān yaḥ sākṣātkartavyo 'pi tu vyavahartavyaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:632_13: iṣyate ca taddharmitvapratiṣedhānubandhādityakāmakenāpi vikalpamātrasiddho 'kṣaṇika svīkartavya iti nāyamapratītatvādapyāśrayāsiddho heturvaktavyaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:633_1: na kaściddheturanāśrayaḥ vikalpamātrasiddhasya dharmiṇaḥ sarvatra sulabhatvāditi tadasaṅgatam /
SA15bsa075_u:633_2: vikalpamātrasiddhasya dharmiṇaḥ sarvatra saṃbhave 'pi vastudharmeṇa dharmitvāyogāt /
SA15bsa075_u:635_0: na caiṣa svarūpāsiddhaḥ, akṣaṇike dharmiṇi kramākramayorvyāpakayorayogāt /
SA15bsa075_u:635_1: tathā hi yadi tasya prathame kṣaṇe dvitīyādikṣaṇabhāvikāryakaraṇasāmarthyamasti tadā (#
SA15bsa075_u:635_3: samarthasya kṣepāyogāt / atha tadā sahakārisākalyalakṣaṇasāmarththaṃ nāsti,
SA15bsa075_u:635_5: na hi bhāvaḥ svarūpeṇa karotīti svarūpeṇaiva karoti,
SA15bsa075_u:635_7: yadā tāvadamī militāḥ santaḥ kāryaṃ kurvate tadaikārthakaraṇalakṣaṇaṃ sahakāritvameṣāmastu,
SA15bsa075_u:635_8: ko niṣeddhāḥ / militaireva tu tatkāryaṃ karttavyamiti kuto labhyate /
SA15bsa075_u:635_10: tasmāt sāmagrī janikā, naikaṃ janakamiti sthiravādināṃ manorājyasyāpyaviṣayaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:636_1: dṛśyatām, kiṃ tu pūrvasthitādeva paścāt sāmagrīmadhyapraviṣṭād bhāvāt kāryotpattiranyasmādeva viśiṣṭasāmagrīsamutpannāt kṣaṇāditi vivādapadametat /
SA15bsa075_u:636_2: tatra prāgapi saṃbhave sarvadaiva kāryotpattirna vā kadācidapīti virodhamasamādhāya tata eva kāryotpattiriti sādhyānuvādamātrapravṛttaḥ kṛpāmarhati /
SA15bsa075_u:637_2: vistareṇa ca pratyabhijñādūṣaṇamasmābhiḥ sthirasiddhidūṣaṇe pratipāditamiti tata evāvadhāryam /
SA15bsa075_u:638_1: na tu kāryotpattihetuḥ / yasmād dvividhaṃ sāmarthyaṃ nijamāgantukaṃ ca sahakāryantarama,
SA15bsa075_u:638_4: tathāpi tat prātisvikaṃ vastusvalakṣaṇaṃ sadyaḥ kriyādharmakamavaśyābhyupagantavyam /
SA15bsa075_u:639_0: na ca kāryaṃ sahakāriṇo 'pekṣata iti yuktam,
SA15bsa075_u:639_1: tasyāsattvāt / hetuśca sannapi yadi svakāryaṃ na karoti,
SA15bsa075_u:640_0: yaccoktam - yo hi uttarakāryajananasvabhāvaḥ sa kathamādau kāryaṃ kuryāt,
SA15bsa075_u:640_2: na hi nīlotpādanasvabhāvaḥ pītādikamapi karotīti tadasaṅgatam /
SA15bsa075_u:640_3: sthirasvabhāvatve bhāvasyottarakālamevedaṃ na pūrvakālamiti kuta etat /
SA15bsa075_u:641_0: kiṃ kurmaḥ, uttarakālameva tasya janmeti cet /
SA15bsa075_u:641_2: sthiratve 'pyeṣa eva svabhāvastasya yaduttarakṣaṇa eva kāryaṃ karotīti (#
SA15bsa075_u:641_3: Nibandh 91#) cet / na / pramāṇabādhite svabhāvābhyupagamāyogāditi na tāvadakṣaṇikasya kramikāryakāritvamasti /
SA15bsa075_u:642_0: kāryeniṣpanne tadviṣayavyāpārābhāvādūnā sāmagrī na niṣpāditaṃ niṣpādayediti cet /
SA15bsa075_u:642_1: na / sāmagrīsaṃbhavāsaṃbhavayorapi sadyaḥ kriyākārakasvarūpasaṃbhave janakatvamavāryamiti prāgeva pratipādanāt /
SA15bsa075_u:642_2: kāryasya hi niṣpāditatvāt punaḥ kartumaśakyatvameva kāraṇamasamarthamāvedayati /
SA15bsa075_u:642_4: na ca kramākramābhyāmaparaprakārasaṃbhavo yena tābhyāmavyāptau sandigdhavyatireko hetuḥ syāt /
SA15bsa075_u:642_9: tathātīndriyasya sahakāriṇo 'dṛśyatve 'pyayogavyavacchedena dṛśyasahakārisahitasya dṛśyasyaiva sattvasya dṛśyakramākramābhyāṃ vyāptiḥ pratyakṣādeva sidhyati /
SA15bsa075_u:642_10: evaṃ kramākramābhyāmarthakriyākāritvaṃ vyāptamiti kramākramayoranyonyavyavacchedena sthitatvādetatprakāradvayaparihāreṇārthakriyākāritvamanyatra na gatamityarthaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:643_6: evaṃ vaidharmyadṛṣṭāntasya hetuvyatirekasya ca vikalpādeva pratipattiḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:643_9: tadayaṃ vyāpakānupalambho 'kṣaṇikasyāsattvam sattvasya tato vyatirekaṃ kṣaṇikatvena vyāptiṃ va sādhayatyekavyāpārātmakatvāditi sthitam /
SA15bsa075_u:644_0: nanu vyāpakānupalabdhiriti yadyanupalabdhimātraṃ tadā na tasya sādhyabuddhijanakatvamavastutvāt /
SA15bsa075_u:644_3: yathā hi neha śiṃśapā vṛkṣābhāvādityatra vṛkṣāpekṣayākevalapradeśasya dharmiṇa upalabdhirvṛkṣānupalabdhiḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:644_4: śiṃśapāpekṣayā ca kevalapradeśasya dharmiṇa upalabdhireva rśiśapāyā abhāvopalabdhiriti svabhāvahetuparyavasāyivyāpāro (#
SA15bsa075_u:644_6: tathā nityasya dharmiṇo vikalpabuddhyavasitasya kramikāritvākramikāritvāpekṣayā kevalagrahaṇādeva kramikāritvākramikāritvānupalambhaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:644_7: artha kriyāpekṣayā ca kevalapratītirevārthakriyāyogapratītiriti vyāpakānupalambhāntarādasya na kaścidviśeṣaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:645_0: adhyavasāyāpekṣayā va bāhye 'kṣaṇike vastuni vyāpakābhāvād vyāpyābhāvasiddhivyavahāraḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:645_6: ayaṃ ca nyāyo yathā vastubhūte dharmiṇi tathāvastubhūte 'pīti ko viśeṣaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:645_8: yathā ca hariṇaśirasi tenaikajñānasaṃsargi śṛṅgamupalabdhaṃ śaśaśirasyapi tena sahaikajñānasaṃsargitvasaṃbhāvanayaiva śṛṅgaṃ niṣidhyate,
SA15bsa075_u:645_9: tathā nīlādāvapariniṣṭhitanityānityabhāve kramākramau svadharmiṇā sārdhamekajñānasaṃsargiṇau dṛṣṭau,
SA15bsa075_u:645_10: yadi nitye bhavataḥ, nityagrāhijñāne svadharmiṇā nityena sahaiva gṛhyeyātāmiti saṃbhāvanayā ekajñānasaṃsargadvārakameva pratiṣidhyate /
SA15bsa075_u:645_11: kathaṃ punaretasminnityajñāne kramākramayorasphuraṇamiti yāvatā kramākramakroḍīkṛtameva nityaṃ vikalpayāma iti cet /
SA15bsa075_u:645_12: ata eva bādhakāvatāro viparītāropa mantareṇa tasya vaiyarthyāt /
SA15bsa075_u:645_15_0: tato nityatvasya kramākramikāryaśakteśca parasparaparihārasthiti lakṣaṇatayā durvāro
SA15bsa075_u:645_15_1: virodha iti kathaṃ nitye kramākramayorantarbhāvaḥ anantarbhāvācca śuddhanityavikalpena
SA15bsa075_u:645_16: tataśca pratiyogini nitye 'pi vikalpyamāne ekajñāna saṃsargilakṣaṇaprāpte nityopalabdhireva nityaviruddhasyānupalabhyamānasya kramākramasyānupalabdhiḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:646_0: na tvetadavastu dharmitvopayogivastva dhiṣṭhānatvāt pramāṇavyavasthāyā iti cet /
SA15bsa075_u:647_5: tasyaiva nityavikalpasya vastuno dharmibhūtasya kramākramavadbāhyanityopādānaśūnyatvenārthakriyāvad bāhyanityopādānaśūnyatve prasādhanāt /
SA15bsa075_u:648_0: ayameva nyāyo na vaktā bandhyāsutaścaitanyābhāvādityādau yojyaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:648_1: etena yathā vṛkṣābhāvādirantarbhāvayituṃ śakyate na tathāyamiti trilocano 'pi nirastaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:649_3: tadvālasyāpi durabhidhānam / nityo hi dharmī / asattvaṃ sādhyam / kramikāryakāritvākramikāryakāritvaviraho hetuḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:649_5_0: tacca kramākrameṇa sattvasya vyāptisiddhau sattvasya vyāpyasyābhāvena kramākramasya
SA15bsa075_u:649_5_1: vyāpakasya viraho vyāptaḥ sidhyatītyabhāvadharmatvaṃ prāgeva vidhyorvyāptisādhanāt
SA15bsa075_u:650_0: na ca sattāyāmivāsattāyāmapi tulyaḥ prasaṅgo bhinnanyāyatvāt /
SA15bsa075_u:650_1: vastubhūtaṃ hi tatra sādhyaṃ sādhanaṃ ca /
SA15bsa075_u:650_5: asattāsādhane tvavastudharmo heturavastu vikalpamātrasiddhe dharmiṇi nāśrayāsiddhidoṣeṇa dūṣayituṃ śakyaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:650_8: vikalpollikhita ścāsya svabhāvo nāpara ityapi vyavahartavyam /
SA15bsa075_u:650_11: asti ca / ato yathā pramāṇābhāve 'pi vikalpasiddhasya (#
SA15bsa075_u:650_12: Nibandh 94#) bandhyāsutādeḥ saundaryādiniṣedho 'nurūpastathā vikalpopanītasyaivākṣaṇikarūpasya tata eva pratyanīkākāreṇa saha virodhavyavasthāyāṃ kīdṛśo doṣaḥ syāt /
SA15bsa075_u:650_13: yadi cākṣaṇikānubhavābhāvād virodhapratiṣedhastarhi bandhyāputrādyanubhavābhāvādeva saundaryādiniṣedho 'pi mā bhūt /
SA15bsa075_u:651_2: na hi virodho nāma vastvantaraṃ kiñcidubhayakoṭidattapādasaṃbandhābhidhānamiṣyate asmābhirūpapadyate vā yenaikasaṃbandhino vastutvābhāve 'pāramārthikaṃ syāt /
SA15bsa075_u:651_6: na bhāvo 'bhāvarūpamāviśati, nāpyabhāvo bhāvarūpaṃ praviśatīti yo 'yamanayorasaṃkaraniyamaḥ sa eva pāramārthiko virodhaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:652_0: nanu nityatvaṃ kramayaugapadyavattvaṃ ca viruddhau dharmau vidhūya nāparo virodho nāma,
SA15bsa075_u:652_1: kasya bāstavatvamiti cet / na / na hi dharmāntarasya saṃbhavena virodhasya pāramārthikatvaṃ brūmaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:652_3: anyathā virodhanāmadharmāntarasaṃbhave 'pi yadi na viruddhau dharmau kva pāramārthikavirodhasaṃbhavaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:652_4: viruddhauceddhamau tāvataiva tāttviko virodhavyavahāraḥ kimapareṇa pratijñāmātrasiddhena virodhanāmnā vastvantareṇa /
SA15bsa075_u:653_2: hetoḥ svānubhavasya ca kṣatirataḥ kṣiptaḥ sapakṣo 'pi ca /
SA15bsa075_u:653_3: śanyaśya dvitayena sidhyati na cāsattāpi sattā yathā
SA15bsa075_u:653_4: no nityena virodhasiddhirasatā śakyā kramāderapi // iti //
SA15bsa075_u:656_3: tataśca kṣaṇikākṣaṇikaparihāreṇa rāśyantarābhāvādakṣaṇikānnivartamānamidaṃ sattvaṃ kṣaṇika eva viśrāmyattena vyāptaṃ sidhyatīti sattvāt kṣaṇikatvasiddhiravirodhinī /
SA15bsa075_u:661_0: iha khalu pramāṇamātre na kecid vipratipadyante /
SA15bsa075_u:662_1: bruvatā niyataṃ kiñcit sādhyaṃ vā bādhyameva vā //
SA15bsa075_u:662_6: sādhyaṃ na kiñciditi ced bādhāyā api sādhyatā /
SA15bsa075_u:662_7: sāpi neti vaco vyarthaṃ praśnamātre 'pi kiṃ phalam //
SA15bsa075_u:662_11: saṃvṛtāvapi neṣṭaṃ ced vadan jetā yathā tathā //
SA15bsa075_u:662_12: saṃvṛtiśca vinā mānaṃ vāṅmātreṇa na sidhyati /
SA15bsa075_u:664_1: bhāvābhāvavyavasthāṃ kaḥ kartuṃ tena vinā prabhuḥ //
SA15bsa075_u:667_1: tacchāstre hi pratyakṣetarasāmānyayoḥ pramāṇetaravidhānaṃ lakṣaṇapraṇayanato vidhātavyam /
SA15bsa075_u:667_2: tacca lakṣaṇaṃ pratyakṣe dharmiṇi lakṣye prāmāṇye pratyetavye svabhāvo hetuḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:671_0: ityanumānamapi pramāṇam / prāmāṇyaṃ ca pramāṇāntarāgṛhītaniścitapravṛttiviṣayārthatayā tatprāpaṇe śaktiḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:672_2: kimidamarthadarśanam / arthasya dharmo dṛśyatvam / jñānasya dharmo draṣṭṛtvam / prathamapakṣe nīlatvavad dṛśyatvasyāpi sādhāraṇatvādekagocaro 'rthaḥ sarvagocaraḥ syāt /
SA15bsa075_u:672_4: dvitīyapakṣe tu kathamanyasmin jñānasvabhāve draṣṭṛtve satyanyasyāsamba(ddha)syārthasya pratyāśā syāt /
SA15bsa075_u:672_7: anabhyupagame draṣṭṛtvaṃ dṛśyatvaṃ ca na saṃbhavatīti kiṃ kenākṣipyatām /
SA15bsa075_u:672_8: bhavatu vā prakārāntareṇāpi draṣṭṛdṛśyabhāvastathāpi bhede satyavyabhicārastadutpattireva prāptinimittam /
SA15bsa075_u:672_9: sā ca prāpaṇaśaktiḥ pratyakṣānumānayoraviśiṣṭeti pramāṇe eva /
SA15bsa075_u:673_1: tathā hi śabdāccodanārūpādasannikṛṣṭe 'rthe svargādau yajjñānamutpadyate tadapi śābdaṃ jñānaṃ pramāṇameva /
SA15bsa075_u:675_0: tatra yadā śabdasamutthaṃ jñānaṃ pramāṇaṃ tadopādānādibuddhiḥ phalam /
SA15bsa075_u:675_1: yadā tu śabdastadā tadālambanaṃ jñānaṃ phalamiti /
SA15bsa075_u:677_4: Nibandh 98#) sākṣātkṛtaheyopādeyatattvo yathādṛṣṭasya cārthasyācikhyāsayā prayukta upadeṣṭā abhidhīyate /
SA15bsa075_u:679_1: pratiyogyantare dṛśyamānapratiyogisādṛśyaviśiṣṭatayaitatsādṛśyaviśiṣṭo 'sau ityasannikṛṣṭe 'rthe yāṃ buddhimutpādayati tadupamānaṃ pramāṇamiti /
SA15bsa075_u:679_2: yattadoradhyāhāra iti / tasmāt smaratīti smaraṇaṃ puruṣaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:679_3: tenāyamarthaḥ - yathā gavaye dṛśyamānaṃ sādṛśyaṃ gāṃ smarato manuṣyasya etatsādṛśyaviśiṣṭo 'sau gauriti buddhimutpādayatīti /
SA15bsa075_u:681_0: pratyakṣe 'pi yathā deśe smaryamāṇe ca pāvake /
SA15bsa075_u:681_2: pratyakṣeṇāvabuddhe ca sādṛśye gavi ca smṛte /
SA15bsa075_u:684_0: asyāyamarthaḥ / prasiddhaṃ sādharmyaṃ yasya tasmād gavayādeḥ sādhyasya saṃjñāsaṃjñisambandhasya sādhanaṃ siddhistadupamānaphalam /
SA15bsa075_u:684_2: ayamasya prapañcaḥ / yaḥ pratipattā gāṃ jānāti na gavayam,
SA15bsa075_u:684_4: gavayaśabdavācyamarthama jānāno vanecaramanyaṃ vā tajjñaṃ pṛṣṭavān,
SA15bsa075_u:684_5: bhrātaḥ kīdṛśo gavaya iti / tena cādiṣṭaṃ yathā gaustathā gavaya iti /
SA15bsa075_u:684_6_1: yad gavayasārūpyajñānaṃ tatprathamata evāsau gavayaśabdavācyo 'rtha iti pratipattiṃ
SA15bsa075_u:685_2: arthāpattirapi dṛṣṭaḥ śruto vārtho 'nyathā nopadyamāno yadarthāntaraṃ parikalpayati /
SA15bsa075_u:685_3: sārthāpattiḥ / yathā jīvati devadatte gṛhābhāvadarśanena bahirbhāvasyārthasya parikalpanā /
SA15bsa075_u:685_4: asyāyamarthaḥ / pratyakṣādibhiḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ pramāṇaiḥ prasiddhoḥ yo 'rthaḥ sa yena vinā na yujyate tasyārthasya kalpanamarthāpattiriti /
SA15bsa075_u:686_1: prameyaṃ ghaṭādyabhāvaḥ / nāstīha ghaṭādīti jñānaṃ ghaṭādyabhāvālambanaṃ phalam /
SA15bsa075_u:689_1: prayogaḥ - yasya yatra pratibandho nāsti na tasya tatra prāmāṇyam /
SA15bsa075_u:689_3: apratibaddhāśca bahirarthe vaidikāḥ śabdāḥ iti vyāpakānupalabdhiḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:689_4: na tāvadayamasiddho hetuḥ / śabdānāṃ vastutaḥ pratibandhābhāvāt /
SA15bsa075_u:689_6: na ca sā nirnibandhanā, sarveṣāṃ sarvatra pratibaddhasvabhāvatāprasaṅgāt /
SA15bsa075_u:690_1: yathā cakṣurindriyaṃ rūpe / cakṣuḥ khalu vyāpāryamāṇam rūpamevopalabhbhayati /
SA15bsa075_u:690_3: naiṣa doṣaḥ / yataścakṣurindriyamapi rasādiparihāreṇa rūpa eva prakāśakatvena pratiniyataṃ tatkāryatvāt /
SA15bsa075_u:690_4: rūpaṃ hi cakṣurupakaroti / na sattāmātreṇa cakṣū rūpaṃ prakāśayati,
SA15bsa075_u:690_6: tasmād rūpād yogyadeśasannihitāt tajjñānajananayogyatāmāsādya cakṣū rūpajñānamutpādayattatkāryamiti vyaktamavasīyate /
SA15bsa075_u:690_8: Nibandh 100#) na hyanupakāryatvāviśeṣe cakṣū rūpasyaiva prakāśakam,
SA15bsa075_u:690_10: ayameva tarhi niyamaḥ kuto yad rūpeṇaiva cakṣurūpakartavyam,
SA15bsa075_u:690_11: na rasādineti / yadi vastuvaśādeva rūpamupakaroti na rasādikam,
SA15bsa075_u:690_12: hanta tarhi yathopakāryatvaṃ prati niyamaścakṣuṣo rūpeṇa,
SA15bsa075_u:690_13: tathā śabdānāmapi svābhāvika evāstu bahirarthapratyāyananiyama iti /
SA15bsa075_u:691_2: tathā hi svābhāvikatvaṃ vastudharmasyānujānānaḥ praṣṭavyaḥ - kiṃ svābhāvika iti svato bhavati,
SA15bsa075_u:691_3_0: āhosvit parataḥ, athāhetutaḥ / yadi svato bhavati, tadasaṅgatam, svātmani kriyāvirodhāt /
SA15bsa075_u:691_3_1: athāhetutaḥ tadayuktam, ahetordeśādiniyamāyogāt / tasmānna svābhāviko rūpopakāryatāpratiniyamaścakṣuṣaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:691_5: brūmaḥ - cakṣūḥ khalu svahetunā janyamānaṃ tādṛśameva janitam yadrūpopakartavyameva bhavati /
SA15bsa075_u:692_0: śabdānāmapi sa svabhāvaḥ svahetupratibaddho yenaite bāhyārthāvyabhicāriṇa iti cet /
SA15bsa075_u:692_3: tadapi duṣkaram, doṣāntaraprasaṅgāt / yadi svahetunaiva te niyamārthopadarśanaśaktimanto janitāḥ,
SA15bsa075_u:692_5: yathā cakṣuḥ svaheto rūpaprakāśakamutpannaṃ sat prakāśayatyeva rūpamasaṅketavido 'pi,
SA15bsa075_u:692_6: na ca śabdāduccaritāt prāgapratītasamayasyāpi viśeṣāvagamaḥ samasti /
SA15bsa075_u:693_0: atha svahetubhirevāyamīdṛśasteṣāṃ svabhāvo datto yena te saṃketaviśeṣasahāyā eva kamapyarthamavabodhayanti /
SA15bsa075_u:693_4: na hi kṣityādyapekṣeṇa bījena svahetoraṅkurajananasvabhāvenotpannena rāsabhaḥ śakyo janayitum,
SA15bsa075_u:694_1: tadapi na prastutopayogi / na hyevamasya prāmāṇyamavatiṣṭhate /
SA15bsa075_u:694_2: yadā hi saṅketenāpuruṣārtha pratipādanamapi saṃbhāvyata eva,
SA15bsa075_u:694_3: tadā na śakyamupakalpayituṃ kimayamabhimatasyaivārthasya dyotako na veti /
SA15bsa075_u:698_0: nāpi viruddhaḥ, viparyayavyāptyabhāvāt / tadabhāvaśca sapakṣe vṛttyupadarśanāt /
SA15bsa075_u:698_1: na hi viruddhasya sādharmyavati dharmiṇi sadbhāvo yuktaḥ,
SA15bsa075_u:699_4: na khalvayaṃ prādeśikaḥ pramāṇaśabdo jñāneṣu nirnibandhana eva,
SA15bsa075_u:699_8: ataḥ pramāṇe dharmiṇi vipakṣe prāmāṇyasya viruddhavyāptasyopalambhena vipakṣe vyavacchedasiddhernānaikāntiko hetuḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:700_0: na cānyo doṣaḥ saṃbhavī / tasmānnirastāśeṣadoṣeṇa hetunā yat prasiddhaṃ tadupādeyameva satām (iti) paṇḍitaśrījitāripādaireva vedāprāmāṇye darśitam /
SA15bsa075_u:701_0: evaṃ ca vaidikaśabdānāṃ pramāṇye niraste tadutthaṃ jñānamapyapramāṇameva /
SA15bsa075_u:701_1: āptapraṇītasya punarvacanasyārthāvyabhicāre tajjanmano jñānasyāvyabhicārasaṃbhave 'pi na prāmāṇyamupagantuṃ śakyate,
SA15bsa075_u:702_0: yad yena rūpeṇa na niścitaṃ na tat tena rūpeṇa vyavahriyate /
SA15bsa075_u:703_1: tathā hi paracittavṛttayo 'tīndriyatvānna pratyakṣasamadhigamyā iti kāyavāgvyavahārato 'numātavyāḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:703_2: tau ca kāyavāgvyavahārau buddhipūrvamanyathāpi kartuṃ śakyete /
SA15bsa075_u:706_0: ato yadetasya prāmāṇyaprasiddhyarthaṃ vācaspatiprabhṛtīnāṃ valgitaṃ tadaprāptāvasarameva /
SA15bsa075_u:706_1: evaṃ pratyayoditamapi bhaṭṭābhimataṃ śābdaṃ pramāṇyaṃ vyastamiti boddhavyam /
SA15bsa075_u:706_2: tasmāt sthitametat na śābdaṃ bahirarthe pramāṇamastīti /
SA15bsa075_u:707_0: mīmāṃsakoktaṃ tāvadupamānaṃ mānameva na bhavati, nirviṣayatvādasya / ihāpi prayogaḥ -
SA15bsa075_u:708_0: yasya na viṣayavattvaṃ na tasya prāmāṇyam /
SA15bsa075_u:708_1: yathā keśoṇḍukajñānasya / na siddhaṃ ca viṣayavattvamupamānajñānasyeti vyāpakānupalambhaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:709_0: nāyamasiddho hetuḥ, nirviṣayatvādupamānasya / tathā hi sādṛśyaviśiṣṭaḥ piṇḍaḥ piṇḍaviśiṣṭaṃ vā sādṛśyamupamānasya viṣayo varṇyate /
SA15bsa075_u:712_0: iti / atrocyate / yadi sadṛśātiriktaṃ sādṛśyaṃ vastu dṛśyaṃ syāt,
SA15bsa075_u:712_7: sādṛśyapratyayastu svahetostathotpannena sadṛśavastunāpi kriyamāṇoghaṭata eva iti na sādṛśyamupasthāpayituṃ prabhavati /
SA15bsa075_u:712_10: tataśca sādṛśyasyāsiddherna tadviśiṣṭaḥ piṇḍaḥ piṇḍaviśiṣṭaṃ vā sādṛśyamupamānasya viṣayaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:714_0: na cānaikāntikaḥ / tathā hi prāmāṇyābhāve sādhye pramāṇyameva vipakṣaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:714_2: tadayaṃ viruddhavyāptopalabdhyā vipakṣānnivartamāno viṣayavattvābhāvalakṣaṇo hetuḥ prāmāṇyābhāvalakṣaṇa eva viśrāmyatīti vyāptisiddhiḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:715_2: tasyāpi nirviṣayatvāt / tathā hi samākhyāsaṃbandhastasya viṣayo varṇyate /
SA15bsa075_u:715_3: sa ca paramārthato nāsti / sa hi saṃbandhaḥ saṃbandhibhyāṃ bhinno 'bhinno vā /
SA15bsa075_u:715_7: na ca yathā pradīpaḥ prakāśāntaramantareṇa prakāśate tathā saṃbandho 'pi saṃbandhāntaramantareṇa saṃbaddho bhaviṣyatīti vaktumucitam /
SA15bsa075_u:715_8: pramāṇasiddhe hi vasturūpe 'yamasya svabhāva iti varṇyate /
SA15bsa075_u:715_11: yadvā nāstyevāyamiti / ayamanayoḥ saṃbandhaḥ saṃbaddhāvetāviti tu buddhiḥ svahetubalāt saṃbaddhavastudvayādapi saṃbhāvyamānā na saṃbandhamākṣeptuṃ prabhavati /
SA15bsa075_u:715_13: athābhinnaḥ tadā saṃbandhināveva kevalāviati na samākhyāsaṃbandho nāma,
SA15bsa075_u:716_1_0: bhede ca sa eva sambandhaḥ, nāmni paraṃ vivādaḥ / athābhinnam, tadā yathā saṃbaddhapadārthasya
SA15bsa075_u:716_1_1: svabhāvaḥ sarvapadārthasādhāraṇastathā tadapi rūpaṃ tadavyatibhinnaṃ sarvapadārthasādhāraṇamiti
SA15bsa075_u:716_1_2: sa padārtho 'bhimatapadārtheneva parairapi padārthaiḥ saha saṃbaddhaḥ syāt /
SA15bsa075_u:718_0: saṃbaddhaṃ svayameva cennanu yathā taṃ tasya saṃbandhinaṃ
SA15bsa075_u:718_1: pratyātmā jagatīmapi prati tathā tatkena yogo 'sya na /
SA15bsa075_u:718_2: saṃbandhe parato 'pi tulyamakhilaṃ tenaiva cet saṃyamo
SA15bsa075_u:718_3: hetuḥ kiṃ na niyāmakaḥ sa ca kathaṃ yogaḥ kvacinnāpare //
SA15bsa075_u:719_0: iti / tasmāt saṃbandhābhāvāt pūrvoktena nyāyena sārūpyābhāvāccāsiddhaṃ naiyāyikasyāpi nirviṣayamupamānaṃ pramāṇamato 'nantareṇaiva vyāpakānupalambhena nirākṛtam /
SA15bsa075_u:720_0: arthāpattirapi / yadetat sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ pratyakṣādipratīto yo 'rthaḥ sa yena vinā nopapadyate tasyārthasya parikalpanamarthāpattirityatra vicāryate /
SA15bsa075_u:720_1: yasyārthasya darśanād yo 'rthaḥ parikalpyate tayoryadi pratibandho 'stitadārthāpattiranumānameva /
SA15bsa075_u:720_3: tathā hi pramāṇaparidṛṣṭo 'rthaḥ kenacidvinā nopapadyata iti kuto labhyate,
SA15bsa075_u:720_5: anyathā tena vinā nopapadyata ityahrīkādanyo na brūyāt,
SA15bsa075_u:720_6: Nibandh 104#) ghaṭapaṭavat / sa ca sambandhaḥ kvacit pūrvamavaśyaṃ pratyakṣānupalambhataḥ kvacidadṛśyatve 'pi viparyayabādhakapramāṇabalādvā niścetavyaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:720_8: sati caivam, ekaṃ saṃbandhinaṃ dṛṣṭvā yatrasthena vinā tatrasthaṃ nopapadyate,
SA15bsa075_u:720_14: tasmāt paridṛśyamānaparikalpyamānayoḥ sati pratibandhe nārthāpattiḥ pramāṇāntaramiti /
SA15bsa075_u:720_15: atha tayorna pratibandhaḥ, tadārthāpattiḥ pramāṇameva na bhavatīti mantavyam,
SA15bsa075_u:720_17: yasya yatra pratibandho nāsti na tasya tatra prāmāṇyamityādirveda nirākaraṇārtha yaḥ pūrvamupanyastaḥ sa evāsyā api prāmāṇyanirākaraṇāya draṣṭavyaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:720_18: sāmānyenaivārthāpattau nirākṛtāyāṃ pratyakṣādipūrvakatvalakṣaṇastatprapañco nirasto bhavatyeveti tadarthaṃ na prabandho 'bhidhīyate,
SA15bsa075_u:721_1: tasyāpi nirviṣayatvāt / tataśca mīmāṃsakopavalgitopamānanirākaraṇārthamupanyasto yo viṣayavattvābhāvalakṣaṇo 'nupalambhaḥ sa evāsyāpi nirāsārthamupanyasitavyaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:721_2: nanu cātrāsiddho hetuḥ / tathā hi yadi ghaṭābhāvo vāstavaḥ prameyabhūto na syāt,
SA15bsa075_u:721_3: tadā nāstīha ghaṭa iti pratyayaḥ kathamutpadyata iti cet /
SA15bsa075_u:721_5: nanu yadi kaivalyaṃ praveśasvarūpaṃ tattarhi saghaṭe 'pi pradeśe vidyata iti tatrāpi tasya pratyayasya sadbhāvaprasaṅgaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:721_7: na / kaivalyaṃ tadviviktatvamasaṅkīrṇatvamityādibhiḥ padaiḥ pradeśasya ghaṭaṃ pratyanāpannādhārabhāvasya svahetuta utpannasya ghaṭapradeśādanya evātmābhidhīyate /
SA15bsa075_u:721_8: sa eva cābhāvapratyayaṃ janayatīti kimapareṇābhāvena kartavyam /
SA15bsa075_u:722_0: nanu ghaṭaṃ pratyanāpannādhārabhāvasya pradeśasyeti ghaṭābhāvayuktasya pradeśasyetyuktaṃ bhavatīti cet /
SA15bsa075_u:722_1: tarhi ghaṭābhāvo 'pi ghaṭaṃ pratyanāpannādhārabhāvaḥ kimabhāvāntareṇa svarūpeṇaiva vā /
SA15bsa075_u:722_2: prathamapakṣe 'navasthā / atha tadabhāvarūpatvādabhāvāntaramantareṇaiva ghaṭābhāvo ghaṭaṃ pratyanāpannādhārabhāvaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:722_3_1: ghaṭaṃ pratyanāpannādhārabhāvo yukta iti kimakāṇḍamāhopuruṣikayā mithyāpralāpenābodhaviklavaṃ
SA15bsa075_u:726_0: na hyabhāvaḥ kasyacit pratipattiḥ pratipattiheturvā tasyāpi kathaṃ pratipattiriti /
SA15bsa075_u:728_0: ityādi, tadapi yācitakamaṇḍanam / tasmāt sthitametat, pramāṇasya sato 'traivāntarbhāvāt pramāṇe eva /
SA15bsa075_u:731_3: tathā hi te 'gnimati pradeśe dhūmasya bhūyodarśanaṃ tadviyukte ca tathaivādarśanamityanvayavyatirekitvaṃ kalpayāmbabhūvuḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:732_0: nanu bhūyasāpi pravṛtte darśanādarśane ghaṭakulaṭādāvupalabdho vyabhicāra iti cet /
SA15bsa075_u:732_6: tasmādagnidhūmayoravyabhicārasyāsaṃbhave śatamapi tadupapattayaḥ tatprasādhakaviśiṣṭapratyakṣānupalambhā vā nānumānopayoginaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:732_7: saṃbhave vā kiṃ tadutpattyā tadupayoginā viśiṣṭapratyakṣānupalambhena,
SA15bsa075_u:732_9: tathā ca kāśikākāraḥ prācīnānekadarśanajanitasaṃskārasahāyenacarameṇa cetasā dhūmasyāgniniyatatvaṃ gṛhyata iti /
SA15bsa075_u:733_0: trilocanastvāha - pratyakṣānupalambhayorviśeṣaviṣayatvāt kathaṃ tābhyāṃ sāmānyayoḥ saṃbandhapratipattiḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:733_3: na tāvatpratyakṣasya, svalakṣaṇaviṣayatvāttasya / nāpyanumānasya, tasyāpi tatpūrvakatvāt / na ca vyāvṛtyoḥ kaścitsaṃbandhaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:733_5: tadeva sāmānyam / evamapi vikalpānāṃ na vastvena viṣayaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:733_6: api tu grāhyākāraḥ / sa ca na vastu / vastu tu teṣāṃ parokṣameveti,
SA15bsa075_u:733_8: asmākaṃ tu bhūyodarśanasahāyena manasā tajjātīyānāṃ saṃbandho gṛhīto bhavati /
SA15bsa075_u:733_10: tadvyabhicāre dhūma upādhirahitaṃ saṃbandhamatikrāmediti hetovipakṣaśaṅkānivartakaṃ pramāṇamupalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptopādhivirahaheturanupalambhākhyaṃ pratyakṣameva /
SA15bsa075_u:734_0: vācaspatestu prapañcaḥ / tathā hi dhumādīnāṃ vahnyādibhiḥ svābhāvikaḥ saṃbandhaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:734_4: Nibandh 107#) tu sphuṭamārdrendhanādyupādhikṛtaḥ saṃbandho na tu svābhāvikaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:734_8: na cādṛśyamāno 'pi darśanānarhatayā sādhakabādhakapramāṇābhāvena sagdihyamāna upādhiḥ saṃbandhasya svābhāvikatvaṃ pratibadhnātīti yuktam /
SA15bsa075_u:736_0: iti tu dattāvakāśā laukikamaryādātikrameṇa śaṅkāpiśācī labdhaprasarā na kvacinnāstīti nāyaṃ kvacit pravarteta /
SA15bsa075_u:736_5: na tvadṛṣṭapūrvamapi / viśeṣasmṛtyapekṣa eva hi saṃśayo nāsmṛterbhavati /
SA15bsa075_u:738_0: tasmādupādhiṃ prayatnenānviṣyanto 'nupalabhamānā nāstītyavagamya svābhāvikatvaṃ saṃbandhasya niścinumaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:739_0: syādetat / anyasyānyena sahākāraṇena cet svābhāvikaḥ saṃbandho bhavet,
SA15bsa075_u:739_2: sarvaṃ sarvasmād gamyeta / athānyasya cedanyat kāryaṃ kasmāt sarvaṃ sarvasmānna bhavati,
SA15bsa075_u:739_3: anyatvāviśeṣāt / tataśca sa evātiprasaṅgaḥ / yadyucyeta na bhāvasvabhāvāḥ paryanuyojyāḥ,
SA15bsa075_u:739_4: tasmādanyatvāviśeṣe 'pi kiñcideva kāraṇaṃ kāryaṃ ca kiñciditi /
SA15bsa075_u:739_5: nanveṣa svabhāvānāmanuyogo bhinnānāmakāryakāraṇabhūtānāmapi svabhāvapratibandhe tulya eva /
SA15bsa075_u:739_6: tasmād yatkiñcidetadapi / kena punaḥ pramāṇenaiṣa svābhāvikaḥ saṃbandho gṛhyate /
SA15bsa075_u:739_8: tathā hi abhijāatamaṇibhedatattvavad bhūyodarśanajanitasaṃskārasahāyamindriyameva dhūmādīnāṃ vahnyādibhiḥ svābhāvikāsaṃbandhagrāhīti yuktamutpaśyāmaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:739_9: evaṃ mānāntaraviditasaṃbandheṣu mānāntarāṇyeva yathāsvaṃ bhūyodarśanasahāyāni svābhāvikasaṃbandhagrahaṇe pramāṇānyunnetavyāni /
SA15bsa075_u:739_12: svabhāvādeva pracyaveranniti tarkasahāyā nirastasādhyavyatirekavṛttisandehā yatra dṛṣṭāstatra svasādhyamupasthāpayantyeveti /
SA15bsa075_u:740_0: atrocyate / iha khalu bhede tadutpattireva vyāptiḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:740_1: na cāsāvanyo vā svata evāvinābhāvalakṣaṇaḥ svābhāvikaḥ saṃbandho bhūyodarśanamātrataḥ sidhyati /
SA15bsa075_u:740_2: tathā hi, kiṃ yatra bhūyodarśanapravṛttistatra niyatatvavyavasthā,
SA15bsa075_u:741_2: pratipatturvā / prathamapakṣe pratipattuḥ kimāyātaṃ yato nānumānamayaṃ kuryāt /
SA15bsa075_u:741_3: anyathānyasya tadviṣayapratyakṣīkāreṇaiva so 'pi kṛtārtha iti kimavaśyamanumānamanveṣate /
SA15bsa075_u:741_6: śāstrakāraṃ ca pṛṣṭvā dṛṣṭasaṃbandho 'pi dhṛmādagnimanumāsyata ityalaukikam /
SA15bsa075_u:741_8: na hi yatra vyabhicārastatraiva tāvati kāle deśe vāvaśyaṃ pratītimavatarati /
SA15bsa075_u:742_1: tadaiva krameṇa vā vyabhicāraṃ paśyediti cet /
SA15bsa075_u:742_5: vyaktaṃ tasya tāvat tadapyamānamāpannamiti mahat pāṇḍityam /
SA15bsa075_u:742_9: tato bahulaṃ sahacāramātreṇa na vyabhicārī na vāvyabhicārī niścita iti śaṅkāvakāśaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:743_1: na / īdṛśasya śaṅkāvakāśasya sarvatra tadutpattirahite saṃbhavāditi /
SA15bsa075_u:743_2: atha kadācit pratipattā pravṛtto vyabhicāraṃ paśyati /
SA15bsa075_u:743_4: tatra niyatatvasthitiḥ / tatra kuto dhūme pratibandhasiddhiḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:744_0: yadyevaṃ dvicandrādau cakṣurādipratyakṣaṃ malinapauruṣamupalabdhamiti ghaṭādikamapi nopasthāpayediti cet /
SA15bsa075_u:744_3: Nibandh 109#) tato bhinnalakṣaṇasya pratyakṣābhāsattve 'pi ghaṭajñānaṃ pratyakṣameva /
SA15bsa075_u:744_4: na caivaṃ dhūmādau pārthivatvādau ca vyāptigrāhakasya bhūyodarśanasya lakṣaṇabhedo yenaikatrāśvāsaḥ syāt /
SA15bsa075_u:745_1: na / ghaṭādijñānasya hyarthakāryatvavivāde pramāṇāntarato 'rthakriyālābhato vā niścayaḥ,
SA15bsa075_u:745_2: na pratijñāmātreṇa / na cātra dhūmasyāgnisahacāraḥ sadātano 'yamatha suhṛddvayasyeva sātyayo gṛhīta iti saṃśaye sadātanasahacāraprasādhakapramāṇāntarasaṅgatirasti,
SA15bsa075_u:745_4: tarhi bādhyamānatvābādhyamānatvalakṣaṇo lakṣaṇabhedo bhaviṣyatītyapi na vaktavyam,
SA15bsa075_u:745_7: pramāṇāntarasaṅgatirarthakriyālābho vā paryudāsaścāsiddha iti na tāvat prathamaḥ pakṣaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:745_8: nāpi dvitīyaḥ / niyatatvābhāve 'pi pārthivatvādau bhūyodarśanasaṃbhavāditi na bhūyodarśanagamyā vyāptiḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:746_0: trilocanacodye 'pi brūmaḥ / yadi pratyakṣaṃ svalakṣaṇaviṣayamityayogavyavacchedenocyate tadā siddhasādhanam /
SA15bsa075_u:746_3: yadvi yatra jñāne pratibhāsate tad grāhyam /
SA15bsa075_u:746_7: anumānasya tu viparyayaḥ / tataśca sāṃvyavahārikapramāṇāpekṣayā rūparasagandhasparśasamudāyātmakasya ghaṭasya rūpabhedamātragrahaṇe 'pi pratyakṣataḥ samudāyasiddhivyavasthā /
SA15bsa075_u:746_13: na ca manasā tajjātīyānāṃ vyāptigrahaḥ śakyaḥ,
SA15bsa075_u:746_15: na ca vahnivyabhicāre dhūma upādhirahitaṃ āṃbandhamatikrāmediti vaktumucitam,
SA15bsa075_u:747_0: yadapi vācaspatijalpitam, yo yatropādhinā niyatastatra tasya svābhāvikaḥ saṃbandhaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:747_1: yathā dahane dhūmasya / tadupādherdṛśyasyānupalabhyamānatvāt kvacid vyabhicārasyādarśanādityatredaṃ vicāryate /
SA15bsa075_u:747_4: arthāntaraṃ ca kiñcid dṛśyamadṛśyaṃ ca kiñcit,
SA15bsa075_u:747_14: vyabhicārasya sarvadeśakālayoḥ saṃbhave 'pi dṛśyatve 'pi sarvadā sarvatra sarveṇa sāmagryabhāvādapi niścetumaśakyatvāt /
SA15bsa075_u:748_0: nanu yadi dhūmasyāpekṣaṇīyamarthāntaramupādhiḥ syāt kathaṃ dhūma ityeva pāvakasattāniyama iti cet /
SA15bsa075_u:748_1: nanvidameva cintyate kiṃ dhūme satyavaśyamagniḥ saṃbhavīna veti /
SA15bsa075_u:748_2: kadācidarthāntaramupādhimapekṣya dhūmo 'pi syānnāgniriti kimatra niṣṭabdhaṃ kāraṇam /
SA15bsa075_u:748_3: tasmāt pāvakaparādhīnodayo dhūmaḥ pariniṣṭhitaḥ kathaṃ tadabhāve bhāvaṃ svīkuryādityeva sādhu /
SA15bsa075_u:749_0: atha vyaktau jātau vā vahnivyabhicāro na dṛṣṭaḥ,
SA15bsa075_u:749_2: tat kiṃ sthāṇuvyaktau jātau vā puruṣatvaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ yena sthāṇau śaṅkayate /
SA15bsa075_u:749_4: ihāpyanyatra bhūyaḥ sahacāriṇi pārthivatvādau dṛṣṭa eva vyabhicāraḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:749_5: yatraiva tu yat saṃśayyate tatraiva tasya darśanamapekṣyata ityalaukikam /
SA15bsa075_u:749_6: yadi dhūmavyaktau vyabhicāro dṛṣṭastadā dhūmasāmānyaṃ vyāptau bahirbhūtameva,
SA15bsa075_u:749_7: kathaṃ saṃśayaḥ / atha jātau dṛṣṭastadāpi vyabhicāraniścaya eva,
SA15bsa075_u:749_8: kathaṃ saṃśayaḥ / ato dhūmajātāvadṛśyamāno 'pi vyabhicāra upādhirvā darśanāyogyatayā niṣeddhumaśakya iti saṃśayo durvāraprasaraḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:749_9: sa cedānīmupādhervyabhicārasya vā saṃśayaḥ svābhāvikatvasaṃśayasvabhāvaḥ svābhāvikatvaniścayaṃ tāvadavaśyaṃ pratibadhnāti /
SA15bsa075_u:749_15: yathā dahano nendhanena vinā dhūmena saṃbadhyate tathā dhūmo 'pi na tena vināgninā saṃbadhyata iti samānamupādhitvamindhanasyobhayatra /
SA15bsa075_u:750_1: asiddhasya tu dhūmasya tannimittātmalābhatayāvyabhicārāt svābhāvikaḥ saṃbandha iti vyavasthā pyata iti cet /
SA15bsa075_u:750_7: yasya tu sakṛttadutpattipratītireva sarvatrāvyabhicārapratītistasya nāyaṃ prasaṅgaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:751_1: na / bhūya ityapariniṣṭhitavārasaṃkhyatvāt kiyatā darśanena lakṣaṇānusārī nirvṛtimāsādayet /
SA15bsa075_u:753_2: na hi dṛśyamāno ghaṭaḥ kalpita ucyate /
SA15bsa075_u:753_3: na ca sandihyamāna upādhiḥ saṃbandhasya svābhāvikatvaṃ pratibadhnātīti yuktam,
SA15bsa075_u:754_0: pramāṇaviṣaye 'pi śaṅkā kartuṃ śakyata iti cet /
SA15bsa075_u:754_1: na / svīkṛtapramāṇasya hi niścayaphalatvāt pramāṇasyāvipratipannapramāṇaviṣaye niścayasvīkāranāntarīyaka eva tatsvīkāraḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:754_9: kiṃ ca bādhakādarśane 'pi sādhakabhāvādapi śaṅkā syādeva /
SA15bsa075_u:755_4: yatra tadutpattisāmagrīṃ hṛdayena dūrīkṛtyānyataḥ sahacaritadvayād viśeṣaṃṇa pratītau pratyupāya eva devīyān /
SA15bsa075_u:755_7: kena punaḥ pramāṇena eṣa svābhāvikaḥ saṃbandho gṛhyata ityādistadgrahaṇaprakāraḥ pūrvameva nirākṛtaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:755_8: tathā svābhāvikatvāsiddhau svabhāvataśca pratibaddhā hetava ityādyupasaṃhāropi manorājyamātram /
SA15bsa075_u:755_10: tadevaṃ svābhāvikavādena hṛdayānulepanamaśucineva parihāryaṃ dūrata iti /
SA15bsa075_u:760_1: tathā hi sa evāyaṃ ghaṭasphaṭikādiriti pratyabhijñākhyaṃ pratyakṣamudīyamānaṃ sthairyamutthāpayati /
SA15bsa075_u:760_6: na tāvadatra mithyātvam / mithyātvaṃ hi tadviṣaye bādhakapratyayād vā hetūtthadoṣato vā saṃbhāvyeta /
SA15bsa075_u:760_9: na cānavagatāpi bādhā kadācidapi bhaviṣyatīti śaṅkā yuktimatī,
SA15bsa075_u:762_0: iti dattāvakāśā saṃśayapiśācī labdhaprasarā na kvacinnāstīti nāyaṃ kvacitpravarteta /
SA15bsa075_u:768_1: na / anumānasya paramparayāpi pratyakṣapūrvakatvāt pratyakṣaṃ pradhānam /
SA15bsa075_u:768_3: na tvanumānamasya / pratyakṣāntaraṃ tu bādhakaṃ bhavati /
SA15bsa075_u:769_0: nanu pratyakṣe 'pi bādhake kasmānna bhavati parasparapratibandhena dvayorapyapratyakṣatā /
SA15bsa075_u:769_6: na ca saṃśayaḥ / na hi tadevedaṃ syād vā na veti sphaṭikādiṣūdayati matiḥ,
SA15bsa075_u:769_9: nāpi lakṣaṇakṣayāt / yadeva hi utpannamasandigdhamaduṣṭakāraṇajanyaṃ deśakālanarāntareṣvabādhitaṃ ca tadeva pramāṇamiti naḥ siddhāntaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:773_0: iti / etacca lakṣaṇamuktanyāyena pratyabhijñāne 'pi saṃbhavatīti pramāṇamevedam /
SA15bsa075_u:773_1: nanvidamekameva na bhavati, kāraṇabhedāt, viṣayabhedāt, svabhāvavirodhācca / tathā hi sa iti saṃskārakāryam,
SA15bsa075_u:773_2: ayamiti cendriyakāryam / na ca kāraṇabhede 'pi kāryābhedo viśvavaicitryāhetukatvaprasaṅgāt /
SA15bsa075_u:773_3_0: tathā satyapi sphaṭikaḥ sphaṭika iti vyapadeśābhede pūrvadeśakālasaṃbandhāparadeśakālasaṃbandhābhyāṃ
SA15bsa075_u:773_3_1: viruddhadharmābhyāṃ yogāt sphaṭikaḥ pūrvāparakālayorbhidyata iti viṣayabhedo vaktavyaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:773_4: tathā sa iti parokṣam, ayamiti sākṣātkāraḥ / na cānayoḥ svabhāvaviruddhayordahanatuhinayoriva śakyā śakreṇāpyekatā āpādayitum,
SA15bsa075_u:773_6: smārtādaviśeṣācca / tasmāt pratyabhijñā ekatvaṃ sthāpayati bhāvānāmiti manorathamātram /
SA15bsa075_u:773_9: yadyapi saṃskāramātram, saṃskārasadhrīcīnaṃ tu indriyaṃ bhāvayiṣyati pratyabhijñānam,
SA15bsa075_u:773_11: na hi nājījanad bījamātramaṅkuramiti mṛdādisahitamapi na janayati /
SA15bsa075_u:773_19: avikalpo vikalpaśca, asamāropaḥ samāropaśca / svānubhavāvasthāpitābhedasya svarūpatadgrāhyabhedāpekṣayā pratyakṣādīnāmavirodha iti cet /
SA15bsa075_u:773_20: Nibandh 114#) tattedantādhikaraṇamekamābhyāmanuraktaṃ sphaṭikaṃ gocarayadabhinnaṃ nānubhūyate nāvasīyate vā /
SA15bsa075_u:773_23: na ca sa iti pūrvadeśakālasaṃsargo 'yamiti ca sannihitadeśakālasaṃsargaṃ ekasya virudhyate,
SA15bsa075_u:773_24_0: yato yuktaṃ yatpadmarāgasya svarūpe paricchidyamāne tadabhāvo vyavacchidyata iti
SA15bsa075_u:774_1: tadabhāvāvinābhāvāditi cet / sa eva kutaḥ / pratyakṣeṇa kadācidapi puṣparāgapadmarāgayostādātmyānupalambhāditi cet /
SA15bsa075_u:774_3: na tatra tadavinābhāvaḥ / samasti ca so 'yaṃ padmarāga iti deśakālāvasthānugatamekaṃ padmarāgamavabhāsayantī sākṣātkāravatī pratītiḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:775_0: atha keśakuśakadalīstambādau satyapi bhede pratyabhijñānamutpannamiti cet /
SA15bsa075_u:775_1: utpadyatāṃ ko doṣaḥ / kimanena pratipāditaṃ bhavati /
SA15bsa075_u:775_6: anumānatve 'pyabādhitatvāditi viśeṣaṇe na doṣa iti pratipādayiṣyāmaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:775_9: saṃśayamātraṃ tu vyavahārocchedakatvānnāśrayaṇīyamevati pratipāditamiti na tṛtīyo 'pio pakṣaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:776_0: kiṃ ca keśādau yadi pratyabhijñā vyabhicāriṇo,
SA15bsa075_u:776_2: yā vyabhicāriṇo sā kāryakāraṇapratītireva na bhavatīti cet /
SA15bsa075_u:776_3: yadyevaṃ yā visaṃvādinī sā pratyabhijñaiva na bhavati tadābhāsatvāditi samānam /
SA15bsa075_u:776_7: tadiyaṃ pratyabhijñā anekadeśakālāvasthāsaṃbaddhamekaṃ sphaṭikādikaṃ gocarayantī sthairyaṃ vyavasthāpayati /
SA15bsa075_u:777_1: prayogaḥ - vivādādhyāsitaḥ sa evāyaṃ sphaṭikaṃ ityādipratyabhijñāpratyayo yathārthaḥ,
SA15bsa075_u:777_2: abādhitapratyayatvāt / yāvānabādhitapratyayaḥ sa sarvo yathārtha upalabdhaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:778_4: yathā yastvayā dṛṣṭo nīlo 'rthaḥ sa eva mayā dṛṣṭa iti nīlo 'rthaḥ pratyabhijñāyate /
SA15bsa075_u:779_1: prayogaḥ - vivādāspadībhūtā bhāvā yathāsvaṃ vināśahetusannidheḥ prāṅ na vināśinaḥ,
SA15bsa075_u:779_4: sahetukavināśāścāmī bhāvāḥ / tasmāttatheti / sahetukavināśatvaṃ ca ghaṭasyāgnidhūmayoriva pratyakṣānupalambhato mudgaravināśayorapi kāryakāraṇabhāvasiddhau siddham /
SA15bsa075_u:780_0: kāraṇavattvasya sādhyaviparyaye vṛttiśaṅkā vināśasya sahetukatvameva nivartayatīti prasiddhavyāptikāt kāraṇavattvādakṣaṇikatvasiddhiriti /
SA15bsa075_u:783_2: tadaiva bhāvo 'sti na pūrvaṃ na praścādityapi śabdaḥ kṣaṇikaparyāyatveneṣyamāṇaḥ kṣaṇādūrdhvaṃ sattvāvicchedopajananamantareṇa nārthavān devairapi śakyaḥ parikalpayitum /
SA15bsa075_u:783_8: nivṛttiparityāge ca janmino bhāvā nityā iti durnivāraḥ prasaṅgaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:784_2: naitadasti / yasmādarthaṃ kañcit prāpayat pratyakṣaṃ tena pratyāsannatvātprāpayati /
SA15bsa075_u:784_5: anyatra nirākṛtatvācca / sā ca niyatavastupratibhāsākṣiptā kāryakāraṇabhāvalakṣaṇā pratyāsattistulyakālaṃ pramāṇaprameyayoranupapannā,
SA15bsa075_u:784_9: pūrvakālasattvaṃ ca kṣaṇikatve 'nupapannamiti vyāpakānupalabdhyā vipakṣāt kṣaṇikatvād vyāvartamānaṃ prameyatvamakṣaṇikatvena vyāpyata iti asandigdho vyatirekaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:785_1_0: tathā hi kāryakāraṇabhāvagrahaṇaṃ kramayaugapadyagrahaṇasmaraṇam abhilāṣaḥ svayaṃnihitapratyanumārgaṇaṃ
SA15bsa075_u:785_1_2: mokṣaprayatnaḥ śubhodarke karmaṇi pravṛttiḥ pratyabhijñā kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ upādānopādeyabhāvaprabhṛtayaḥ
SA15bsa075_u:785_2: pratikṣaṇaṃ bhede satyanubhaviturvinaṣṭatve 'nyasya kāryakāraṇabhāvagrahaṇādyanupapatteriti kathaṃ kṣaṇabhaṅgaśaṅkāpi /
SA15bsa075_u:786_0: atrābhidhīyate / apramāṇamevāyaṃ pratyabhijñākhyo vikalpo mithyātvaṃ ca sadviṣayatvabādhakapratyayāt /
SA15bsa075_u:786_6: tathā hi māyākāraḥ śirasi nimajjitaṃ golakamāsyena niḥsārayatīti pratyabhijñā śirasi cchidraprasaṅgasaṅgatenānumānena bādhyamānā pratītaiva /
SA15bsa075_u:786_8: yathāvanatākāśapratibhāsaḥ sarvasaṃpratipattāvapi bādhya eva tadvadekatāgrahaḥ sarvasaṃpratipattāvapi bādhyo 'stu /
SA15bsa075_u:787_0: nanūktaṃ yā vyabhicāriṇī sā na pratyabhijñetyādi /
SA15bsa075_u:787_3: tathā yadi pratyabhijñāne 'pi lakṣaṇabhedo darśitaḥ syāt,
SA15bsa075_u:787_6: na tvevamasti, sarvatrātyantasadṛśe vastuni pṛthagjanapratyabhijñāyā ekarasatvāt /
SA15bsa075_u:788_1: na / aliṅgasya hi vikalpasya saṃvādo nāma pramāṇāntarasaṅgatirarthakriyāprāptirvā /
SA15bsa075_u:788_2: tatra na tāvadādyaḥ pakṣaḥ, paścādapi sa evāyamiti svatantraikādhyavasāyamātrādaparasya pramāṇagandhasyāpyabhāvāt /
SA15bsa075_u:789_3: tathā hi yathaiko ghaṭo vāri dhārayatīti tatkālabhāvino 'pyanyasya deśāntaravartino na vāridhāraṇavāraṇam tathā dvitīyādikṣaṇopyanyo yadi vāri dhārayati,
SA15bsa075_u:789_4: kīdṛśo doṣaḥ syāt / visadṛśakriyāyāṃ tu cintaiva nāsti /
SA15bsa075_u:790_0: nanu yadyekaṃ pratyabhijñānaṃ bisaṃvādi dṛṣṭamiti sarvameva pratyabhijñānaṃ visaṃvādi śaṅkyate,
SA15bsa075_u:790_1: tadaikamindriyajñānaṃ keśoṇḍukadvicandrādau visaṃvādyupalabdhamiti ghaṭādiṣvapi sarvameva pratyakṣaṃ visaṃvādi saṃbhāvyatām,
SA15bsa075_u:790_7: dvicandrādau tvarthavinākṛtena timirādiviplutacakṣuirmātreṇa tajjñānaṃ janitamiti pratyakṣābhāsameva /
SA15bsa075_u:790_8: dvicandrādyarthābhāvastu deśakālanarāntarairdvicandrāderarthasya bādhitatvādavyāhata iti pratyakṣābhāsaparihāre 'pi pratyakṣeṣu ka āścāsavirodhaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:791_0: yathā hi pūrvaṃ pāvakādau pākādikriyā pratibaddhā siddhā paścādanubhūyamānā dahanajñānasya saṃvādamāvedayati,
SA15bsa075_u:791_2: na tathā prathamacaramakālayorekīmāvapratibaddhā kācidarthakriyā upalabdhigocarā pūrvāparakālayorekatvamantareṇa vā pravṛttyādikṣatiryenaikatāvagraho 'pi saṃvādī syāt /
SA15bsa075_u:791_3: tadiyamanumānabādhitatvād vyabhicāraśaṅkākalaṅkitatvāccana pratyakṣamanumānaṃ veti kathamataḥ sthairyasiddhiranumānapratihatirvā /
SA15bsa075_u:792_0: yat punarvācaspatirūvāca saṃskārendriyayormilitayoreva pratyabhijñānaṃ prati kāraṇatvamiti,
SA15bsa075_u:792_2: tathā hi nimīlite cakṣuṣi sa ityatrendriyavinākṛtasyaiva saṃskārasya sāmarthyamupalabdham /
SA15bsa075_u:792_7: bījakṣityādyostu pṛthak sāmarthyaṃ na dṛṣṭamityekaiva sāmagrītyaṅkuro 'pyeka evāstu /
SA15bsa075_u:792_9: viruddhayordharmayoḥ padmarāgādanyatve 'pi viruddhadharmayogāt padmarāgasya bhedaḥ kathamapahnayate,
SA15bsa075_u:792_11: na hi dharmadharmiṇoranyatve 'pi brāhmaṇatvacāṇḍālatve ekādhāre bhavitumarhata iti padmarāgasya bhedo duratikramaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:792_15: sa e vāyamiti tu pratyabhijñānasya sa ityaspaṣṭākārayogitvam,
SA15bsa075_u:793_0: na caivaṃ vaktavyam tattedantāpekṣayā pratyabhijñānasyāpyekasyaiva pārokṣyāpārokṣyamaviruddhamiti /
SA15bsa075_u:793_3: yāvadatītārthākārānukāro vartamānārthānukāraśca svadharmo na bhavati tāvattadarthagocarataiva nāsti /
SA15bsa075_u:795_1: yatpunaratroktam sahetukavināśatvaṃ ghaṭasyāgnidhūmayoriva pratyakṣānupalambhato mudgaraghaṭavināśayorapi kāryakāraṇabhāvasiddhau siddhamiti,
SA15bsa075_u:796_0: dṛṣṭastāvadayaṃ ghaṭo 'tra ca patan dṛṣṭastathā mudgaro
SA15bsa075_u:796_1: dṛṣṭā karparasaṃhatiḥ paramato nāśo na dṛṣṭaḥ paraḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:796_2: tenābhāva iti śrutiḥ kva nihitā kiṃ vātra tatkāraṇaṃ
SA15bsa075_u:798_0: yatpunarasminnadṛśyamāne 'pi dṛśyata iti vāgjālaṃ sā bhaṇḍavidyā /
SA15bsa075_u:800_3: tathā ca sati mudgarādyabhāve karparābhāvāt ghaṭasthairyamavyāhatamiti /
SA15bsa075_u:800_4_0: durāśā khalveṣā / tathā hi yathā nāśaśabdena karparamucyate tathā yadyabhāvaśabdenāpi
SA15bsa075_u:800_4_1: karparamevocyate tadaikatra pradeśe ghaṭamekamapanīya ghaṭāntaranyāse tatrāpanītaghaṭasyābhāvavyavahāro
SA15bsa075_u:801_0: āstāṃ karparapaṃktireva kalaśadhvaṃso na ceyaṃ purā
SA15bsa075_u:801_1: tena sthairyamapi prasidhyatu tato bhinnena nāśena kim /
SA15bsa075_u:803_0: nāśaḥ saiva yathocyate yadi tathābhāvo 'pi kumbhāntar
SA15bsa075_u:805_1: kathaṃ kvacideva deśe kāle ghaṭo naṣṭa iti pratītiniyamaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:806_0: nāśo nāsti yadi svahetuniyataḥ kiṃ deśakāle kvacit
SA15bsa075_u:806_1: kumbho naṣṭa iti pratītiniyamastenāsti kāryaśca saḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:806_3: nāśoktā na kṛtā vinaṣṭaghaṭadhīḥ kenoddhurā vāryate //
SA15bsa075_u:807_0: iti cet / tarhīdānīmarthāpattyā pradhvaṃsaṃ prasādhya mudgarādhīnatvamasya sādhayitumārabdham /
SA15bsa075_u:807_1: tathā ca sati dhūmāgnivat pratyakṣataḥ pradhvaṃsasya mudgarādikāryatvaṃ siddhamityutphullagallamullapitaṃ vyāluptam /
SA15bsa075_u:808_2: vināśaṃ vināpi hi ghaṭadarśanavato mudgarakṛtakapālānubhava evanaṣṭaghaṭāvasāyasādhanaḥ,
SA15bsa075_u:808_3: kimapareṇa nāśena kartavyam, ghaṭo naṣṭa iti buddherghaṭaniścayapūrvakamudgarakṛtakapālānubhavamātrānvayavyatirekānuvidhānadarśanāt /
SA15bsa075_u:808_5: mudgarābhāve karparapaṃkterevābhāvāt kathaṃ prāgapi naṣṭaghaṭabuddhiprasaṅgaḥ saṃgato nāma /
SA15bsa075_u:809_3: sāmagryāmiha nāśanāma na kimapyaṅgaṃ na cāsyāmapi
SA15bsa075_u:809_4: syādeṣā na kadāpi nāpi ca purāpyeṣā samagrā sthitiḥ //
SA15bsa075_u:809_5: arthāpattirato gatā kṣayamiyaṃ na dhvaṃsasiddhau prabhuḥ // iti //
SA15bsa075_u:810_0: yadi nāśānubhavo nāsti kapālānubhavāt kapālakalpanaiva syāt,
SA15bsa075_u:811_0: nanu ghaṭo naṣṭa iti buddhirviśeṣyabuddhiḥ / sā ca vināśaṃ viśeṣaṇamākṣipatīti cet / tadasat, yataḥ
SA15bsa075_u:813_0: ucyate / na cāvidyamānamadṛśyaṃ vā svabuddhyā kiñcidrañjayati /
SA15bsa075_u:813_1: prayogo 'trayasya na svarūpanirbhāsastanna kasyacit svānurakta pratītinimittam /
SA15bsa075_u:813_2: yathā karikeśaraḥ / nāsti ca svarūpanirbhāso dhvaṃsasyeti vyāpakānupalabdhiḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:813_4: na ca viruddhatā, sapakṣe bhāvāt / nāpyanaikāntikatvam, pratibhāsābhāve 'pi svānuraktapratītihetutve śaśaviṣāṇāderapi tathātvaṃ syādityatiprasaṅgaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:815_0: na dhvaṃsena vinā vinaśyati jagad bhāvena sārdhaṃ sacet
SA15bsa075_u:816_1: nādyaḥ pakṣaḥ, bhinnakāraṇatvāt, tairanabhyupagatatvācca / atha dvitīyaḥ pakṣa / tadā kaḥ punarbhāvasya pradveṣo yena pradhvaṃsākhye vastuni svahetorutpanne nivartate nāma /
SA15bsa075_u:817_3: atra svabhāvabhedairuttaraṃ vācyam ye parasparaparihārasthitayaḥ svahetubhyo jāyante /
SA15bsa075_u:817_4: na hi svato 'nyasyāṅkurasya vahnirna kāraṇamityanyatvāviśeṣād bhasmano 'pi na kāraṇam /
SA15bsa075_u:817_6: yathā cotpādasya purastādakhilasāmarthyarahitasyāṅkuraprāgabhāvasyāpakāraṃ kañcidakurvanto 'pi bījādayo 'ṅkuramārabhamāṇāḥ prāgabhāvaṃ nivartayanti,
SA15bsa075_u:817_12: taducitaṃ syād yadi kāryakāraṇayorivāsyā pyātmā pramāṇapratītaḥ syāt,
SA15bsa075_u:817_13: kevalaṃ dṛśyānupalambhagraste 'pyetasminnupalabhyata iti pralāpo vyaktamiyaṃ bhaṇḍavidyetyuktam /
SA15bsa075_u:817_14: arthāpattirapi kṣīṇetyapi prāgabhāvasya ca dṛṣṭāntatvenopanyāso bhaṇḍālekhyanyāyaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:819_2: sa ca dhvaṃso dhvaṃsāntaramupanayan saṃprati bhaved
SA15bsa075_u:819_3: virodhī so 'pyanyaṃ kṣayamiti na nāśaḥ kathamapi //
SA15bsa075_u:820_0: anyathā siddhasattāmātreṇa virodhitve sarvaṃ sarveṇa viruddhaṃ prasajyeta /
SA15bsa075_u:822_0: saccāsacca kimastu vastviti tu prasaṅgaḥ trilocanaprastāve nirākaraṇīyaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:822_1: ata evātra prastāve bhuvanaikagurūn bhagavataḥ kīrtipādānavamanyamānaḥ śaṅkaraḥ paśorapipaśuriti kṛpāpātramevaiṣa jālmaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:823_1: yā hi tasya prāktanī kācidavasthā bhavadbhirarthakriyānirvartanayogyā dṛṣṭā saiva yadyuttarakālamapyanuvartate tarhi svarūpeṇaiva nivṛtto bhāvaḥ kathamavasthāpyate /
SA15bsa075_u:823_2: tadānīmayaṃ naṣṭo nāma yadi svahetupratilabdhasvarūpavyatirekiṇī tasya kācidavasthotpadyeta,
SA15bsa075_u:823_3: utpattau saiva tasyātmāntaraṃ jātamityatādavasthyamevāsya vināśaṃ brūmaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:823_4: tādavasthye tādātmye ca svarūpeṇa nivṛtto bhāva ityasya śabdasya satyamarthaṃ na vidmaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:823_5: svarūpanivṛttiḥ khalviyaṃ bhavantī bhāva eva syāt,
SA15bsa075_u:823_6: bhāvādanyā vā / tattve svakāraṇebhyo niṣpannasyārthasyānyathānupapattāvutpatterārabhya sattvānnityatvaṃ prasajyeta /
SA15bsa075_u:823_7: anyatve ca tadeva nivṛtteranyatvanivṛtti(riti) priyamanuṣṭhitaṃ priyeṇa /
SA15bsa075_u:826_0: yathā hi deśāntaraparāvṛttamanīlādiparāvṛttaṃ ca svahetorutpannaṃ vastu tathā dvitīyakṣaṇāntaraparāvṛttamapi /
SA15bsa075_u:826_2: viruddhaṃ ca deśāntarāvasthāyitvenaiva tathā dvitīyakṣaṇāvasthāyitvaṃ prathamakṣaṇāvasthāyitvenāviruddham,
SA15bsa075_u:826_9: paramārthatastu dharmidharmayostādātmyaṃ vyāvṛttikṛto bhedavyavahāra iti apohasiddhau prasādhitam /
SA15bsa075_u:826_11: etāvati tu tattve vākchalamātrapravṛttā dveṣaviṣajvalitātmānaḥ kṣudrāḥ pralapantīti kimatra brūmaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:827_0: tataśca vyatiriktanivṛttyutpattimantareṇa svarūpanivṛtterupapatteḥ kathaṃ kṣaṇādūrdhvaṃ prāktanasattāvasthitiḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:827_2: na tvasyānyat kiñcij jāyeta, bhāvasya tādavasthyaprasaṅgāt /
SA15bsa075_u:827_4: na, tadanutpattimātraviṣayasya vācāniścayena ca paścādabhāvavyavahāramātrapravartanasyeṣṭatvād vastūtpattereva niṣiddhatvāt /
SA15bsa075_u:828_0: nanu keyaṃ vācoyuktiḥ, abhāvavyavahāramātramiṣyate paścānnābhāva iti /
SA15bsa075_u:828_2: abhāvaśca mithyeti bhāva eva pratiṣedhyasya syāt /
SA15bsa075_u:828_3: sa cābhāvaḥ paścā(d) bhavatīti sphuṭataramasya kādācitkatvātsahetukatvam,
SA15bsa075_u:828_4: vastutvaṃ ceti / asadetat, abhāvākhyavastvantarāsvīkāre 'pi pracyutimātrāpekṣayāpi vyavahārasya caritārthatvapratipādanāt /
SA15bsa075_u:829_2: na ca vastvantare pratipādite pratīte vā ghaṭādi vastubhūtamiti pratipāditaṃ pratītaṃ (#
SA15bsa075_u:829_3: Nibandh 123#) vā bhavati / evaṃ vastvantarameva nāśa iti asmin mate yad dūṣaṇamuktaṃ tat svayameva parihṛtaṃ syāditi,
SA15bsa075_u:829_4: tadapyasaṃbaddham, kevalaṃ hi bhūtalamasya viṣaya iti kathaṃ na ghaṭāderabhūtatvabodhaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:829_5: yaiva hi ghaṭādyapekṣayā kaivalyāvasthā pradeśasya sa eva ghaṭavirahaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:830_0: na ceha ghaṭo nāstīti pratyayasya ghaṭavatyapi pradeśe prasaṅgaḥ,
SA15bsa075_u:830_3: pūrvamasya nirākaraṇāt / na ca vināśahetorasāmarthyavaiyarthyābhidhāne 'ṅkurādihetorapi tathābhidhātumucitam /
SA15bsa075_u:830_5: siddhe ceyaṃ cintā, yadi hetornityo 'nityo vārtho jātaḥ kiṃ nāśakāraṇeneti hetupuraskāreṇaiva pravṛtteḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:831_4: na kasyacit kutaścid bhedavyavasthitirityadvaitaprasaṅga iti cet /
SA15bsa075_u:831_5: na / yo hi naśvarasvabhāvaḥ sa eva nāśoḥ,
SA15bsa075_u:831_8: naśanaṃ nāśa iti tu prasajyātmā dvidhā kartavyaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:831_9: tattvatastāvad vastutvavirahāt tattvānyatvavirahita evāsau bhāvo na bhavatīti tadbhāvaniṣedhamātrapātaṃ tu bhavati kharaśṛṅgādivat /
SA15bsa075_u:831_10: saṃvṛtau tu yathā kālabhedena vikalpyamānaḥ kādācitka iva pratibhāti tathā sarvopākhyāviraharūpatayā bhāvādbhinna iva pratibhātīti nāvastutvopalakṣaṇabhedākhyānavirodhaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:831_11: evaṃ ca sati saṃvṛttyā lakṣaṇabhede bhāvābhāvayorbhedasyeṣṭatvāt /
SA15bsa075_u:831_12: tatvena ca lakṣaṇaikatāvirahe bhāvasya tenaikyaniṣedhāt kathamadvaitaprasaṅgopālambhaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:832_0: syādetat / na ca vivekāpratītau tadviviktagrahaṇaṃ bhavati /
SA15bsa075_u:832_2: tadetannyāyabahiṣkṛtam / viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvo hi saṅkalpāruḍhe rūpe bāhyārthasparśe vikalpaśabdaliṅgāntarāṇāṃ vaiyarthyaprasaṅgāditi śāstre vistareṇa pratipādanāt /
SA15bsa075_u:832_7: abhinne 'pi bhāve bhedavivakṣāpekṣo bhedavyavahāraḥ kathaṃ bhedaniyatamātmānamātanotu /
SA15bsa075_u:833_0: skhaladgatirayaṃ rāhoḥ śira ityādinirdeśa iti cet /
SA15bsa075_u:833_1: yadi satyametat, tadā śiro 'tiriktasya rāhoriva kṣmātalāderatiriktasya vivekasya dṛśyānupalambhabādhitatvādayamapi nirdeśaḥ skhaladgatireva,
SA15bsa075_u:833_3: Nibandh 124#) pradeśāntarāt pradeśa evāyamanyo ghaṭaviviktaḥ svahetorutpanno na tu ghaṭavivekena viśeṣitaḥ,
SA15bsa075_u:834_0: vyāptaṃ bhidā yadi viśeṣyaviśeṣa(ṇa)tvaṃ bhedātyayānnanu tadā tadabhāva eva /
SA15bsa075_u:834_1: deśo viśiṣṭa iti cāsti yathā tathedamapyasti dṛśyamatabhedadṛgasti neti //
SA15bsa075_u:835_1: tadevaṃ sahetukavināśatvāditi hetuḥ svarūpāsiddha iti sthitam /
SA15bsa075_u:836_2: na cāsya viparyaye vṛttiśaṅkā nāśasya sahetukatvameva nivartayati,
SA15bsa075_u:837_5_0: tataśca kāraṇatvād yadi nāma prameyatvasya pūrvakālasattvena vyāptistathāpi prameyatvavat
SA15bsa075_u:838_2: tadeva ca saviṣayatvam / iyaṃ ca pratyāsattiranantarātīte 'pi kṣaṇe 'kṣīṇeti na dvitīyakṣaṇānuvṛtteranurodha ityuktam /
SA15bsa075_u:839_6: viṣayatvasyādyāpyaniścayāt / idaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ śrutaṃ vedamityadhyavasāyo yatrārthe sa viṣaya iti cet /
SA15bsa075_u:839_10: vyavahāro 'pi tvanmate niyato na syāditi brūmaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:839_11: asti tāvaditi cet / ata evārthasārūpyamasādhāraṇaṃ pratyāsattinimittamastu,
SA15bsa075_u:840_2: tacca kimekadeśena, sarvātmanā vā / ādye pakṣe sarvaṃ sarvasya vedanaṃ syāt /
SA15bsa075_u:840_4: kiṃ ca sārūpyādarthavedane 'nantaraṃ jñānaṃ tulyaviṣayaṃ viṣayaḥ syāditi cet /
SA15bsa075_u:840_6: ata eva sthūlagataṃ paramāṇugataṃ vā sārūpyaṃ na cintyate /
SA15bsa075_u:841_2: tathā hi upādānopādeyabhāvasthitacittasantatimapyāśrityeyaṃ vyavasthā sustheti kathamātmānaṃ pratyujjīvayatu /
SA15bsa075_u:841_4: tathāpi prāgbhāvivastuniścayajñānasyopādeyabhūtena tadarpitasaṃskāragarbheṇa paścādbhāvivastujñānenāsmin satīdaṃ bhavatīti niścayo janyate /
SA15bsa075_u:843_0: ata eva devadattenāgnau pratīte yajñadattena ca dhūme pratīte na kāryakāraṇabhāvagrahaṇaṃ tajjñānayorupādānopādeyabhāvābhāvāt /
SA15bsa075_u:843_2: anyathā satyapi nityātmani pratisandhātari kāryakāraṇabhāvādīnāmapratītireva syāt /
SA15bsa075_u:844_0: tathā hi ātmanaḥ sakāśāt pratisandheyabuddhīnāmabhedo bhedo vā bhedābhedo vā /
SA15bsa075_u:844_2: buddhya eva vā syuḥ pratisandheyā iti kaḥ pratisandhānārthaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:844_3: bhedapakṣa 'pi buddhibhyo bhidyamānasya jaḍasyātmanaḥ kaḥ pratisandhānārtha iti na vidmaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:844_5: Nibandh 126#) cet / buddhi reva tarhi draṣṭī pratisandhātrī cetī niyamasvīkāre tadyogādasya tathātvamiti kimanena yācitakamaṇḍanena /
SA15bsa075_u:844_8: yadi hi buddhirhetoḥ phalasya vā draṣṭrī syāt tadānantaryapratiniyamasya cānusandhātrī kalpitā /
SA15bsa075_u:844_9: tadyogād draṣṭṛtvaṃ pratisandhātṛtvaṃ cocyata iti syādapi prativiṣayamalabdhaviśeṣāyāṃ ca buddhau saṃbandho 'pi na viśeṣaṃ vyavahārayitumīśaḥ - adhunā nibandhanādhigantā,
SA15bsa075_u:844_10: adhunā phalasya, idānīṃ pratisandhāteti / tathāvidhabuddhigataviśeṣasvīkāre tu kimapareṇātmanā kartavyam,
SA15bsa075_u:845_1: kenaivaṃ pratārito 'si / aho mohamāhātmyaṃ yadīdṛśānapi paravaśīkaroti /
SA15bsa075_u:845_2: tathā hi nedamidamantareṇa yaducyate tat khalvanyatra pratyakṣānupalambhābhyāṃ sāmarthyāvadhāraṇe sati yujyate vahneriva dhūme,
SA15bsa075_u:845_3: cakṣurādivadvā dṛṣṭakāraṇāntarasāmagryā kāryādarśane paścād darśane ca kiñcidanyadapekṣaṇīyamastīti sāmānyākāreṇa /
SA15bsa075_u:846_1_0: dvitīyo 'pi na saṃbhavī / na hi kāraṇabuddhisamanantaraṃ kāryabuddhau satyāṃ niścayapravṛttasyedamasyānantaraṃ
SA15bsa075_u:846_1_1: dṛṣṭaṃ mayeti pratisandhānamadṛṣṭapūrvaṃ kadācit yato 'nyasya sāmarthyaparikalpanaṃ
SA15bsa075_u:847_2: tataśca yadbhinnaṃ bhinnamevābhinnaṃ cābhinnamiti naikasya bhedābhedau /
SA15bsa075_u:847_4: evaṃ kramivastugrāhakaiḥ kramijñānairupādānopādeyabhūtaiḥ sākṣāt pāramparyeṇa krameṇāmī jāyanta iti niścayo janyate /
SA15bsa075_u:847_5: aikakālikānekavastugrāhakaireva tajjñānairekopādānatvāt sakṛdimāni jātānīti vikalpaḥ kriyata iti kramākramagrahaṇamapyanavadyam /
SA15bsa075_u:849_1: na bhinnasaṃkhyā phalahetubādhinī na cānyasantānabhavā ivākṣamāḥ //
SA15bsa075_u:850_1: tābhyāṃ vāsanā, tayā hetuphalabhāvādhyavasāyī vikalpa iti cet /
SA15bsa075_u:850_4: na tāvat pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ, adṛṣṭānvayavyatirekasya puruṣasya hetuphalabhāvāgrahe 'nusandhānapratyayahetorvāsanāviśeṣasyaivānupapatteḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:851_1: tadetanna samyagālocitam / yato hetuphalabhūtayoḥ pūrvottarakṣaṇayorekaikena jñānenānanubhave 'pyupādānopādeyabhūtābhyāṃ kramijñānābhyāṃ hetuphalatve gṛhīte eva /
SA15bsa075_u:851_3: tadviṣayasāmarthyagrahaṇe 'pi phalādarśanāt tadavasāya evāpravṛttaḥ kāryadarśanena pravartyate /
SA15bsa075_u:851_4: tathā phalāvalokane 'pi tatkāryatā gṛhītaiva vikalpenānusandhīyata iti gṛhītānusandhānarūpa evāyaṃ vikalpa iti yatkiñcidetat /
SA15bsa075_u:854_2: upādānopādeyabhāvaniyamādeva ca na santānāntare smaraṇādiprasaṅgaḥ saṅgataḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:854_3: kimidamupādānamiti cet / ucyate / yatsantānanivṛttyā yadutpadyate tattasyopādānakāraṇam /
SA15bsa075_u:854_4: yathā mṛtsantānanivṛttyotpadyamānasya kumbhasya mṛdupādānamiti śāstre prapañcitam /
SA15bsa075_u:855_0: yadapyuktam - cittaśarīrayoḥ kiyatkālasthitinibandhanasya dṛṣṭasya nivṛttau cittasyāpi nivṛttiprasaṅgaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:855_8: yataḥ satyapyātmanyahameva mukto bhaviṣyāmi sukhī cetyātmagrahaṇakṣaṇādadhyavasāyāt pravartate /
SA15bsa075_u:855_10: sa cānādyavidyāparamparāyātaḥ pūrvāparayorekatvāropako mithyāsaṅkalpo bādhite 'pyātmanyavyāhataprasara iti kathamapravṛttiḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:857_0: apravṛttirevāstviti cet / astu, ko doṣaḥ / yadyayamātmagraho nirviṣayo 'pi pravṛttimanākṣipta kṣaṇamapi sthātuṃ (na) prabhavati /
SA15bsa075_u:857_2: Nibandh 128#) jñātavatopyapratikriyaputrādimaraṇe sorastāḍamākrando maraṇādau ca yatnaḥ śokodrekāt evamavidyodrekādeva nairātmyaṃ jānannapi pravartate,
SA15bsa075_u:857_7: sā ca kṣaṇike 'pyaviruddhā / upādānopādeyatā ca kramisvasaṃvedanajñānadvayena sākṣātkṛtā tatpṛṣṭhabhāvinā niścīyata iti,
SA15bsa075_u:857_8: asatyapyātmani pratisandhātari kāryakāraṇagrahaṇādaya upapadyamānā nātmānamupasthāpayituṃ prabhavanti /
SA15bsa075_u:857_9: ato 'rthāpattirati na kṣameti bhāgyahīnamanorājyamiva sthirasiddhirviśīryata eva /
SA15bsa075_u:862_0_0: iha khalu sakalajaḍapadārtharāśau pratyākhyāte nirākṛte ca nirākāravijñānavāde pratihate
SA15bsa075_u:862_0_3: vyavasthite yasya yadā yāvadākāracakrapratibhāsaṃ yadvijñānaṃ parisphurati tasya
SA15bsa075_u:863_0: atra ca vipratipattirnāma kiṃ citratāyāmadvaite vijñānatve sarvatraiveti vikalpāḥ //
SA15bsa075_u:864_2: anyathā śaśaviṣāṇādāviva jaḍamidamalīkaṃ vijñānaṃ veti vipratipattīnāmanavakāśaprasaṅgāt /
SA15bsa075_u:866_3: tasmāccitrateyamadvaitavirodhinīti vyāmohādekatva eva vipratiprattiriti tatra prasādhanaṃ sādhanamidamucyate /
SA15bsa075_u:867_0: yat prakāśate tadekam / yathā citrākāracakramadhyavartī nīlākāraḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:868_3: vicitrākāramadhyavartini nīlākāre dṛṣṭāntadharmiṇi prakāśamānatālakṣaṇasya sādhanasya dṛṣṭatvāt /
SA15bsa075_u:868_4: nanu caikatve sādhye yadaparamekatvādhikaraṇaṃ tadiha dṛṣṭāntīkartumucitam /
SA15bsa075_u:868_8: tataśca yathā citritākāracakrasyākārabhedato bhedastathā nīlākārasyāpi deśabhedato bhedaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:868_9: tadayaṃ sādhyaśūnyo dṛṣṭānto hetuśca vipakṣe paridṛśyamāno yadi tatraiva niyatastadā viruddhaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:869_1: atrocyate / yadi deśabhedato vijñānātmakasthūlanīlākārasya bhedastadāsya pratiparamāṇudeśabhede bhedasaṃbhavātu paramāṇupracayamātrātmako vijñānātmakasthūlanīlākāraḥ syāt /
SA15bsa075_u:869_2_0: tathā ca sati sarveṣāṃ vijñāna(a)tmakanīlaparamāṇūnāṃ svasvarūpanimagnatvena saṃtamasanimagnānekapuruṣavat
SA15bsa075_u:869_4: na caivaṃ vaktavyam paramāṇūnāṃ svarūpanimagnatve 'pyekopādānatayā puñjātmaiva sthūlaḥ sthūlamātmānaṃ jñāsyatīti,
SA15bsa075_u:869_5: satyapyekopādānatve svasvarūpanimagnatvādeva sthūlavyavasthāpakasya bhinnasyātmano 'nyonyaṃ vā grāhyagrāhakabhāvasyāyogāt /
SA15bsa075_u:871_0: ityasyānupadatvāt / na ca yathā bāhyārthavāde sthūlaikākārajñānapratibhāsa eva bāhyaparamāṇupracayapratibhāsavyavasthā gatyantarābhāvāt,
SA15bsa075_u:871_3: tasmād yāvad yāvat pratibhāsastāvattāvat sthūlatayaiva vyāptaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:871_4: asthūle paramāṇau sthūlanivṛttimātre ca pratibhāsasya dṛśyānupalambhabādhitatvāt /
SA15bsa075_u:871_5: yathā prasiddhānumāne sattvaṃ kṣaṇikatvena vyāptaṃ kramākramakāritvenāpi,
SA15bsa075_u:871_6: kṣaṇikatvābhāvācca karmākramanivṛttau nivartamānaṃ kṣaṇikatve niyataṃ sidhyati,
SA15bsa075_u:871_8: ekatvābhāvācca vipakṣāt paramāṇupuñjātmana ekatvanivṛttimātrātmanaśca svaviruddhopalambhāt sthaulyasya vyāpakasya nivṛttau nivartamānamekatvaṃ niyataṃ sidhyati /
SA15bsa075_u:871_9: tataśca yathā bahirvyāptipakṣe ghaṭe dṛṣṭāntadharmiṇi viparyayabādhakapramāṇabalāt sattvaṃ kṣaṇikatvaniyatamavadhārya sattvāt pakṣe kṣaṇabhaṅgasiddhiḥ,
SA15bsa075_u:871_10_0: ta(thā) trāpi nīlākāre dṛṣṭāntadharmiṇi viparyayabādhakapramāṇabalādeva prakāśamānatvamekatvaniyatamavagamya
SA15bsa075_u:871_10_1: prakāśamānatvād vicitrākāracakre sādhyadharmiṇyekatvasiddhiriti na dṛṣṭāntasya sādhyaśūnyatvam /
SA15bsa075_u:872_1: tasmācca vipakṣāddhetuvyatirekapratipattyavasare kiṃ vipakṣātmā prakāśate na vā /
SA15bsa075_u:872_4: vipakṣe 'pi dṛṣṭatvāt / atha na prakāśate tadā sandigdhavyatirekitvam,
SA15bsa075_u:873_0: atrocyate / iha dvividho vijñānānāṃ viṣayaḥ grāhyo 'dhyavaseyaśca /
SA15bsa075_u:873_4: pratibhāse ca deśakālasvabhāvāntaritasakalavipakṣa sākṣātkāre sādhyātmāpi varākaḥ sutarāṃ pratīyata ityanumānavaiyarthyam /
SA15bsa075_u:873_7: yadi punarasyādhyavasāyo 'pi na syāttadā vyatireko na niścīyata iti yuktam,
SA15bsa075_u:874_0: nanvasmanmate vastvavastvātmakasakalavipakṣapratipattisaṃbhavāt tato hetuvyatirekaḥ saṃpratyetuṃ śakyata eva /
SA15bsa075_u:874_6: tadetadasaṅgatam / tathā hi dhūmādiravahnyādervipakṣād vyāvṛtto vahnyādiniyataḥ sidhyati,
SA15bsa075_u:874_7: tasya ca vastvavastvātmakasakalavipakṣapadārtharāśeḥ svarūpanirbhāsa iti kiṃ nirvikalpakajñāne kalpanāyāṃ vā /
SA15bsa075_u:874_8: nirvikalpe cet / pratibhāsa iti ca ko 'rthaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:874_9: kiṃ nirākāre jñāne sakalavipakṣādisvarūpasya sākṣāt sphuraṇam,
SA15bsa075_u:875_0: na tāvadādyaḥ pakṣo yuktaḥ, deśakālasvabhāvaviprakṛṣṭānāṃ padārthānāmarvācīne jane nirākāre ca jñāne sphuraṇāyogādityasyārthasya śāstre eva vistareṇa prasādhanāt /
SA15bsa075_u:877_0: na ca tṛtīyaḥ saṅgataḥ, sādṛśyasaṃbhave 'pi samanantarabalādevāyātasya bāhyena saha pratyāsatterabhāvāt /
SA15bsa075_u:878_1: asatprakāśayorvirodhāt, sphurato 'lokatvāyogāt / tathā hyasatprakāśa iti kimasadīśvarādeḥ khyātiḥ,
SA15bsa075_u:878_2: bhāsamāno vā ākāro 'san, san vā na kaścit khyātīti vivakṣitam /
SA15bsa075_u:878_3: tatra yasya padārthasya svarūpaparinirbhāsaḥ sa kathamasanniti prāṇadhāribhirabhidhātavyaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:878_5: Nibandh 132#) bāhyarūpatayā bādhyatve 'pi jñānarūpatayārthatvasya ācāryeṇa pratipāditatvāt grāhakābhimatanirākāraprakāśasyāpyasattvābhidhānaprasaṅgāt /
SA15bsa075_u:879_1_0: kiṃ tad bādhakam, pratyakṣamanumānaṃ vā / yadyekatra svarūpasākṣātkāriṇi pratyakṣe
SA15bsa075_u:883_0: iti cet / na / bādhyasyāpratibhāsanāt / pratibhāsinaścābādhyatvāt / tathā hi
SA15bsa075_u:884_0: etena bhāsamāno vā ākāro 'sanniti dvitīyo 'pi pakṣaḥ pratikṣiptaḥ,
SA15bsa075_u:885_0: tathā san vā kaścinna khyātīti tṛtīyasaṅkalpo 'pi vyākulaḥ,
SA15bsa075_u:886_0: nanu prakāśo nāmaḥ vastunaḥ sattāsādhakaṃ pramāṇam /
SA15bsa075_u:886_2: arthakriyāśaktistu sattvam / taccāprakāśasyāpi na virudhyata iti cet /
SA15bsa075_u:886_5: sarvathā bahirabhāve tu jñānasya prakāśāvyabhicārāttāvataiva sattve kimarthakriyayā /
SA15bsa075_u:887_1: nārthakriyāpi sarvasmai kvacicced bhāsanaṃ na kim //
SA15bsa075_u:888_0: iti / nirvikalpe tāvat svasaṃvedanasiddhasvākāramantareṇa vipakṣādayo na parisphuranti /
SA15bsa075_u:888_1: athāmī vikalpe pratibhāsanta iti dvitīyaḥ saṅkalpo 'bhyupagamyate,
SA15bsa075_u:888_2: asminnapi pakṣe pratibhāsamāna ākāro 'sādhāraṇo 'śabdasaṃsṛṣṭatayā svasaṃvedanatādātmye praviṣṭatvādvastusanneva /
SA15bsa075_u:889_1: tadāpi teṣāṃ svarūpasya nirbhāso 'sti na vā /
SA15bsa075_u:891_0: uktam / tasya cetarapratyakṣeṣviva vikalpe 'pi svīkāre viruddhavyāptopalambhena vikalpabhrāntatvayordūramapāstatvādvikalpe 'pi tvanmate pratyakṣatvamakṣatam /
SA15bsa075_u:892_2: atha vipakṣādirartho 'smin prakāśata iti vācā svarūpasākṣātkāritvaṃ kathitamiti mātā me bandhyeti vṛttāntaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:892_3: iṣyate ca tvayā vipakṣādisvarūpasākṣātkāritvaṃ bikalpasyeti pratyakṣatānatikramaḥ,
SA15bsa075_u:892_5: tataśca tatpratibhāsino 'pi rūpasya sata eva khyātirnāsatkhyātiḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:892_6: na ca tadeva vikalpe parisphuradrūpamasatāmīśvarādīnāṃ svarūpam,
SA15bsa075_u:896_2: yadi nādhyakṣatā tasya rūpanirbhāsa eva na /
SA15bsa075_u:896_4: yadi tu pratibhāseta rūpamasya sadeva tat /
SA15bsa075_u:897_6: yadi vā svākāre bāhyāropaḥ, bāhye vā svākārāropaḥ, svākārabāhyayoryojanā, tayorekīkaraṇamekapratipattirabhedena pratipattiḥ bhedāgraho 'dhyavasāyārtha iti vikalpāḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:900_1: tathā hi jñānaṃ kenacidākāreṇa satyenālīkena vopajātaṃ nāma /
SA15bsa075_u:900_3: tatkṛtatve na tāvat tatkāla eva vyāpārāntaramanubhūyata iti kutastadāropaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:900_4: kālāntare ca svayamevāsat kasya vyāpāraḥ syāt /
SA15bsa075_u:901_0: dvitīyapakṣe jñānāntaramapi nākārāroparāgasaṅginīmutpattimantareṇa vyāpārāntareṇa kvacit kiñcitkaraṃ nāma /
SA15bsa075_u:901_5: tatra buddhau yadi svarūpeṇa sphurati satyapratītirevāsau,
SA15bsa075_u:901_6: ka āropaḥ / atha na parisphurati tathāpi ka āropaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:902_1: na / tasyāropaviṣayatvāt / na hi marīcisphuraṇameva jalasphuraṇamiti na svākāre bāhyāropaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:902_6: ko 'yamekīkaraṇārthaḥ / yadyekatāpattau prayojakatvaṃ tadāropyāropaviṣayayoḥ kadācidekībhāvābhāvādasaṃbhava eva /
SA15bsa075_u:904_3: bhedena pratītiniṣedhamātre 'pi na bāhyasya pratītirukteti kutastadadhyavasāyaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:904_4: yadi hi bāhyaṃ prakāśeta ekatvenānekatvena vā satā asatā vā pratītiriti yuktam /
SA15bsa075_u:905_3: na / niraṃśatvādvastunaḥ sarvātmanā pratibhāso 'pratibhāso veti śāstramevātra vistareṇa parīkṣyate /
SA15bsa075_u:906_2: tathā hi kiṃ bāhye gṛhyamāṇe 'gṛhyamāṇe vā /
SA15bsa075_u:906_3: na ca prathamaḥ pakṣaḥ, bāhyagrahaṇasya pratikṣiptatvāt /
SA15bsa075_u:906_5: agṛhyamāṇe tu bāhye pravṛttiniyamo na syāt,
SA15bsa075_u:907_1: ko 'yamadhyavasāyaḥ / kiṃ grahaṇam, ahosvit karaṇam, uta yojanā, atha samāropaḥ / tatra svābhāsamanarthamartha kathaṃ gṛhṇīyāt,
SA15bsa075_u:907_2: kuryād vā vikalpaḥ / na hi nīlaṃ pītaṃ śakyaṃ grahītuṃ kartuṃ vā śilpakuśalenāpi /
SA15bsa075_u:907_7: tatra kiṃ gṛhītvā āropayati, atha yadaiva svākāraṃ gṛhṇāti tadaivāropayati /
SA15bsa075_u:907_8: nādyaḥ / na hi kṣaṇikaṃ vikalpavijñānaṃ kramavantau grahaṇasamāropau kartumarhati /
SA15bsa075_u:907_9: uttarasmiṃstu kalpe 'vikalpasvasaṃvedanapratyakṣādvikalpākārādahaṅkārāspadādanahaṅkārāspadaḥ samāropyamāṇo vikalpena svagocaro na śakyo 'bhinnaḥ pratipattum /
SA15bsa075_u:908_4: na tāvat pūrvaḥ kalpaḥ, anubhavasamāropayorvikalpāvikalparūpatayā dravakaṭhinavattādātmyānupapatteḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:908_6: na tāvat kramaḥ, kṣaṇikasya vijñānasya kramavadvyāpārāyogāt /
SA15bsa075_u:908_13: na tvātmā vedyamānaḥ samāropito nārthaḥ samāropyamāṇaḥ pratyakṣavedyaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:908_14: sa ca samāropaḥ sato 'sato vā grahaṇameva /
SA15bsa075_u:909_0: svapratibhāsasya bāhyādbhedāgraho bāhyasamāropastato bāhye vṛttiriti cet /
SA15bsa075_u:909_1: sa kiṃ gṛhyamāṇe bāhye na vā /
SA15bsa075_u:909_2: na tāvad gṛhyamāṇe / uktaṃ hyetanna tadgrahaṇaṃ saṃbhavatīti /
SA15bsa075_u:909_3: agṛhyamāṇe tu bhedāgrahe na pravṛttiniyamaḥ syāt,
SA15bsa075_u:909_5: tasmād yathā yathāyamadhyavasāyaścintyate tathā tathā viśīryata eva /
SA15bsa075_u:909_6: tathā vikalpāropābhimānagrahaniścayādayo 'pyadhyavasāyavat svākāraparyavasitā eva sphuranto bāhyasya vārtāmātramapi na (#
SA15bsa075_u:909_7: Nibandh 136#) jānantītyadhyavasāyasvabhāvā eva śabdapravṛttimittabhede 'pi tatkathaṃ yuktyāgamabahirbhūto 'nātmasphuraṇamācakṣīta /
SA15bsa075_u:910_1: vikalpa ityadhyavasāyaityāropa ityabhimāna iti graha iti niścaya ityādikaṃ śāstre pratipadaṃ pratipāditam,
SA15bsa075_u:910_3: nyāyavirodhaśca / tathā hi savareva prakārairaviparītasvarūpasaṃvedanād bhrānteratyantamabhāvaḥ syāt /
SA15bsa075_u:911_2: prakāśamāno vā kathamasau tasyāṃ na prakāśate /
SA15bsa075_u:911_5: bhaviṣyati śaṅkho 'styātmā, nityaḥ śabda iti sarvātmanā ca niścayaḥ syāt /
SA15bsa075_u:911_6: gauriti spaṣṭena ca svena lakṣaṇena prakāśeta /
SA15bsa075_u:911_7: svalakṣaṇe ca saṅketāyogāt vikalpikaiva sā buddhirna syāt /
SA15bsa075_u:911_8: tasmādaśeṣagovyaktisādhāraṇena gotvena gobuddhiralīkena sābhilāpena viplavāt prakhyātīti tathā prakāśanamasyā gavārthāvasāya ityeṣṭavyam /
SA15bsa075_u:911_9: evaṃ hyete doṣā na syuḥ, apratibhāsamānasyāpi svalakṣaṇasya bhrāntyāvasāyāditi /
SA15bsa075_u:912_0: atrābhidhīyate / na tāvallokaśāstravirodhau, agṛhīte 'pi bāhye pravṛttinivṛttyādisamarthanāt svaparavādiduratikramādhyavasāyasvarūpanirvacanāt /
SA15bsa075_u:913_0: tathā hi kā punariyaṃ bhrāntirasatkhyātiratasmiṃstadgraho vā yadabhāvādidānīmeva muktirāsajyate /
SA15bsa075_u:914_0: na tāvadādyaḥ pakṣaḥ, asatkhyāteḥ pratyākhyānāt / yadāhurguravaḥ
SA15bsa075_u:915_0: yasya svarūpanirbhāso bādhakād yadi tanna sat /
SA15bsa075_u:915_6: nānyā va bhāvinītyatra pramāṇaṃ kiñcidasti vaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:916_0: śāstre ca atasmiṃstadgrahāt svapratibhāse 'narthe 'rthādhyavasāyād dṛśyavikalpyayorekīkaraṇād bhrāntiruktā /
SA15bsa075_u:916_1: tāmayaṃ samarthayitumasamarthaḥ svātantryeṇālīkasphuraṇaṃ bhrāntiriti kāvyaṃ viracayya vistārayati /
SA15bsa075_u:917_0: nanvatasmiṃstadgraho 'pi bhramaḥ svākāraparyavasitajñānādatirikto bahubhirbahudhā vicāryaṃ pratyākhyātaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:917_1: tat kathaṃ tasminnapi pakṣe na bhrāntikṣatiryenedānīmeva muktiprasaṅgo na syāditi cet /
SA15bsa075_u:917_6: kaiścidapyanudbhinnatvāt / ayameva ca saṃsārastatkṣayo mokṣa iti kvedānīmeva tadvārtāpi /
SA15bsa075_u:917_7: tathā hi vicitrānādivāsanāvaśāt prabodhakapratyayaviśeṣāpekṣayā vikalpaḥ kenacidākāreṇopajāyamāna eva bahirmukhapravṛttyanukūlamarthakriyāsmaraṇābhilāṣādiprabandhamādhatte /
SA15bsa075_u:917_12: yathā candrādijñānasya bhrāntasyābhrāntasya vā taddarśanāvasāyajananameva grahaṇavyāpāraḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:920_0: nanu tathā ca tacca tena pratipādyate na ca tajjñāne tat prakāśata iti śapathenāpi na saṃpratyaya iti cet /
SA15bsa075_u:920_1_0: asaṃbaddhametat / na hyadhyavasāyād bāhyasya paṭādervastuno bādhakāvatārāt pūrvasandigdhavastubhāvasya
SA15bsa075_u:920_1_1: kṣaṇikāderavastuno vā śaśaviṣāṇāderasphuraṇe 'pi siddhipratibandho brahmaṇāpi pratividhātuṃ
SA15bsa075_u:920_5: tataśca tena ca tat pratipādyate na ca jñāne tatprakāśa iti saṅgatirastyeva,
SA15bsa075_u:921_1: nanu yadi nādhyavaseyapratītistadāgṛhīte 'pi svalakṣaṇādau pravṛttiriti sarvatrāviśeṣeṇa prasajyeta,
SA15bsa075_u:921_11: tathehāpi hutavahākārasya vikalpasya dāhapākādyarthakriyārthinastatsmaraṇavato hutavahaviṣayāyāmeva pravṛttau sāmarthyaṃ pramāṇapratītaṃ kathamatiprasaṅgabhāgi /
SA15bsa075_u:922_0: nanu ca sādṛśyāropeṇa kiṃ svākārasya bāhye svākāre vā bāhyasyāropaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:922_3: kiṃ tarhi, svavāsanāparipākavaśādupajāyamānaiva sā buddhirapaśyantyapi bāhayaṃ bāhaye pravṛttimātanotīti viplutaiva saṃsārātmikā ca /
SA15bsa075_u:924_4: sa ca niyamo yathā darśanād vastupratibandhakṛtaḥ,
SA15bsa075_u:924_5: tathā vikalpaviśeṣādapi pāramparyeṇa vastuprativastupratibandhakṛta ityadarśane 'pi adhyavasāyāt pravṛttiryujyata iti nānumānamanavasthitam /
SA15bsa075_u:924_6: etena tacca na pratīyate, tena cābhedābhāsanamityupālambho 'saṃbhavītyupadarśitam,
SA15bsa075_u:926_2: tato yadyapi tattvena nāropo nāma kasyacit /
SA15bsa075_u:926_5: bhrama eva hi saṃsāro nirvāṇaṃ tattvasaṃsthitiḥ //
SA15bsa075_u:926_7: tataśca yāvanna vicārasaṃbhavo bhavo 'yamanyaḥ śama ityayaṃ nayaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:926_8: vicāralīlālalite tu mānase bhavaḥ śamo vā ka iheti kathyatām //
SA15bsa075_u:928_0: na cāntaraṃ kiṃcana vidyate 'nayoḥ sadarthavṛttyā śamajanmanoriha /
SA15bsa075_u:928_1: tathāpi janmakṣayato vidhīyate śamasya lābhaḥ śubhakarmakāriṇām //
SA15bsa075_u:930_0: nirvāṇaṃ ca bhavaścaiva dvayameva na vidyate /
SA15bsa075_u:932_0: yadapyuktaṃ vikalpasyāviṣayaśca bāhyam grahaṇaṃ cāsya śabdena saṃyojyeti vikalpatvamapi duryojam,
SA15bsa075_u:932_1: ātmani ca śabdayojanā nāstīti vikalpo nāma nāstyeva,
SA15bsa075_u:932_2: tatkasya vikalpacinteti / atrabhidhīyate / ihāgniratretyadhyavasāyo yathā kāyikīṃ vṛttiṃ prasūte tathāgnirmayā pratīyata iti vācikīmapi prasūte,
SA15bsa075_u:932_4: evaṃ ca sati yathā vikalpenāyamartho gṛhīta iti niścayaḥ,
SA15bsa075_u:933_0: na śabdaiḥ saṃsargaḥ kvacidapi bahirvā manasi vā-
SA15bsa075_u:933_3: vidhatte tau bāhye vacasi ca vikalpasthitirataḥ //
SA15bsa075_u:933_4: abhāne pratibhāne vā na cāropo 'pi kasyacit /
SA15bsa075_u:933_9: saṅketaḥ kṛta ityāsthā tādṛk śabdaśrutau punaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:935_0: tasmād vastu vā ghaṭapaṭādi sandigdhavastu vā sādhakabādhakātikrāntam,
SA15bsa075_u:935_4: tasmādadhyavasāyasyākāraviśeṣayogādagṛhīte 'pi pravartanayogyatā nāma yo dharmastayā bāhyādhyavasāyayorgrāhyagrāhakabhāvaścet saṃvṛttyā duṣpariharaḥ,
SA15bsa075_u:935_5: tadā viṣayiviṣayabhāvo 'pi labdha ityadhyavasāyamātreṇa viṣayaviṣayitvamuktamiti yuktam /
SA15bsa075_u:937_0: etena yaduktam kathamavasīyamānastayātmārtho na prakāśyata ityādi,
SA15bsa075_u:937_6: na caikākārollekhino vikalpasyākārāntare pravartanaśaktiranubhavaviṣaya iti kutaḥ śabdapramāṇāntarānapekṣeti yuktam /
SA15bsa075_u:937_9: yathā ca bāhye sati kvacid bhramavyavasthā tathāntarnaye 'pi sarvatra /
SA15bsa075_u:937_10: kevalaṃ bahirmukhapravṛtyapekṣayā kriyamāṇo nātmani kaścid bhrama ityuktaṃ bhavati /
SA15bsa075_u:937_12: svākārasyaiva sphuraṇāt, svalakṣaṇe ca saṃketāyogāt / vikalpikaiva na syāditi tu svarūpāpekṣayā siddhasādhanam /
SA15bsa075_u:937_14: tasmādaśeṣagovyaktisādhāraṇena gotvena gobuddhiralīkena sābhilāpena viplavāt prakhyātīti tathā prakhyānamasyā gavāvasāya ityeṣṭavyamityapi neṣṭavyameva,
SA15bsa075_u:937_16: na hi vikalpabuddhāvalīkākārasphuraṇameva bāhyasyādhyabasāya iti kācidarthasaṅgatiḥ,
SA15bsa075_u:937_19: kathamadhyavasāyaḥ / apratibhāsamānasyāpi svalakṣaṇasya bhrāntyāvasāyāditi tu na budhyāmahe /
SA15bsa075_u:939_1: iti ācāryaḥ smaryatām / na ca tadāsau bhrāntirbhavitumarhati, vastusvarūpasyaiva nirbhāsāt //
SA15bsa075_u:940_1: saiva sa iti cet / alīkamidamiti viduṣo bāhyādhyavasāyavyasthābhāvāt,
SA15bsa075_u:940_5: tadevamapratibhāsino 'pi vipakṣādadhyavasāyamātrasiddhādeva vyāvṛtto doṣatrayanirmuktaḥ prakāśamānatātmako heturyāvatprakāśāvadhijñānātmakacitrākāracakrasyaikatvaṃ sādhayatyeva /
SA15bsa075_u:942_12: tannāstu sādhyo dṛṣṭānto na ca śaṅkāviparyaye /
SA15bsa075_u:944_1: sthaulyenāpyaṇuśo na hi kvacididaṃ svapne 'pi nirbhāsanam /
SA15bsa075_u:946_4: Nibandh 142#) vā / prathamapakṣe, āstāṃ tāvadeṣāmato bhedasiddhiḥ,
SA15bsa075_u:946_5: sattāmātramapi na sidhyet / sa hi nīlādiko 'rtho jaḍo vijñānāntarātmālīkasvabhāvo vā svīkartavyaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:946_7: tathā hi jñānasya prakāśakatvaṃ nāma kiṃ vidyamānatvaṃ vyāpārāveśo vā /
SA15bsa075_u:947_0: atha jñānatve sati vidyamānatvamiti saviśeṣaṇaṃ lakṣaṇamucyate /
SA15bsa075_u:947_2: yena sattāmātreṇa samasamayaṃ sphuratorvijñānanīlādyoḥ pratijñāmātrādekasya jaḍatvālīkatvabādhyatvāprakāśatvādi vyavasthāpyate /
SA15bsa075_u:948_0: atha dvitīyastadā sa kiṃ vyāpāraḥ pratyakṣasyātmā jñānāntaram,
SA15bsa075_u:948_3: dvitīyapakṣe jñānāntaraṃ yadyanyaviṣayam arthasya na kiñcit /
SA15bsa075_u:949_0: tṛtīye punaḥ saṅkalpe nīlādikaṃ kṛtameva syāt,
SA15bsa075_u:949_2: prakāśastu svayameva / tathā ca jñānāntaratvāt santānāntaravadapratibhāsaprasaṅgaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:950_0: caturthe tu vikalpe arthāntare kṛte nīlādikaṃ tadavasthameva /
SA15bsa075_u:950_3: na cāgnidhūmayoḥ kāryakāraṇabhāva iva jñānajñeyayorapi svābhāviko grāhyagrāhakabhāvo vaktavyaḥ,
SA15bsa075_u:950_4: pramāṇasiddhakāryakāraṇabhāvavad grāhyagrāhakasvarūpayoradyāpi nirvaktumaśakyatvāditi kva nīlādivārtāpi yadbhedasiddhipratyāśā pratyakṣataḥ sampadyate /
SA15bsa075_u:951_2: tacca yadi pratyākāraṃ bhinnaṃ tadā sarveṣāṃ svasvarūpanimagnatvāccitraprakāśapraṇāśaprasaṅga ityuktam /
SA15bsa075_u:953_1: jñānānyabhinnāni sahopalabdheḥ, pūrvāparatvaṃ tu na vedyameva // iti /
SA15bsa075_u:954_2: ata eva svasaṃvedanapratyakṣādanumānācca ekatvasiddhau na pratyakṣāntaram /
SA15bsa075_u:955_0: nanu brūyānnāma kiñcit, tathāpi pratibhāsabhedād bheda eva,
SA15bsa075_u:955_4: tatra yadi prathamaḥ pakṣaḥ, tadā bāhye 'rthe pratyetavye buddhyākāraḥ pramāṇam /
SA15bsa075_u:955_7: yadā punarākāracakrameva prameyam svasaṃvedanaṃ ca pramāṇaṃ tadā tenaiva nīlādīnāṃ svabhāvabhūtenākhaṇḍātmanā ekīkṛtānāṃ kathamapramādī bhedamācakṣīta /
SA15bsa075_u:956_1_0: tathāpi kathaṃ bhedastasmād yathordhvamindriyapratyakṣataḥ kṣaṇabhede pratīte 'pyavidyāvaśādekatvādhyavasāyaḥ
SA15bsa075_u:957_0: yadyevaṃ viruddhadharmādhyāsato vijñānākāracakravad vyāpto 'pi na bhidyeteti cet /
SA15bsa075_u:957_2: buddhyākārakadambake tūktakrameṇa svasaṃvedanādisiddhaikatve 'nekatvasya pratyākhyānād bādhakāvatāra eva nāsti /
SA15bsa075_u:957_3: tasmād vijñānatve satīti hetuviśeṣaṇaṃ kartavyam yena bāhyasyaiva bhedaḥ sidhyati /
SA15bsa075_u:958_0: nanu yadi vijñānātmakaṃ vicitrākāracakramekaṃ tadā nīlākāra eva pītādyākāravṛndaṃ praviśet /
SA15bsa075_u:958_3: asadetat / tathā hi dvayorapyanayoḥ prasaṅgaviparyayayoḥ bhedaḥ,
SA15bsa075_u:958_7: tato 'pi viparyayasya bhedasya siddheḥ prasaṅgo 'pyasaṅgataḥ ityadvaitameva /
SA15bsa075_u:959_0: kiṃ ca evaṃ sthūlanīlādyākāro 'pi paramāṇumātre praviśedityapratibhāsaṃjagadāpadyeta /
SA15bsa075_u:959_3: tathā kṛtakatvasyānityatvavastutvādibhirabhede kṛtakatvamevānityatvameva vā syādityapi prasaṅgo vaktavya āpadyeta,
SA15bsa075_u:961_2: buddhistu naśyati bhidaiva vidaiva sattvāccitrāpyato na bhidameti kimatra kurmaḥ //
SA15bsa075_u:963_1: buddheḥ svavittiniṣṭhāyāḥ yaḥ parastasya kā gatiḥ //
SA15bsa075_u:965_2: neṣṭaṃ tadapi cet tarhi kvāṇvantarbhidi bhāsanam /
SA15bsa075_u:965_3: na parīkṣākṣamaṃ cāṇuḥ kutastasya tadā bhidā //
SA15bsa075_u:965_15: vastuvyavasthā śaraṇaṃ kiṃ tu mānena saṅgatam //
SA15bsa075_u:965_17: yasya rāśiranekaṃ syānnāpi vastu ca kiñcina //
SA15bsa075_u:967_0: grāhayaṃ na tasya grahaṇaṃ (na) tena jñānāntaragrāhayatāpi śūnyaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:967_1: tathāpi ca jñānamayaḥ prakāśaḥ pratyakṣapakṣastu tavāvirāsīt //
SA15bsa075_u:972_11: atha dvitīyo vikalpaḥ / tathā hīcchācittamātraṃ svaparasantānasādhāraṇadṛśyādṛśyaviśeṣaṇānapekṣaṃ vyāhārādyābhāsaṃ prati kāraṇatayāvadhāryate /
SA15bsa075_u:972_14: na cecchāmātrasya svaparasantānasādhāraṇasya svasaṃvedanenānyena vābhāvaḥ śakyāvagamaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:972_15: yathā hi vahnimātrasya deśakālavyavahitasyāpi dhūmotpādadeśakālayoryadi syādupalabhyetaiva mayeti saṃbhāvitasyānumātṛpuruṣendriyapratyakṣeṇa (#
SA15bsa075_u:972_16: Nibandh 146#) dhūmotpādāt prāgabhāve 'vadhāryamāṇastadutpattisiddhimadhyāsayatīti vyavahitadeśakālasyāpi vahnerdhūmamātraṃ prati kāraṇatvāvadhāraṇam,
SA15bsa075_u:972_18: tathātrāpīcchācittaṃ parasantānasādhāraṇamapi yāvadyadīya syādupalabhyetaiva mayeti yadi saṃbhāvayituṃ śakyeta tadā tadvyatirekasiddhidvāreṇa kāraṇatayāvadhāryate /
SA15bsa075_u:974_0: nāpi deśaviprakṛṣṭam, yasminneva hi śuklaśaṅkhādideśe svacittaṃ śuklākārapratibhāsi svasaṃvedanena vedyate taddeśavartyeva pītākārapratibhāsi parasantānabhāvi cittaṃ na vedyate /
SA15bsa075_u:975_1: na hyagnirapyeko yenaivendriyavijñānena dṛśyate tenaivānyo 'pi dṛśyam /
SA15bsa075_u:975_2: tatra yathā cakṣurvijñānamātrāpekṣayā agnimātraṃ dṛśyamiti vyavasthāpyate tathātrāpi svasaṃvedanamātrāpekṣayā icchācittamātraṃ svaparasantānasādhāraṇamapi dṛśyameveti /
SA15bsa075_u:976_0: atrocyate / kimatra mātraśabdenānumātṛpuruṣasaṃbandhāsaṃbandhābhyāmaviśeṣitaṃ yasya kasyacit puruṣasyendriyajñānaṃ vastuviṣayīkurvāṇamasya dṛśyatāsaṃbhave 'pinānimitamabhimatam /
SA15bsa075_u:976_2: so 'pi hi kasyacit puṃso yogyādeḥ svajātīyasya vā piśācāntarasya bhavatyevendriyajñānagocara iti na kaścit svabhāvaviprakṛṣṭaḥ syāt /
SA15bsa075_u:976_3: tasmādanumātṛpuruṣasaṃbandhitvamanapāsya vijñānasya svalakṣaṇādibhedanirāsapara eva mātraśabdo yuktaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:978_0: ityādi / tenaivaṃ dṛśyatāsaṃbhāvanā yadīha deśe kāle vā syād ghaṭādirniyamenopalabhyeta,
SA15bsa075_u:978_2: paracitte tu na śakyamevam / yadīha paracittaṃ syāt niyamena madīyasya svasaṃveda(na) mātrasya viṣayi syāditi /
SA15bsa075_u:979_1: tadānumānakāle 'pi dṛśyatayā saṃbhāvya tadanupalambhenābhāvasādhane kathamanumānaṃ pravartayitumidamārabdham,
SA15bsa075_u:979_2: pratyakṣeṇaiva pakṣabādhāt / na ca kālabhedena svabhāvaviprakarṣetarāviti yatkiñcidetat /
SA15bsa075_u:979_5: kiṃ tu tasya dṛśyānupalambhājjijñāsitaviśeṣe dharmiṇi bādhitasya kathamanumānamityuktameva /
SA15bsa075_u:980_2: icchācittamātre 'pi svaparasantānasādhāraṇe sādhye yadyanupalambhamātreṇa dṛśya viśeṣaṇānapekṣeṇa pratibandhasiddhisamaye tasyābhāvaḥ pratīyate,
SA15bsa075_u:980_3: tadā pakṣīkṛte dharmiṇi tatheti sa eva doṣaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:980_4: atha na pratīyate tadā sandigdhavyatireko hetvābhāso vyāhārādiriti sthitam /
SA15bsa075_u:981_0: evaṃ tarhi santānāntarasādhakasyābhāvād bādhakasyāpi kasyacidadarśanādbhavatu tatra sandeha eveti kecit /
SA15bsa075_u:981_2: yadi hi santānāntaraṃ saṃbhavet tadā tato bhedena svasantānasyāvaśyaṃ bhavitavyam /
SA15bsa075_u:981_3: anyathā svasantānādapi prakāśamānāttasya parasantānābhimatasya bhedo na syāt /
SA15bsa075_u:981_4: na cābhedastayoriti svasantānād bhedābhedābhyāmabādhyasya parasantānasya sāmānyaśaśaviṣāṇādivadabhāva evāyāta iti kathaṃ sandehaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:981_6: sa ca bhedaḥ santānasya svabhāvaḥ svasantāne pratibhāsamāne niyamena pratibhāseta /
SA15bsa075_u:982_1: bhedapratibhāse hi upagamyamāne tadavadhibhūtasyāpi parasantānasya pratibhāso durapahnavaḥ syāt /
SA15bsa075_u:983_1: sāvadherasya bhāsaḥ syānna vā grāhyaṃ tadātmanā //
SA15bsa075_u:986_0: yathā hi svasantānamātre parisphurati śaśaviṣāṇādasphurato na bhedaḥ pratibhāti tathā parasantānādapi sphuraṇavirahiṇo na bhātyeva bhedaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:986_1: na hi parasantānāpekṣayā kaścid viśeṣaleśaḥ svasantānasya parisphurati yo nāsti śaśaviṣāṇāpekṣayā /
SA15bsa075_u:986_2: na ca śaśaviṣāṇaparasantānāvapekṣya samāne svasantānapratibhāse śaśaviṣāṇāpekṣayā na bhedo nāpyabhedaḥ pratibhāti /
SA15bsa075_u:986_3: parasantānāpekṣayā tu bheda eva bhātītyevamavasthāpayituṃ śakyam /
SA15bsa075_u:987_0: bhedābhedayorabhāvaparihāreṇa hi yathā bhedo vyavasthitaḥ tadvad bhedapratibhāso 'pi bhedābhedābhāvapratibhāsavilakṣaṇa evocito bhavitum,
SA15bsa075_u:987_1: na ca tathānubhūyate / tathāpi bhedaḥ pratibhātīti vacanaracanametat /
SA15bsa075_u:988_1: yadi cāvadhipratibhāsavirahe 'pi bhedapratibhānamidaṃ paracittānu(kampayā) kṣamitavyaṃ (tarhi) bahirarthasyāpi kathamabhāvaḥ sidhyati /
SA15bsa075_u:988_5: tataścātraiva sandeho na bahirartha iti cet /
SA15bsa075_u:988_8: kadācidasau nāstyeva na cāsāvavabhāsata ityapi vaktuṃ śakteḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:989_0: kiṃ ca mā nāma bhāsīṣṭa bahirarthaḥ kasyacidapi tathāpi kathaṃ tadabhāvasiddhirbhedapratibhāsābhyupagamavādina itīyanmātramiha vivakṣitam /
SA15bsa075_u:989_1: na cātra kaścid doṣaḥ / tasmād bahirarthena sādhāraṇaṃ santānāntaramiti kathaṃ vijñaptivādināmapi saṃmataṃ bhaviṣyati /
SA15bsa075_u:989_2: kiṃ ca kāryakāraṇabhāvo 'pi vijñānadvayasya bhedapratibhāsavādinā bādhitumaśakyaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:989_3: pūrvabhāvinī hi saṃvittiḥ parasaṃvittyapekṣayā bhedaṃ pūrvatvaṃ cātmano gṛhṇātyevāvadhipratibhāsavigame 'pi /
SA15bsa075_u:990_0_0: parabhāvinyapi saṃvittiḥ pūrvasaṃvittyapekṣayā bhedaṃ paratvaṃ cātmano 'dhigacchatyeva
SA15bsa075_u:992_0: iti bhagavato vārtikakārasya vacanena phalitamatra mate /
SA15bsa075_u:992_1_1: prativādino bhedagrahaṇamanumanyamānena santānāntarasandehaṃ ca vinā kathamuttaritavyaṃ
SA15bsa075_u:993_1: na tāvat pratyakṣeṇa, tasya vidhiviṣayasya pratiṣedhasādhanātadhikārāt /
SA15bsa075_u:993_3: atra brūmaḥ / santānāntarasaṃbhave niyatabhāvaḥ tatao bhedaḥ svacittasya /
SA15bsa075_u:993_5: yathā ca yadupalabhyamānaṃ yenaṃ rūpeṇa na bhāsate na tat tena rūpeṇa sadvyavahārayogyaṃ yathā nīlaṃ pītarūpeṇa /
SA15bsa075_u:993_6: nopalabhyate ca svacittamupalabhyamānaṃ parasantānād bhinne(na)rūpeṇeti bhedasya svacittatādātmyaniṣedhe dṛśyaviśeṣaṇaprayogānapekṣā svabhāvānupalabdhiriyam /
SA15bsa075_u:994_1: avadhyapratibhāse tu bhedapratibhāsābhāvaḥ śaśaviṣāṇabhedapratibhāsābhāvavat siddha eva /
SA15bsa075_u:994_2: evamanena pramāṇena santānāntarasya svacittāpekṣayā bhede pratikṣipte abhede ca svayamevāsaṃbhavini bhedābhedābhyāmavācyatvaṃ siddham /
SA15bsa075_u:995_0: api ca santānāntare tāvadarvāgdṛśāṃ sandeho bhavadbhiranumanyate /
SA15bsa075_u:995_3: vidyamānameva kadācit santānāntaraṃ bhagavatā nāvadhāryate tathāpyasau sarvajña iti kathametat /
SA15bsa075_u:995_6: pratyakṣeṇa paracittapratītau grāhyagrāhakabhāvo 'pi paracittasya bhagavaccittena sahāyāta iti bahirarthavāda eva mukhāntareṇopagataḥ syāt,
SA15bsa075_u:996_0: asmadīyamatena tu paracittaṃ nāstyeveti tadavadhāraṇakṛto(na) bhagavataḥ sarvajñatākṣatidoṣaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:996_1: yāvacca bhedagrahaṇābhimānarūpā saṃvṛsttitāvat santānāntare sandehāttadavabodhanārthaṃ vacanādirapi pravartata iti svavacanavirodho 'pi na saṃbhavatyeva /
SA15bsa075_u:996_2: na khalu santānāntaraviṣayaḥ sarvathā sandeho nāstyevetyabhimatamasmākam,
SA15bsa075_u:996_4: idaṃ hi santānāntarābhāvasādhanamadvayasādhanena sādhāraṇamiti naikaniyataḥ svavacanādivirodhastatparihāro vā /
SA15bsa075_u:997_0: ātmā sa tasyānubhavaḥ sa ca nānyasya kasyacit
SA15bsa075_u:999_1_0: na citrākārasaṃvedanāt ityādi dveṣavikaluṣāśeṣā eva tuṣākāro 'pi vedāntasiddhānta
SA15bsa075_u:999_1_2: sarvā saṃvṛtisatyāntaḥ pātinī hyevāpai(tī) ti sakalamanākulamiti /
